column2: BANNIT ta'n dooinney nagh vel er n'immeeaght ayns coyrle ny mee‐chrauee, ny er hassoo ayns raad peccee:
as nagh vel er hoie ayns stoyl ny craidoilee;
Agh ta e haitnys ayns leigh yn Chiarn:
as ayns y leigh echeysyn nee eh eh hene y chliaghtey laa as oie.
As bee eh myr billey soit rish oirr yn ushtey:
ver magh e vess ayns imbagh cooie.
E ghuillag neesht cha jean fioghey:
as jeeagh, cre‐erbee t'eh dy yannoo, te cheet lesh.
Er son ny mee-chrauee, cha vel eh myr shen maroosyn:
agh t'ad goll‐rish y choau ta'n gheay dy heebey veih eddin y thallooin.
Shen‐y‐fa cha vod ny mee‐chrauee shassoo ayns y vriwnys:
chamoo ny peccee ayns chaglym y sleih ynrick.
Son shione da'n Chiarn raad y sleih cairal:
as nee raad ny mee‐chrauee cherraghtyn.
CRE'N‐FA ta ny ashoonyn cha eulyssagh girreemagh lesh y cheilley:
as cre hon ta'n sleih goaill red ommijagh ayns nyn gione.
Ta reeaghyn y thallooin troggal seose, as ta ny fir‐reill goaill coyrle cooidjagh noi'n Chiarn, as noi'n Fer‐ooilit echey.
Lhig dooin brishey ny kianlaghyn oc veih‐my‐cheilley:
as y whing oc y cheau ersooyl j'in.
Eshyn ta baghey ayns niau gharys orroo lesh craid:
bee ad ec y Chiarn ayns faghid.
Eisht nee eh loayrt roo ayns e chorree:
as ver eh sneih orroo ayns trimmid e yymmoose.
Agh ta mish er hoiaghey seose my Ree:
er Sion my chronk casherick.
Neem's y leigh y phreacheil, my‐y‐chione ta'n Chiarn er ghra rhym:
Uss my Vac, jiu yn laa ta mee er dty gheddyn.
Shirr orrym, as ver‐ym dhyt ny ashoonyn son dty eiraght:
as ny ayrnyn sodjey magh jeh'n theihll fo dty rere.
Nee uss ad y vroo lesh lorg-reill dy yiarn:
as brishey ad ayns peeshyn myr saagh craie.
Gow‐jee keeayl nish er‐y‐fa-shen, O shiuish reeaghyn:
gow‐jee raaue shiuish ta briwnyn y thallooin.
Shirveish‐jee yn Chiarn lesh aggle:
as gow‐jee boggey ayn lesh arrym.
Cur‐jee ooashley da'n Mac, nagh bee eh jymmoosagh, as myr shen shiu dy herraghtyn veih'n raad cair:
my vees e chorree er ny vrasnaghey, (agh ny veggan;) bannit t'adsyn ooilley ta coyrt nyn dreishteil aynsyn.
HIARN, kys t'adsyn er nyn mishaghey ta dy my voirey:
shimmey ad ta girree m'oi.
Shimmey t'ayn ta gra jeh m'annym:
Cha vel veg y chooney ny chour ayns e Yee.
Agh uss, O Hiarn, m'endeilagh:
uss my ooashley, as y fer ta cummal seose my chione.
Deie mee er y Chiarn lesh my choraa:
as cheayll eh mee ass e chronk casherick.
Lhie mee sheese as chaddil mee, as dirree mee seose reesht;
son ren y Chiarn m'y niartaghey.
Cha goym's aggle roish jeih thousaneyn jeh'n sleih:
ta er n'irree magh m'oi er dy chooilley cheu.
Seose, Hiarn, as cooin lhiam, O my Yee:
son t'ou bwoalley ooilley my noidyn er craue ny keeill; t'ou er vrishey feeacklyn ny mee‐chrauee.
Ta Saualtys bentyn gys y Chiarn:
as ta dty vannaght er dty phobble.
CLASHT rhym tra ta mee geamagh, O Yee my chairys:
t'ou er choyrt feaysley dooys tra va mee ayns seaghyn; jean myghin orrym, as eaisht rish my phadjer.
O shiuish vec gheiney, caid nee shiu goltooan my ooashley:
as goaill lheid y taitnys ayns coyrleyn fardalagh, as geiyrt da breagyn?
Toig‐jee shoh neesht, dy vel y Chiarn er reih da hene yn dooinney ta crauee:
tra neem geamagh er y Chiarn, nee eh clashtyn rhym.
Shass‐jee ayns aggle, as ny jean‐jee peccah:
smooinee‐jee dy dowin ayns nyn gree hene, as ayns nyn shamyr, as bee‐jee ec shee.
Cheb‐jee yn oural dy chairys:
as cur‐jee nyn dreishteil ayns y Chiarn.
Shimmey t'ayn ta gra:
quoi yeeaghys dooin veg y vie?
Hiarn, trog uss seose:
soilshey dty eddin orrin.
T'ou er choyrt gennallys ayns my chree:
er dyn traa dy ren yn arroo, as y feeyn, as yn ooill ocsyn bishaghey.
Neem's lhie sheese ayns shee, as goaill my ea:
son she uss Hiarn, dty lomarcan, ta coyrt orrym baghey ayns sauchys.
CUR geill da my ghoan, O Hiarn:
gow tastey jeh smooinaghtyn dowin my chree.
O eaisht rish coraa my eam, my Ree, as my Yee:
son hoods neem my phadjer.
My choraa clynnee uss dy leah, O Hiarn:
dy moghey neem's my phadjer y hebbal hoods, as jeeaghyn seose.
Son she uss y Jee nagh vel veg y taitnys ayd ayns mee‐chraueeaght:
cha‐moo nee olk erbee baghey mârt.
Cha jean nyn lheid as ta ommijagh shassoo ayns dty enish:
son ta dwoaie ayd orroosyn ooilley ta jannoo mee‐chairys.
Nee uss adsyn y stroie ta loayrt breagyn:
ver y Chiarn feoh chammah da'n dooinney folley as da'n er molteyragh.
Agh er my hon's, hig‐ym gys dty hie, er eer ymmodee dty vyghin:
as ayns dty aggle ver‐yms ooashley kiongoyrt rish dty hiamble casherick.
Leeid mee, O Hiarn, ayns dty chairys, kyndagh rish my noidyn:
jean dty raad rea roish m'eddin.
Son cha vel veg y firrinys ayns e veeal:
ta ny ayrnyn cheu‐sthie oc eer olkys.
Ta'n scornagh oc oaie foshlit:
t'ad brynnyraght lesh nyn jengey.
Stroie uss adsyn O Yee; lhig daue cherraghtyn liorish nyn goyrleyn hene:
tilg ad magh ayns ymmodee nyn mee‐chraueeaght; son t'ad er n'irree‐magh dt'oi.
As lhig dauesyn ooilley ta coyrt nyn dreishteil aynyds, boggey 'ghoaill:
bee adsyn dy kinjagh coyrt booise, son dy vel oo fendeil ad; adsyn ta graihagh er dty Ennym, vees lane dy voggey ayn-yds.
Son ver uss, Hiarn, dty vannaght da'n fer‐cairal:
as lesh dty chenjallys foayroil nee oo eshyn y endeil myr lesh eilley‐caggee.
O HIARN, ny cur oghsan dooys ayns dty chorree:
chamoo smaghtee mee ayns dty yymmoose.
Jean myghin orrym, O Hiarn, son ta mee annoon:
O Hiarn, slaanee mee, son ta my chraueyn seaghnit.
Ta sou‐aigney trome myrgeddin orrym:
agh, Hiarn, caid nee oo mish y cherraghey?
Chyndaa uss, O Hiarn, as livrey m'annym:
O saue mee er graih dty vyghinyn.
Son ayns baase cha vel dooinney erbee cooinaghtyn orts:
as quoi ver moylley dhyts ayns yn oaie?
Ta mee deinagh lesh gaccan; dy chooilley oie ta mee gushtaghey my lhiabbee:
as fluighey my lhiaght lesh my yeir.
Ta my aalid er n'immeeaght lesh eer seaghyn:
as er ny lheie ersooyl kyndagh rish ooilley my noidyn.
Ersooyl voym shiuish ooilley ta gobbraghey molteyrys:
son ta'n Chiarn er chlashtyn coraa my ghobberan.
Ta'n Chiarn er chlashtyn my accan:
nee'n Chiarn soiaghey jeh my phadjer.
Bee ooilley my noidyn er nyn stroie as dy trome seaghnit:
chyndaa‐ee ad nyn gooyl, as hig ad gys nearey doaltattym.
O HIARN my Yee, aynyds ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil:
saue mee vouesyn ooilley ta jannoo tranlaase orrym, as livrey mee;
Er aggle dy stroie eh my vioys myr lion, as eh y raipey dy peeshyn:
choud as nagh vel unnane dy chooney lhiam.
O Hiarn my Yee, my ta mee er n'yannoo veg dy lheid y red:
ny my ta olkys erbee ayns my laueyn;
My ta mee er chooilleeney olk dasyn ren dellal dy dooie rhym:
(ta mee eer er livrey eshyn ta my noid fegooish oyr;)
Eisht lhig da my noid eiyrtys y yannoo er my annym, as my ghoaill:
dy jarroo lhig da my vioys y stampey sheese er y thalloo, as cur my onnor ny lhie 'sy joan.
Irree, O Hiarn, ayns dty chorree, as trog oo hene seose, kyndagh rish farg my noidyn:
shass er my hon ayns y vriwnys t'ou er harey.
As myr shen hig chaglym y phobble my geayrt‐y‐mood:
er y ghraih ocsyn eisht trog seose oo hene reesht.
Nee'n Chiarn yn pobble y vriwnys:
cur briwnys lhiam, O Hiarn:
lurg my ynrickys, as cordail rish y neu loghtynid ta aynym.
O lhig da olkys ny mee‐chrauee cheet gys jerrey:
agh jean uss yn sleih ynrick y leeideil.
Son ta'n Jee cairal:
prowal ny creeaghyn, as ny meeghyn.
Ta my chooney cheet veih Jee:
ta coadey adsyn ta ynrick ayns cree.
Ta Jee briw cairagh, niartal as surransagh:
as ta Jee er ny vrasnaghey dy chooilley laa.
Mannagh jean dooinney chyndaa, nee eh shleeu e chliwe:
t'eh er lhoobey e vhow, as er n'yannoo eh aarloo.
T'eh er chiarail ny chour ny greinyn baaish:
t'eh coyrt magh e hideyn noi ny tranlaasee.
Cur‐my‐ner, t'eh er‐troailt er olkys:
t'eh er yiennaghtyn trimshey, as er n'ymmyrkey mee‐chairys.
T'eh er vosley as er chleiy ooig:
as t'eh hene er duittym ayns y ribbey v'eh kiarail da fer elley.
Son hig e ribbey er e chione hene:
as tuittee yn olkys echey er e vollag hene.
Ver‐yms booise da'n Chiarn, cordail rish e chairys:
as neem's moylley Ennym y Chiarn smoo Ard.
O HIARN, nyn Giannoort, cre cha ooasle ta dty Ennym trooid ooilley yn theihll:
uss ta er hoiaghey dty ghloyr erskyn ny niaughyn!
Magh ass eer beill oikanyn as cloan er y cheeagh t'ou er n'oardaghey niart, kyndagh rish dty noidyn:
dy voddagh oo yn noid, as yn eulyssagh y chastey.
Son goym tastey jeh dty niaughyn, eer obbraghyn dty veir:
yn eayst as ny rollageyn t'ou er n'oardaghey.
Cre ta dooinney, dy vel oo aggindagh er:
as mac y dooinney dy vel oo jeeaghyn er?
Ren oo eh ny s'inshley na ny ainlyn:
dy choamrey eh lesh gloyr as ooashley,
T'ou coyrt dasyn yn reill harrish obbraghyn dty laueyn:
as er choyrt dy chooilley nhee ayns biallys fo e chassyn.
Dy chooilley cheyrrey as dow:
as myrgeddyn beiyn y vagher;
Eeanlee yn aer, as eeastyn ny marrey:
as cre‐erbee ta snaue trooid raaidyn ny faarkaghyn.
O Hiarn nyn Ghiannoort:
cre cha ooasle ta dty Ennym ayns ooilley'n seihll!
VER‐YMS booise dhyt's, O Hiarn, lesh ooilley my chree:
loayr‐ym jeh ooilley dty obbraghyn mirrilagh.
Beem's gennal as goym boggey aynyd's:
dy jarroo, my arraneyn neem y yannoo jeh dty Ennym, O Uss smoo Ard.
Choud as ta my noidyn er nyn imman ersooyl:
nee ad tuittym as cherraghtyn ec dty enish.
Son t'ou er vendeil my chairys as my chooish:
t'ou dty hoie er stoyl‐reeoil dy vriwnys cairagh.
T'ou er choyrt oghsan da ny Ashoonyn, as er stroie ny mee‐chrauee:
t'ou er choyrt ass yn ennym oc son dy bragh as dy bragh.
O uss noid, ta traartyssyn er jeet gys slane jerrey; eer myr ny ard‐valjyn t'ou er stroie; ta'n imraa oc er gholl naardey maroo.
Agh ta'n Chiarn farraghtyn son dy bragh:
t'eh myrgeddin er chiarail e stoyl‐reeoil son briwnys.
Son nee eh yn seihll y vriwnys ayns cairys:
as shirveish briwnys firrinagh er y pobble.
Bee yn Chiarn neesht fendeilys dauesyn ta tranlaasit:
dy jarroo kemmyrk ayns y traa cooie dy heaghyn.
As adsyn shione daue dty Ennym, ver nyn dreishteil aynyds:
son cha vel uss, Hiarn, rieau er hreigeil adsyn ta dy dty hirrey.
O moylley‐jee yn Chiarn ta baghey ayns Sion:
soilshee‐jee da'n pobble cre t'eh er n'yannoo.
Son tra t'eh jannoo briaght son deayrtey fuill dyn loght, t'eh cooinaghtyn orroo:
as cha vel eh jarrood accan ny ymmyrchee.
Jean myghin orrym, O Hiarn:
smooinee er y seaghyn ta mee er hurranse lioroosyn ta dwoaie oc orrym:
uss ta dy my hroggal seose veih giattyn y vaaish;
Dy voddym soilshaghey ooilley dty voylley cheu‐sthie jeh giattyn inneen Sion:
neem's boggey 'ghoaill ayns dty haualtys.
Ta ny ashoonyn er duittym sheese ayns yn ooig t'ad hene er n'yannoo:
ayns y ribbey cheddin dollee ad dy follit, ta'n chass oc hene er ny ghoaill.
Ta fys ain dy vel y Chiarn cooilleeney briwnys:
ta'n mee‐chrauee ny chassey ayns obbyr e laueyn hene.
Bee ny drogh‐yantee er nyn jyndaa gys niurin:
as ooilley yn sleih ta jarrood Jee.
Son cha bee'n boght dy kinjagh er ny yarrood:
cha jean farkiaght surransagh ny imlee cherraghtyn son dy bragh.
Trag ort, Hiarn, as ny lhig da dooinney laue yn eaghtyr y gheddyn:
lhig da ny ashoonyn v'er nyn mriwnys ayns dty hilley.
Cur ad ayns aggle, O Hiarn:
dy vod fys 've ec ny ashoonyn nagh vel ad hene agh deiney.
CRE hon t'ou shassoo choud jeh, O Hiarn:
as follaghey dt'eddin ayns y traa femoil hy heaghyn.
Ta'n mee‐chrauce dy chooilleeney e aigney hene jannoo tranlaase er y voght:
lhig daue hene ve goit ayns ny kialgyn croutagh t'ad er ghoaill ayns nyn smooinaghtyn.
Son ta'n dooinney mee‐chrauee er voggyssagh jeh yeearree e chree hene:
as loayrt dy mie jeh'n er sayntoilagh ta feoh ec Jee er.
Ta'n mee‐chrauee cha mooaralagh, nagh vel geill echey da Jee:
chamoo ta Jee ayns ooilley e smooinaghtyn.
Ta ny raaidyn echey kinjagh seaghnagh:
ta dty vriwnyssyn foddey er-skyn roshtyn e hilley, as er‐yn‐oyr-shen t'eh cur‐y‐lane fo ooilley e noidyn.
Son t'eh er ghra ayns e chree, Cha n'aggle dou, cha beem dy bragh er my hilgey sheese:
cha daghyr skielley erbee my raad.
Ta'n beeal echey lane dy ghweeaghyn, dy oalsaght as molteyrys:
fo e hengey ta mee‐chraueeaght as fardail.
T'eh soie fo‐chlea myr maarliagh ayns corneilyn fadane ny straaidyn:
as dy follit ayns e oayldyn dorraghey t'eh dunverys yn dooinney gyn loght; ta e hooillyn soit noi'n voght.
Son t'eh lhie farkiaght dy follit, dy jarroo myr lion t'eh ny lhie kellit ayns e ooig:
dy vod eh spooilley yn boght.
T'eh jannoo niart er y voght:
tra t'eh tayrtyn eh ayns e ribbey.
T'eh tuittym sheese, as croymmey eh hene:
dy vod sheshaght ny boghtyn tuittym ayns laueyn e leeideilee.
T'eh er ghra ayns e chree, Cha vel aggle orrym, ta Jee er yarrood:
t'eh follaghey e eddin, as cha der eh dy bragh geill da.
Irree, O Hiarn Yee, as trog seose dty laue:
ny jarrood yn boght.
Cre'n‐fa yinnagh y dooinney olkyssagh loayrt dy mollaghtagh noi Jee:
choud as t'eh gra ayns e chree, Cha vel aggle orrym, s'cummey lhiats, O Yee, er y hon.
Shickyr t'ou er vakin eh:
son t'ou goaill tastey jeh mee‐chraueeaght as aggair.
Dy vod oo goaill y chooish ayns dty laue hene:
ta'n boght coyrt e varrant hood's; son uss yn fer‐coonee ocsyn ta gyn caarjyn.
Brish uss pooar yn mee‐chrauee as goanlyssagh:
gow ersooyl yn vee‐chraueeaght echey, nagh bee veg jeh rygheddyn.
Ta'n Chiarn ny Ree son dy bragh as dy bragh:
as ta ny ashoonyn er herraghtyn ass y cheer.
Hiarn, t'ou er chlashtyn yeearree ny boghtyn:
t'ou niartaghey ny creeaghyn oc, as ta dty chleaysh geaishtagh roo;
Dy chooney lesh y chloan gyn-ayr as y boght gys nyn gair:
nagh bee yn dooinney seihltagh ny sodjey er ny hoiaghey seose nyn 'oi.
AYNS y Chiarn ta mish cur my hreishteil, kys dy vel shiu gra eisht rish my annym, ee dy chosney ersooyl myr eean gys y chronk?
Son cur‐my‐ner, ta ny mee‐chrauee loobey nyn mhow, as jannoo aarloo nyn sideyn ayns y whiver:
dy vod ad lhiggey gynyss orroosyn ta ynrick ayns cree.
Son bee ny undinyn er nyn dilgey sheese:
as cre oddys y vooinjer chairagh y yannoo?
Ta'n Chiarn ayns e hiamble casherick:
ta stoyl‐reeoil y Chiarn ayns niau;
Ta ny sooillyn echey goaill tastey jeh'n voght:
as ferroogh e hooillyn prowal cloan gheiney.
Ta'n Chiarn lowal jeh'n sleih cairagh:
agh ta dwoaie ec e annym er y vee‐chrauee, as ersyn ta sleeuit er olkys.
Er ny mee‐chrauee deayrtee eh ribbaghyn, aile as brimstone, sterrym as dorrin:
shoh vees y cronney ocsyn dy iu.
Son ta'n Chiarn cairal graihagh er cairys:
as ver e eddin my‐ner shen ny ta kiart.
COOIN lhiam, Hiarn, son cha vel un dooinney crauee faagit:
son cha vel y vooinjer ynrick agh goaun mastey cloan gheiney.
T'ad taggloo jeh fardail dagh unnane rish e naboo:
cha vel ad agh brynneraght lesh nyn meillyn, as jannoo molteyrys ayns nyn gree dooble.
Ver y Chiarn mow ooilley ny meillyn molteyragh:
as y chengey ta loayrt goan mooaralagh;
Adsyn ta er ghra, Lesh nyn jengey yiow mayd barriaght:
shin hene lhisagh loayrt; quoi ta ny hiarn harrin?
Nish er graih seaghyn vee‐gherjoil ny ymmyrchee:
as er son osnaghyn trommey ny boghtyn;
Trog‐ym orrym, ta'n Chiarn dy ghra:
as ver‐ym feaysley da dagh unnane veihsyn ta gatt n'oi, as ver‐ym eh gys fea.
Ta goan y Chiarn goan glen:
dy jarroo myr yn argid, ta er ny ghlenney veih yn ooir, as er ny lheie shiaght keayrtyn ayns yn aile.
Nee oo ad y reayll, O Hiarn:
nee oo adsyn y choadey veih yn sheeloghe shoh son dy bragh.
Ta ny mee‐chrauee gimmeeaght er dy chooilley cheu:
tra t'adsyn er nyn soiaghey seose, ta cloan gheiney er nyn goyrt fo chosh.
CAID nee oo m'y yarrood, O Hiarn, nee son dy bragh? caid nee oo follaghey dty eddin voym?
Caid neem coyrle y hirrey ayns my annym, as ve cha seaghnit ayns my chree:
caid vees my noidyn boggyssagh harrym?
Smooinee orrym, as eaisht rhym, O Hiarn my Yee:
soilshee my-hooillyn, nagh gadlym ayns baase;
Er aggle dy jir my noid, Ta mee er gheddyn y varriaght er:
son my veem er my hilgey sheese, nee adsyn ta dy my heaghney boggey 'ghoaill jeh.
Agh ta my hreishteil ayns dty vyghin:
as nee my chree boggey ghoaill ayns dty haualtys.
Neem's arrane y ghoaill jeh'n Chiarn, son dy vel eh er ghellal rhym er aght cha graihagh:
dy jarroo ver‐ym moylley da Ennym y Chiarn smoo Ard.
TA'N ommydan er ghra ayns e chree:
Cha vel Jee erbee.
T'ad er jeet dy ve feer vee‐chrauee, as dwoaiagh ayns nyn yannoo:
cha vel unnane erbee ta jannoo dy mie, cha vel unnane.
Yeeagh y Chiarn neose veih niau er cloan gheiney:
dy akin row veg jeu yinnagh toiggal, as shirrey lurg Jee.
Agh t'ad ooilley er gholl ass y raad, t'ad ooilley‐cooidjagh er jeet dy ve feohdoil; cha vel unnane ta jannoo dy mie, cha vel eer unnane.
Ta'n scoarnagh oc oaie foshlit:
lesh nyn jengey t'ad er volley:
ta pyshoon ardnieughyn fo nyn meillyn.
Ta'n beeal oc lane dy ghweeaghyn as dy herriuid:
ta ny cassyn oc tappee dy gheayrtey fuill.
Ta toyrt‐mow as mee‐vaynrys ayns nyn raaidyn, as raad y chee cha bione daue:
cha vel aggle erbee dy Yee roish nyn sooillyn.
Vel veg y tushtey oc, dy vel ad ooilley myr shoh cur rish olkys:
gee seose my phobble myr arran, as cha vel ad geamagh er ennym y Chiarn.
Shen y raad v'ad er nyn goyrt lhieu ayns aggle vooar, dy jarroo raad nagh row veg yn aggle:
son ta Jee ayns sheeloghe y sleih cairal.
Er nyn son euish, ta shiu er n'yannoo craid er coyrle y voght:
er‐yn‐oyr dy vel eh coyrt e hreishteil ayns y Chiarn.
Quoi ver Saualtys da Israel magh ass Sion? Tra ta'n Chiarn chyndaa cappeeys e phobble:
eisht gowee Jacob boggey, as bee Israel gennal.
HIARN, quoi nee baghey ayns dty chabbane‐agglish:
ny quoi nee cummal er dty chronk chasherick.
Eshyn dy jarroo ta leeideil bea oney:
as ta jannoo yn red ta jeeragh, as ta loayrt yn irriney veih e chree.
Eshyn nagh vel er chliaghtey molteyraght erbee ayns e hengey, ny er n'yannoo olk da e naboo:
as nagh vel er chooyl‐chassid e naboo.
Eshyn nagh vel soiaghey jeh hene, agh ta imlee ayns e hooillyn hene:
as jannoo mooar jeusyn ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn.
Eshyn ta lhoo da e naboo, as nagh vel dy volley eh:
ga dy beagh eh gys e choayl hene.
Eshyn nagh vel er choyrt magh e argid er use:
ny er ghoaill leagh noi'n persoon gyn loght.
Eh ta jannoo myr shoh:
cha jean eh dy bragh tuittym.
JEAN m'y choadey, O Yee:
son aynyd's ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil.
O my annym, t'ou er ghra rish y Chiarn:
Uss my Yee; cha vel my chooid seihlt, dy ve soyllit hoods.
Ta ooilley my haitnys er ny nooghyn t'er y thalloo:
as er nyn lheid as ta dy-firrinagh crauee.
Agh adsyn ta geiyrt er Jee elley:
yiow seaghyn mooar.
Nyn ourallyn‐iu folley cha jean‐yms y hebbal:
chamoo neem imraa jeh'n ennym oc cheu‐sthie jeh my veillyn.
Yn Chiarn hene toghyr my eiraght, as my chappan:
nee uss my chronney y yannoo mie.
Ta my chronney er duittym ayns cheer aalin:
dy feer, ta aym eiraght ooasle.
Ver‐yms booise da'n Chiarn son raaue y choyrt dou:
ta my veeaghyn neesht dy my choyrlaghey er imbagh ny hoie.
Ta mee er hoiaghey Jee kinjagh kiongoyrt rhym:
son t'eh er my laue yesh, shen-y‐fa cha jean‐ym tuittym.
Shen‐y‐fa va my chree gennal, as my ghloyr lane dy voggey:
Nee my challin myrgeddin goaill fea ayns treishteil.
Son cre'n‐fa? cha vaag uss m'annym ayns stayd ny merriu:
chamoo lhiggys oo da dt' Er‐casherick hene dy akin loauys.
Nee uss soilshaghey dou raad y vea; ayns dt'enish ta laanid dy voggey:
as er dty laue yesh ta eunys er son dy bragh.
EAISHT rish cairys my chooish, O Hiarn, smooinee er my accan:
as clasht rish my phadjer, nagh vel goll magh ass meillyn molteyragh.
Lhig da'n vriwnys ayms cheet magh veih dt' enish:
as lhig da dty hooillyn jeeaghyn er shen ny ta cairal.
T'ou er phrowal as er ronsaghey my chree ayns imbagh ny hoie; t'ou er my hirrey magh as cha vow veg yn olkys aynym:
son ta mee dy slane kiarit nagh jean-ym foill lesh my hengey.
Kyndagh rish obbraghyn deiney ta jeant noi goan dty veillyn:
ta mee er reayll mee hene veih raaidyn y stroider.
Cumm uss seose my immeeaght ayns dty raaidyn:
nagh jean my chesmadyn skyrraghtyn.
Ta mee er n'eamagh ort, O Yee, son nee oo m'y chlashtyn:
croym dty chleaysh hym, as eaisht rish my ghoan.
Soilshee dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh er-skyn‐insh, uss yn Saualtagh ocsyn ta coyrt nyn dreishteil ayn-yd:
veih nyn lheid ocsyn as ta shassoo noi dty laue yesh.
Jean m'y reayll myr clagh ny sooilley:
follee mee fo scaa dty skianyn.
Veih'n vee‐chrauee ta dy my voirey:
ta my noidyn chionney orrym er dy chooilley cheu dy ghoaill ersooyl my vioys.
T'ad dooint ayns y reuid oc hene:
as ta'n beeal oc loayrt reddyn mooaralagh.
T'ad lhie farkiaght ayns y raad ain er dy chooilley cheu:
chyndaa nyn sooillyn sheese gys y thalloo.
Myr y lion ta jollyssagh er e heilg:
as myr y lion aeg ta lhie gyn‐yss ayns ynnydyn follit.
Seose, Hiarn, cur e haaseyn mow, as ceau sheese eh:
livrey m'annym veih'n vee‐chrauee, ta myr cliwe ayns dty laue;
Veih deiney dty laue, O Hiarn, veih ny deiney, ta mee gra, as veih'n drogh heihll:
ta'n toghyr oc 'sy vea shoh, ny builg oc t'ou dy lhieeney lesh dty verchys follit.
Ta cloan oc lurg nyn aigney:
as t'ad faagail ny ta er‐mayrn jeh nyn merchys da nyn lhuight.
Agh er-my-hon's, neem fakin dty eddin ayns cairys:
as tra neem doostey seose lurg dty chaslys, yioym yn slane soylley jeh.
VER‐YMS graih dhyt, O Hiarn, my niart; she yn Chiarn my chreg lajer, as my endeilys:
my Haualtagh, my Yee, as my hroshid, huggey ver‐ym barrant; my eilley‐caggee, troshid myrgeddin my hauchys, as my chemmyrk.
Neem's geamagh er y Chiarn, ta feeu dy ve er ny voylley:
myr shen beem sauchey veih my noidyn.
Haink angaishyn y vaaish mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
as ren ny thooillaghyn dy vee‐chraueeaght m'y agglaghey.
Haink pianyn niurin mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
ren ribbaghyn y vaaish berraghtyn orrym.
Ayns my heaghyn neem geamagh er y Chiarn:
as jannoo accan gys my Yee.
Myr shen clynnee eh my choraa veih e hiamble chasherick:
as hig my phlaiynt kiongoyrt rish, hed eh stiagh dy jarroo gys e chleayshyn.
Va'n thalloo er ny ghleashagh, as ren eh craa:
va eer undinyn ny sleityn neesht er‐creau, as v'ad er ny scughey, ec e yymmoose.
Hie jaagh veih e enish:
as aile va cur mow ass e veeal, myr shen dy row smarageyn er nyn voadey lesh.
Chroym eh ny niaughyn neesht, as haink eh neose:
as ve dorraghey fo e chassyn.
Varkee eh er ny Cherubimyn, as ren eh getlagh:
haink eh getlagh er skianyn ny geayee.
Ren eh dorraghys e ynnyd follit:
e chabbane‐reeoil mygeayrt‐y‐mysh lesh ushtey dorraghey, as bodjallyn chiu dy choodaghey eh.
Ec sollyssid e enish ren e vodjallyn scughey:
claghyn‐sniaghtee, as smarageyn d'aile.
Hug y Chiarn neesht taarnagh veih niau, as ren y Fer‐syrjey coyrt e haarnagh:
claghyn‐sniaghtee, as smarageyn d'aile.
Lhig eh magh e hideyn, as skeayl eh ad:
hug eh magh e hendreilyn, as ren eh stroie ad.
Va ny farraneyn ushtey er ny vakin, as haink undinyn y theihll rish, lesh dty oghsan, O Hiarn:
ec blest ennal dty yymmoose.
Ver eh cooney veih'n yrjid dy my hauail:
as nee eh m'y ghoaill ass ymmodee ushtaghyn.
Nee eh m'y livrey veih my noidyn s'troshey, as vouesyn ta dwoaie oc orrym:
son t'ad ro lajer er my hon.
Haink ad orrym gyn‐yss ayns my heaghyn:
agh y Chiarn ren m'y chummal seose.
Hug eh lesh mee magh neesht gys boayl dy reamys:
hug eh lesh mee magh, dy jarroo son dy row foayr echey dou.
Nee'n Chiarn m'y chooilleeney lurg my ghellal cairagh:
cordail rish glennid my laueyn nee eh lhiasaghey dou.
Son dy vel mee er vreayl raaidyn y Chiarn:
as nagh vel mee er hreigeil my Yee, myr ta ny mee‐chrauee dy yannoo.
Son ta sooill aym gys ooilley e leighyn:
as cha dilgym e annaghyn voym.
Va mish kinjagh gyn loght kiongoyrt rishyn:
as hug mee cooyl rish m'olkys hene.
Shen‐y‐fa nee'n Chiarn m'y chooilleeney lurg my ghellal cairagh:
as cordail rish glennid my laueyn ayns shilley e hooillyn.
Da'n dooinney casherick nee oo soilshaghey oo hene dy ve (
as da'n dooinney ynrick vees oo ynrick.
Dasyn ta glen nee oo soilshaghey oo hene glen:
as noi'n roonagh soilshee oo dty roon.
Nee oo sauail y sleih ta ayns seaghyn:
as ver oo sheese shillaghyn ard ny mooaralee.
Nee oo myrgeddin my chainle y oadey:
ver y Chiarn my Yee er my ghorraghys dy ve soilshey.
Son liort's ver‐ym fo chosh sheshaght‐caggee dy gheiney:
as lesh cooney my Yee lheim‐ym harrish y voalley.
Ta raad Yee raad rea:
ta goo yn Chiarn neesht er ny phrowal 'syn aile:
eh yn fendeilagh ocsyn ooilley ta coyrt nyn dreishteil aynsyn.
Son quoi ta Jee, agh y Chiarn! ny quoi echey ta niart erbee, agh ec y Jee ain.
She Jee ta dy my choamrey lesh niart caggee:
as ta jannoo my raad jeeragh.
T'eh jannoo my chassyn myr cassyn feeaih:
as soiaghey mee seose dy ard.
T'eh gynsaghey my laueyn dy chaggey:
nee my roihaghyn brishey eer bow steillyn.
T'ou er choyrt dooys fendeilys dy haualtys:
nee dty laue yesh neesht m'y chummal seose, as nee dty smaght graihagh mish y yannoo mooar.
Nee oo raad lhean dy liooar foym dy immeeaght:
nagh skyrr my chesmadyn.
Eiyr‐ym er my noidyn as berr‐ym orroo:
chamoo neem chyndaa reesht derrey veem er stroie ad.
Bwoaill‐ym ad, derrey nagh vod ad shassoo:
agh tuittym fo my chassyn.
T'ou er my choamrey lesh niart son y chaggey:
nee uss my noidyn y lhieggal sheese foym.
T'ou er choyrt er my noidyn neesht dy chur cooyl rhym:
as neem adsyn y stroie ta dwoaie oc orrym.
Nee ad geamagh, agh cha bee unnane dy chooney lhieu:
dy jarroo gys y Chiarn, nee ad geamagh, agh cha der eh clashtyn daue.
Bwoaill‐yms ad cha meen as y joan roish y gheay:
as tilg‐ym ad magh myr y laagh ayns ny straaidyn.
Nee uss m'y livrey veih anvea yn phobble:
as ver oo orrym dy ve kione ny ashoonyn.
Pobble nagh nione dooys:
nee mee y hirveish.
Cha leah as chlynnys ad jee'm, ver ad biallys dou:
agh nee'n chloan yoarree foalsaght rhym.
Nee'n chloan yoarree failleil:
as bee ad agglagh ayns ny ynnydyn follit oc.
Ta'n Chiarn bio, as bannit dy row my er‐coonee niartal:
as moylley dy row gys Jee my haualtys;
Yn Jee hene ta fakin dy goym cooilleeney:
as ta coyrt yn pobble fo my smaght.
Eshyn eh ta dy my livrey veih my noidyn dewil, as ta dy my hoiaghey seose er nyn skyn ocsyn ta shassoo m'oi:
nee oo m'y livrey veih'n dooinney olkyssagh.
Son yn oyr shoh ver‐ym's booise dhyt, O Hiarn, mastey ny Ashoonyn:
as goym arraneyn moyllee gys dty Ennym.
Barriaght vooar t'eh coyrt da e Ree:
as soilshaghey kenjallys ghraihagh da David e Er‐ooillit, as gys e lhuight er son dy bragh.
TA ny niaughyn fockley magh gloyr Yee:
as ta'n aer soilshaghey obbyr e laueyn.
Laa lurg laa te er ny hoilshaghey:
as ta oie lurg oie cur toiggal jeh.
Cha vel edyr goan ny glare:
raad nagh vel ny coraaghyn oc er nyn glashtyn.
Ta'n sheean oc er gholl magh gys dy chooilley heer:
as ny goan oc gys ny ardjyn sodjey magh jeh'n theihll.
Ayndoo t'eh er hoiaghey cabbane son y ghrian:
ta cheet magh myr dooinney‐poosee ass e hiamyr, as goaill boggey myr dooinney lajer dy roie e choorse.
T'eh goll magh veih'n ayrn sodjey jeh'n aer, as goaill combaase mygeayrt ny ardjyn echey reesht; as cha vel nhee erbee follit veih'n chiass echey.
Ta leigh yn Chiarn ny leigh gyn foill, niartaghey yn annym:
ta recortyssyn y Chiarn shickyr, as coyrt creenaght da'n vee hushtagh.
Ta slattyssyn y Chiarn jeeragh, as coyrt boggey da'n chree:
ta sarey yn Chiarn ynrick, as coyrt soilshey da ny sooillyn.
Ta aggle y Chiarn glen, as farraghtyn son dy bragh:
ta briwnyssyn y Chiarn firrinagh as cairagh ooilley dy cheilley.
Ny smoo t'ad dy v'er nyn yeearree na airh, dy jarroo, na mooarane airh ghlen:
ny s'miljey neesht na mill, as y chere‐volley.
Lioroosyn myrgeddin ta dty harvaant ynsit:
as ayns freayll ad ta leagh vooar.
Quoi oddys ginsh earroo e loghtyn? O glen mee veih my pheccaghyn follit.
Freill dty harvaant myrgeddin veih peccaghyn dy ghaanys, nagh vow ad barriaght harrym:
myr shen beem seyr, as gyn loght veih'n peccah trome.
Lhig da goan my veeal, as smooinaghtyn my chree:
ve dy kinjagh booisal ayns dty hilley,
O Hiarn:
my niart as my Er‐kionnee.
DY jean y Chiarn dty chlashtyn ayns y laa dy heaghyn:
dy jean Ennym Jee Yacob dty endeil.
Dy der eh cooney hood veih'n ynnyd casherick; as dy jean eh dty niartaghey magh ass Sion.
Dy gooinee eh er ooilley dty hebballyn:
as soiaghey jeh dty ourallyn losht.
Dy der eh dhyt yeearree dty chree:
as ooilley dty aigney y chooilleeney.
Gow mayd boggey ayns dty haualtys, as barriaght y gheddyn ayns Ennym y Chiarn y Jee ain:
dy gooilleen y Chiarn ooilley dty aghinyn.
Nish ta fys aym, dy vel y Chiarn cooney lesh e Er‐ooilit, as dy der eh clashtyn da veih e niau chasherick:
dy jarroo lesh troshid slayntoil e laue yesh.
Ta paart coyrt nyn marrant gys fainaghyn, as paart gys cabbil:
agh nee shinyn cooinaghtyn er Ennym y Chiarn, y Jee ain.
T'adsyn er nyn goyrt fo‐chosh, as er duittym:
agh ta shinyn er droggal, as shassoo dy shickyr.
Saue shin, Hiarn, as clasht rooin, O Ree flaunys:
tra ta shin geamagh ort.
NEE'N Ree boggey 'ghoaill ayns dty niart, O Hiarn:
feer ghennal vees eh jeh dty haualtys.
T'ou er choyrt da yeearree e chree:
as cha vel oo er n'obbal da aghin e veillyn.
Son ver oo dasyn ro‐laue bannaghtyn dty vieys:
as soiaghey attey dy airh ghlen er e chione.
Hir eh bea ort's, as hug oo da bea liauyr:
dy jarroo son dy bragh as dy bragh.
Ta'n onnor echey mooar liorish dty haualtys:
gloyr as ooashley vooar ver oo ersyn.
Son ver uss dasyn maynrys dy bragh farraghtyn:
as nee oo eh gennal lesh boggey dty eddin.
As cre'n‐fa? son dy vel y Ree coyrt e hreishteil ayns y Chiarn:
as ayns myghin yn Er smoo syrjey cha bee eh er ny scughey.
Nee ooilley dty noidyn gennaghtyn dty laue:
yiow dty laue yesh adsyn magh ta dwoaie oc ort.
Nee oo ad y yannoo myr oghe ailagh ayns traa dty chorree:
nee yn Chiarn ad y stroie ayns e yymmoose, as nee yn aile ad y choyrt mow.
Yn rass oc ver oo ass ny fraueyn jeh'n thalloo:
as yn sluight oc veih mastey cloan gheiney.
Son chiare ad olkys dty oi:
as ghow ad ayns laue lheid y saase as nagh jarg ad y chooilleeney.
Shen‐y‐fa ver oo orroosyn cooyl y choyrt:
as strengyn dty vhow nee oo aarloo noi'n eddin oc.
Bee uss, Hiarn, er dty hoiaghey seose ayns dty niart hene:
myr shen nee mayd goaill arrane, as moylley 'choyrt da dty phooar.
MY Yee, my Yee, jeeagh orrym; cre'n‐fa t'ou er my hreigeil:
as t'ou choud veih my lhaynt, as veih goan my accan?
O my Yee, ta mee geam fey‐ny‐laa, agh cha vel oo cur clashtyn:
as ayns imbagh ny hoie myrgeddin cha vel mee goaill veg y fea.
As t'ou uss tannaghtyn casherick:
O uss ooashley Israel.
Ren ny ayraghyn ain treishteil ayn-yds:
hug ad nyn marrant ort, as ren oo ad y livrey.
Deie ad orts, as hooar ad cooney:
hug ad nyn marrant ort, as cha row ad er nyn goyrt mow.
Agh er my hon's, she beishteig mee, as cha nee dooinney:
eer craid gheiney, as oltooan y phobble.
Ta ooilley ny ta dy m'akin, gannidys orrym:
t'ad sheeyney magh nyn meillyn, as craa nyn ghing, gra.
Hreisht eh ayns Jee, dy jinnagh eh eshyn y livrey:
lhig da eh y livrey, my ta taitnys echey ayn.
Agh uss eh ren m'y ghoaill ass brein my vayrey:
v'ou my hreishteil tra va mee foast er keeagh my voir.
Ta mee er ve fo dty chiarail er dyn traa ruggyr mee:
uss my Yee eer veih brein my vayrey.
O ny treig mee, son ta seaghyn er‐gerrey:
as cha vel unnane dy chooney lhiam.
Ta ymmodee dew er jeet mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
ta terriu lajer Vasan er hoiaghey orrym er dagh cheu.
T'ad fosley nyn meeal orrym:
myr lion jollyssagh buirroogh son spooilley.
Ta mee deayrtit magh myr ushtey, as ta ooilley my chraueyn ass ynnyd:
ta my chree neesht ayns mean my chorp eer myr kere ta lheie.
Ta my niart chyrmit seose myr peesh dy haaghcraie, as ta my hengey lhiantyn gys my ghruntyn:
as ver uss lhiat mee gys joan y vaaish.
Son ta ymmodee moddee er jeet mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
as ta coonceil ny olkyssee cur nyn goyrle dy-cheilley m'oi.
Hoyll ad my laueyn as my chassyn; foddym ooilley my chraueyn y choontey:
t'ad shassoo gindys as jeeaghyn orrym.
Rheinn ad my gharmadyn ny mast' oc:
as er my chooat hilg ad lottyn.
Agh ny bee uss foddey voym, O Hiarn:
she uss my chemmyrk; jean siyr dy chooney lhiam.
Livrey m'annym veih'n chliwe:
as my vioys deyr veih pooar y voddey.
Saue mee veih beeal y lion:
t'ou er my chlashtyn myrgeddin veih mastey earkyn ny unicornyn.
Neem's dt' Ennym y hoilshaghey da my vraaraghyn:
ayns mean ny hagglish neem uss y voylley.
O moylley‐Jee yn Chiarn, shiuish ta goaill aggle roish:
cur‐jee ard‐voylley da, ooilley shiuish jeh sluight Yacob, as gow‐jee aggle roish, ooilley shiuish sluight Israel.
Son cha vel eh er hoiaghey beg jeh, ny er hreigeil stayd injil y voght:
cha vel eh er ollaghey e eddin veih, agh tra deie eh er, hug eh clashtyn da.
Hoods neem chebbal my voylley ayns sheshaght vooar ny nooghyn:
my vreearraghyn neem's y chooilleeney ayns yn enish ocsyn ta goaill aggle roishyn.
Nee ny boghtyn gee, as bee ad er nyn yannoo magh:
adsyn ta shirrey lurg y Chiarn, moyllee ad eh; bee'n cree eu bio son dy bragh,
Nee ooilley ardjyn y thallooin cooinaghtyn orroo hene as bee ad er nyn jyndaa gys y Chiarn:
as ver ooilley kynneeyn ny ashoonyn ooashley kiongoyrt rish.
Son lesh y Chiarn yn reeriaght:
as she eshyn yn Kiannoort mastey yn pobble.
Nee nyn lheid ocsyn ooilley ta berchagh er y thalloo:
gee as ooashley 'choyrt.
Nee adsyn ooilley ta er nyn injillaghey gys y joan [
as cha vel dooinney erbee er vioghey e annym hene.
Nee my lhuight's eshyn y hirveish:
bee ad goit stiagh son sheeloghe da'n Chiarn.
Hig adsyn, as nee ny niaughyn soilshaghey magh e chairys; da pobble hig er y theihll, adsyn ta'n Chiarn er chroo.
SHE'N Chiarn my vochilley:
shen‐y‐fa cha beem feme nhee erbee.
Nee eh faassaghey mee ayns pastyr glass:
as m'y leeideil magh rish ny ushtaghyn dy ooraghey.
Nee eh m'annym y hyndaa:
as m'y choyrt lesh magh ayns ny cassanyn dy chairys er graih e Ennym.
Dy jarroo, ga dy vel mee shooyl ayns coan scadoo yn vaaish, cha goym aggle roish olk erbee:
son t'ou uss marym; ta dty lhatt as dty lorg dy my gherjaghey.
Nee oo boayrd y yannoo aarloo roym ayns yn enish ocsyn ta er my heaghney:
t'ou er ooilaghey my chione, as bee my chappan lane.
Agh eiyree dty chenjallys ghraihagh as dty vyghin orrym ooilley laghyn my vea:
as neem's taaghey thie'n Chiarn choud as veem bio.
LESH y Chiarn y thalloo, as ooilley ny t'ayn:
combaase y theihll, as adsyn ta baghey ayn.
Son t'eh er hoiaghey eh er ny faarkaghyn:
as er hickyraghey eh er ny thooillaghyn.
Quoi eh hed seose er cronk y Chiarn:
ny quoi vees cooie dy hassoo ayns e ynnyd casherick.
Eshyn eh ta laueyn glen echey, as cree gyn loght:
as nagh vel er hoiaghey e aigney er foalsaght, as nagh vel er ghoaill lhoo dy volley e naboo.
Yiow eshyn yn bannaght veih'n Chiarn:
as cairys veih Jee e haualtys.
Shoh'n sheeloghe ocsyn ta dy hirrey eh:
jeusyn dy jarroo ta shirrey dty eddin, O Yacob.
Trog‐jee seose nyn ghing, O shiuish ghiattyn, as bee‐jee er nyn droggal seose, shiuish ghorryssyn dy bragh farraghtyn:
as hig Ree ny ghloyr stiagh.
Quoi ta Ree ny ghloyr:
yn Chiarn eh ta lajer as niartal, yn Chiarn hene niartal ayns caggey.
Trog‐jee seose nyn ghing, O shiuish ghiattyn, as bee‐jee er nyn droggal seose, shiuish ghorryssyn dy bragh farraghtyn:
as hig Ree ny ghloyr stiagh.
Quoi ta Ree ny ghloyr:
dy jarroo yn Chiarn dy heshaght‐chaggee, eshyn Ree ny ghloyr.
HOOD'S, O Hiarn, trog-ym seose my annym; my Yee, ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil aynyd:
O ny lhig dooys 've er my choyrt gys nearey, chamoo lhig da my noidyn ve boggyssagh harrym.
Son cha bee veg jeusyn ooilley ta treishteil aynyd's er nyn naaraghey:
agh bee nyn lheid as ta girree magh gyn oyr er nyn goyrt bun‐ry‐skyn.
Jeeagh dou dty raad, O Hiarn:
as ynsee dou dty chassanyn.
Leeid mish ayns dty irriney, as ynsee mee:
son uss Jee my haualtys; aynyd va my hreishteil fey‐ny‐laa.
Tayrn gys cooinaghtyn, O Hiarn, dty vyghinyn meiygh:
as dty chenjallys ghraihagh, t'er ny ve er dy rieau.
O ny cooinee er peccaghyn as loghtyn my aegid:
agh cordail rish dty vyghin smooinee orrym, O Hiarn, er graih dty vieys.
Graysoil as cairal ta'n Chiarn:
shen‐y‐fa ynsee eh da peccee yn raad cair.
Adsyn ta imlee nee eh leeideil ayns briwnys:
as dauesyn ta meen, ynsee eh e raad.
Ta ooilley raaidyn y Chiarn myghin as firrinys:
da lheid as ta freayll e chonaant as e leighyn.
Er graih dty Ennym, O Hiarn:
bee myghinagh da my pheccah, son s'mooar te.
Cre'n dooinney ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn:
eshyn nee eh leeideil ayns y raad lhisagh eh y reih.
Bee yn annym echey ec aash:
as yiow e lhuight yn cheer ayns eiraght.
Ta folliaght y Chiarn nyn mast' ocsyn ta goaill aggle roish:
as nee eh soilshaghey daue e chonaant.
Ta my hooillyn dy bragh jeeaghyn gys y Chiarn:
son tayrnee eh my chassyn ass y ribbey.
Chyndaa oo hene hym's, as jean myghin orrym:
son ta mee treigit as ayns treihys.
Ta trimshey my chree er ny vishaghey:
O cur uss lhiat mee ass my heaghyn.
Jeeagh er my arkys as my hreihys:
as leih dou ooilley my pheccah.
Jeeagh er my noidyn kys t'ad er mishaghey:
as t'ad gymmyrkey goanlys tranlaasagh my oi.
O freill m'annym, as livrey mee:
ny lhig dou ve er my choyrt gys nearey, son aynyd's ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil.
Lhig da ônid as dellal yeeragh goll mârym:
son ta my hreishteil er ny ve aynyds.
Livrey Israel, O Yee:
veih ooilley e heaghyn.
BEE uss my vriw, O Hiarn, son ta mee er n'ymmyrkey mee hene gyn loght:
ta my varrant neesht er ny ve er y Chiarn, er‐y‐fa shen cha duittym.
Feysht mee, O Hiarn, as prow mee:
ronsee my veeghyn as my chree.
Son ta dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh kinjagh roish my hooillyn:
as neem gimmeeaght ayns dty irrinys.
Cha vel mee er vaghey marish sleih foalsey:
chamoo neem sheshaght rish y vooinjer volteyragh.
Ta feoh er ve aym er chymsagh cooidjagh yn drogh 'leih:
as cha soie‐ym mastey ny mee‐chrauee.
Niee‐ym my laueyn ayns ônid, O Hiarn:
as myr shen hem gys dty altar;
Dy voddym fockley magh yn coraa dy wooise:
as soilshaghey ooilley dty obbraghyn yindyssagh.
Hiarn, ta mee er ve graihagh er cooyrtyn dty hie:
as ynnyd cabbane‐agglish dty ooashley.
O ny jeigh seose m'annym marish ny peccee:
ny my vioys marish y vooinjer folley;
Ayns ny laueyn oc ta mee‐chairys:
as ta nyn laue yesh lane dy ghiootyn.
Agh er my hon's, neem gimmeeaght gyn loght:
O livrey mee, as bee myghinagh dou.
Ta my chass shassoo dy kiart; ver‐ym moylley da'n Chiarn ayns chaglym cooidjagh y phobble.
YN Chiarn my hoilshey as my haualtys; quoi roish eisht ghoym aggle:
yn Chiarn niart my vea; quoi roish eisht veem agglagh?
Tra haink ny olkyssee, dy jarroo my noidyn as my hranlaasee orrym dy my stroie:
ren ad snapperal as tuittym.
Ga dy beagh sheshaght‐caggee dy gheiney soit m'oi, foast cha bee my chree agglagh; as ga dy jinnagh caggey girree seose m'oi, foast ver‐ym my varrant ersyn.
Un red ta mish er hirrey er y Chiarn, shen neem y yeearree:
dy jarroo dy voddym baghey ayns thie yn Chiarn ooilley laghyn my vea, dy akin aalid eunyssagh y Chiarn, as dy haaghey e hiamble.
Son ayns traa my heaghyn follee eh mee ayns e chabbane:
dy jarroo ayns boayl kellit e ynnyd‐vaghee nee eh m'y ollaghey, as m'y hoiaghey seose er creg chloaie.
As nish troggee eh seose my chione:
er skyn my noidyn mygeayrt‐y‐moom.
Shen‐y‐fa neem's oural y hebbal ayns e ynnyd casherick lesh ard ghennallys:
neem arrane y ghoaill, as soilshaghey magh moylley yn Chiarn.
Eaisht rish my choraa, O Hiarn, tra ta mee geamagh hoods:
jean myghin orrym, as clasht rhym,
Ta my chree er yannoo imraa jeed's; Shir‐jee my eddin:
Dt' eddin, Hiarn, neem's y hirrey.
O ny follee dty eddin voym:
cha-moo jean dty harvaant y hyndaa ersooyl ayns jymmoose.
T'ou er ny ve my chemmyrk:
ny faag mee, chamoo jean m'y hreigeil, O Yee my haualtys.
Tra ta my ayr as my voir dy my hreigeil:
ta'n Chiarn dy my ghoaill seose.
Ynsee dooys dty raad, O Hiarn:
as leeid mee ayns y raad cair, kyndagh rish my noidyn.
Ny livrey mee seose gys aigney my noidyn:
son ta feanishyn foalsey er n'irree seose m'oi, as lheid as ta loayrt aggair.
Va mee dy bollagh er choayll my chree:
agh dy vel mee dy shickyr credjal dy akin kenjallys y Chiarn ayns cheer ny bioee.
O jean uss farkiaght er caa yn Chiarn:
bee dunnal, as nee eh gerjaghey dty chree, as cur uss dty hreishteil ayns y Chiarn.
HOOD'S neem geamagh, O Hiarn my niart:
ny jean beg y hoiaghey jeem, er aggle mannagh jean oo m'y chlashtyn, dy beem casley roosyn ta goll sheese gys yn oaie.
Eaisht rish coraa my aghinyn imlee, tra ta mee geamagh ort:
tra ta mee troggal seose my laueyn gys stoyl‐y‐vyghin dty hiamble casherick.
O ny tayrn mee ersooyl, chamoo jean m'y stroie marish ny mee‐chrauee as drogh‐yantee:
ta loayrt dy dooie rish nyn naboo, agh t'ad smooinaghtyn er olkys ayns nyn gree.
Cur daue nyn leagh cordail rish nyn yannoo:
as cordail rish olkys ny croutyn oc hene.
Cooilleen ad cordail rish obbyr nyn laueyn:
eeck daue shen ny t'ad er hoilchin.
Son cha vel ad ayns nyn aigney cur geill da obbraghyn y Chiarn, chamoo da jannoo e laueyn:
shen‐y‐fa nee eh ad y lhieggal sheese, as cha jean eh ad y hroggal.
Moylley dy row da'n Chiarn:
son t'eh er chlashtyn coraa my aghinyn imlee.
Yn Chiarn my niart as my eilley‐caggee; ta my chree er dreishteil aynsyn, as ta mee er gheddyn cooney:
shen‐y‐fa ta my chree lheim dyn voggey, as ayns my arrane neem eshyn y voylley.
Yn Chiarn my niart:
as eshyn fendeilys slayntoil e Er‐ooillit.
O saue dty phobble, as cur dty vannaght da dty eiraght:
cur beaghey daue, as soie ad seose er son dy bragh.
CUR‐JEE lhieu gys y Chiarn, O shiuish ard‐gheiney, cur‐jee lhieu reaghyn aegey gys y Chiarn:
cur‐jee lieh'n Chiarn ooashley as niart.
Cur‐jee da'n Chiarn yn gloyr ta cooie da'n Ennym echey:
cur‐jee ooashley da'n Chiarn lesh ammys crauee.
She yn Chiarn ta sarey ny ushtaghyn:
yn Jee gloyroil ta jannoo yn taarnagh.
She yn Chiarn ta reill y faarkey; ta coraa yn Chiarn niartal ayns bree; ta coraa yn Chiarn coraa gloyroil.
Ta coraa yn Chiarn brishey ny biljyn‐cedar:
yn Chiarn, dy feer, ta brishey cedaryn Libanus.
T'eh cur orroo myrgeddin dy lheimyragh myr lheiy:
Libanus neesht as Sirion myr unicorn aeg.
Ta coraa yn Chiarn scoltey ny tendreilyn dy aile; ta coraa yn Chiarn craa yn aasagh:
yn Chiarn, dy feer, ta craa faasagh Chades.
Ta coraa yn Chiarn cur er ny feaihee nyn lheiyee y hilgey, as roostey tammagyn chiu yn aasagh:
as ayns e hiamble ta dy chooilley ghooinney loayrt jeh e ooashley.
Ta'n Chiarn soie erskyn ny thooillaghyn:
as ta'n Chiarn tannaghtyn ny Ree son dy bragh.
Ver y Chiarn niart da e phobble:
ver y Chiarn da e phobble yn bannaght dy hee.
VER‐YMS ard‐voylley dhyts, O Hiarn, son t'ou er my hoiaghey seose:
as cha vel oo er lhiggey da my noidyn dy ve mooaralagh harrym.
O Hiarn my Yee, deie mee hood:
as t'ou er my lheihys.
T'ou uss, Hiarn, er livrey my annym veih'n oaie:
t'ou er vreayll my vioys veih goll sheese gys ooig y vaaish.
Gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee gys y Chiarn, O shiuish e nooghyn:
as cur‐jee booise da ayns cooinaghtyn jeh e chasherickys.
Son cha vel e chorree farraghtyn agh meekey sooilley, as ayns y foayr echey ta bea:
foddee trimshey farraghtyn son oie, agh ta boggey cheet 'sy voghrey.
Ayns my staydoilys dooyrt mee, Cha beem dy bragh er my scughey:
t'ou uss, Hiarn, jeh dty vieys, er n'yannoo my chronk cha lajer.
Hyndaa oo dty eddin voym:
as va mee seaghnit.
Eisht deie mish hoods, O Hiarn:
as chosne mee gys my Hiarn dy feer imlee.
Cre'n vondeish t'ayns my uill:
tra hem sheese gys yn oaie?
Der y joan booise dhyt:
ny jean eh soilshaghey dty ynrickys?
Clasht, O Hiarn, as jean myghin orrym:
Hiarn, bee uss my er‐coonee.
T'ou er hyndaa my hrimshey gys boggey:
t'ou er choyrt jeem my aanritsack, as er my choamrey lesh gennallys.
Shen‐y‐fa nee dy chooilley ghooinney mie goaill arrane jeh dty voylley fegooish skeeys:
O my Yee, ver‐yms booise dhyt son dy bragh.
AYN-YNDS, O Hiarn, ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil:
ny lhig dou dy bragh v'er my choyrt gys nearey; livrey mee ayns dty chairys.
Croym sheese dty chleaysh hym:
jean siyr dy my livrey.
As bee uss my chreg lajer, as thie my endeilys:
dy vod oo my hauail.
Son uss my chreg lajer, as my chashtal:
bee uss neesht my leeideilagh, as cur mee er y raad er graih dty Ennym.
Tayrn mee ass y ribbey t'ad er hoiaghey dy follit er my hon:
son uss my niart.
Gys dty laueyn ta mee treishteil my annym:
son t'ou er my livrey, O Hiarn, uss Jee yn ynrickys.
Ta dwoaie er ve aym orroosyn ta geiyrt er ny cliaghtaghyn faase‐chredjuagh [
as ta my hreishteil er ny ve ayns y Chiarn.
Beem gennal, as neem boggey 'ghoaill ayns dty vyghin:
son t'ou er choyrt tastey da my heaghyn, as er chooinaghtyn er my annym ayns treihys.
Cha vel oo er my yeigh seose ayns laue my noid:
agh er hoiaghey my chassyn ayns boayl dy reamys.
Jean myghin orrym, O Hiarn, son ta mee ayns seaghyn:
as ta my hoilshey er n'aase moal lesh eer trimshey:
dy jarroo my annym as my challin.
Son ta my vea er n'aase shenn lesh trimshey:
as my vleeantyn lesh dobberan.
Ta my niart dy m'ailleil, kyndagh rish my vee‐chraueeaght; as ta my chraueyn er choayl nyn mioyr.
Haink mee dy ve son oltooan mastey ooilley my noidyn, agh er‐lheh mastey my naboonyn:
as ren adsyn jeh m'ainjys roie er-chea voym, as adsyn honnick mee er y raad, ren ad m'y haghney.
Ta mee dy bollagh er my yarrood, myr dooinney marroo ass cooinaghtyn:
ta mee coontit myr saagh brisht.
Ta mee er chlashtyn jeh cooyl‐chassid y sleih:
as ta aggle er dy-chooilley cheu, choud as t'ad cur nyn ghing cooidjagh, as goaill coyrle dy ghoaill ersooyl my vioys.
Agh ta my hreishteil er ny ve ayn-yds, O Hiarn:
ta mish er ghra, She uss my Yee.
Ta my hraa ayns dty laue; livrey mee veih laue my noidyn:
as vouesyn ta jannoo tranlaase orrym.
Jeeagh da dty harvaant soilshey dty eddin:
as saue mee er graih dty vyghinyn.
Ny lhig dou tuittym giare jeh my hreishteil, O Hiarn, son ta mee er n'eamagh ort; lhig da ny mee‐chrauee ve er nyn ghoyrt gys nearey as er nyn ghoyrt nyn‐dost ayns yn oaie.
Lhig da ny meillyn breagagh ve er nyn ghoyrt nyn‐dost:
ta dy dewil, dy mooaralagh, as dy olkyssagh loayrt noi'n vooinjer chairagh.
O cre cha palchey ta dty vieys, t'ou er chiarail nyn gour ocsyn ta goaill aggle royd:
as shen t'ou er n'yannoo aarloo dauesyn ta coyrt nyn dreishteil aynyd, dy jarroo kiongoyrt rish mec gheiney!
Nee oo ad y choadey ayns boayl follit dty enish veih brasnaghey dy chooilley ghooinney:
nee oo ad y cheiltyn ayns dty chabbane veih argane chengaghyn.
Dy row booise gys y Chiarn; son t'eh er yeeaghyn dooys kenjallys yindyssagh ayns ard‐valley lajer.
As tra va mee ayns my hiyr, dooyrt mee:
Ta mish er my hilgey magh veih shilley dty hooillyn.
Ny‐yeih, hug oo clashtyn da coraa my phadjer:
tra ren mee geamagh ort.
O cur‐jee graih da'n Chiarn, ooilley shiuish e nooghyn:
son ta'n Chiarn coadey adsyn ta ynrick, as dy palchey cooilleeney eshyn ta gymmyrkey eh hene dy mooaralagh.
Bee‐jee dunnal, as nee eshyn niartaghey nyn gree:
shiuish ooilley ta coyrt nyn dreishteil ayns y Chiarn.
BANNIT t'eshyn ta e neu‐chairys er ny leih da:
as e pheccah er ny choodaghey.
Bannit yn dooinney nagh vel y Chiarn cur peccah erbee ny lieh:
as ayns e chree nagh vel kialg erbee.
Son choud as chum mee my hengey:
ren my chraueyn shymley ersooyl trooid my accan gagh‐laa.
Son ta dty laue trome orrym laa as oie:
as ta soo my chorp myr chirmagh‐loshtee yn towrey.
Goym rish my pheccah hoods; as my neu‐chairys cha vel mee er cheiltyn.
Dooyrt mee; Neem goaill‐rish my pheccaghyn gys y Chiarn:
as myr shen ren uss olkys my pheccah y leih dou.
Son shoh nee dagh dooinney ta crauee, jannoo e phadjer hood, ayns traa oddys oo v'er dty gheddyn:
agh ayns ny thooillaghyn mooarey dy ushtey cha jig ad ny choar.
T'ou uss ynnyd dy m'ollaghey ayn, nee uss m'y choadey veih seaghyn:
nee oo m'y chombaasal er dy chooilley heu lesh arraneyn‐moyllee dy livrey‐ys.
Ver‐yms tushtey dhyt, as ynsee‐ym dhyt yn raad t'ou dy ghoaill:
as neem dty leeideil lesh my hooill.
Ny bee‐jee shiuish goll‐rish cabbyl ny mule, ta fegooish tushtey:
yn beeal oc shegin y ve smaghtit lesh beealraghyn as streean, er aggle dy roie ad ort.
Ta kerraghey trome gour ny mee‐chrauee:
agh eshyn ta coyrt e varrant er y Chiarn, ta myghin lhiantyn huggey er dagh cheu.
Bee‐jee gennal, O shiuish sleih ynrick, as gow‐jee boggey ayns y Chiarn:
as bee‐jee gerjoil, ooilley shiuish ta firrinagh ayns cree.
GOW‐JEE boggey ayns y Chiarn, O shiuish sleih cairagh:
son te feer jesh da'n sleih ynrick dy ve booisal.
Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn lesh y chlaasagh:
gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee da lesh y lute, as y ghreie chiaull dy yeih strengyn.
Gow‐jee arrane noa gys y Chiarn:
trog‐jee seose nyn goraa huggeysyn ayns bingys dy jeean as lesh cree gennal.
Son ta goo yn Chiarn firrinagh:
as ooilley e obbraghyn ynrick.
T'eh graihagh er cairys as briwnys:
ta'n seihll lane jeh mieys y Chiarn.
Liorish goo yn Chiarn va ny niaughyn er nyn groo:
as ooilley ny pooaraghyn oc liorish ennal e veeal.
T'eh chaglym ushtaghyn ny marrey cooidjagh, myr carnane:
as freayll fo yn diunid vooar myr ayns thie‐tashtee.
Lhig da'n seihll ooilley aggle 'ghoaill roish y Chiarn:
bee‐jee er-creau roishyn, ooilley shiuish cummaltee yn thallooin.
Son loayr eh, as ve jeant:
hug eh sarey, as hass eh shickyr.
Ta'n Chiarn coyrt bunry‐skyn coyrle ny ashoonyn:
as cur er saaseyn croutagh y phobble dy ve gyn‐ymmyd, as cur shaghrynys er coyrleyn ny princeyn.
Nee coyrle y Chiarn farraghtyn son dy-bragh; as smooinaghtyn e chree veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
Bannit yn pobble ta'n Jee oc yn Chiarn Jehovah:
as bannit ta'n sleih t'eh er reih son e eiraght.
Yeeagh y Chiarn neose veih niau, as chur eh my‐ner ooilley cloan gheiney:
veih stoyl‐reeoil e ynnyd‐vaghee ta sooill echey er cummaltee yn theihll.
T'eh cummey ooilley ny creeaghyn oc:
as toiggal ooilley nyn obbraghyn.
Cha vel Ree erbee oddys v'er ny hauail liorish niart e heshaght‐chaggee:
chamoo ta dooinney lajer erbee er ny livrey liorish mooarane niart.
Cha vel cabbyl coontit agh red fardalagh dy hauail dooinney:
chamoo oddys eh livrey dooinney erbee liorish mooads e niart.
Cur‐my‐ner ta sooill y Chiarn orroosyn ta goaill aggle roish:
as orroosyn ta coyrt nyn dreishteil ayns e vyghin;
Dy livrey yn annym oc veih baase:
as dy veaghey ad ayns earish dy ghenney.
Ta'n annym ain dy meen er ny ve farkiaght er y Chiarn:
she eshyn nyn gooney as nyn vendeilagh.
Son gowee nyn gree boggey aynsyn:
er‐yn‐oyr dy vel shin er hreishteil ayns e Ennym casherick.
Lhig da dty chenjallys vyghinagh, O Hiarn, ve orrin:
myr ta shin cur nyn dreishteil aynyd.
VER‐YMS dy kinjagh booise da'n Chiarn:
bee e voylley dy bragh ayns my veeall.
Bee m'annym boggyssagh ayns y Chiarn:
nee'n sleih imlee clashtyn jeh shen, as bee ad gennal.
O moylley‐jee yn Chiarn mârym:
as lhig dooin ard‐voylley 'choyrt da'n Ennym echey ry‐cheilley.
Hir mee yn Chiarn ayns padjer, as cheayll eh mee:
as ren eh m'y livrey veih ooilley my aggle.
Yeeagh ad seose huggey, as hooar ad soilshey:
as cha row ny eddinyn oc naaragh.
Cur‐my‐ner, ta'n boght geamagh, as ta'n Chiarn clashtyn eh:
dy jarroo, as t'eh sauail eh ass ooilley e heaghyn.
Ta ainle y Chiarn freayll arrey mygeayrt‐y‐moosyn ta goaill aggle roish:
as dy livrey ad.
O blasht‐jee, as jeeagh‐jee, cre cha graysoil ta'n Chiarn:
bannit yn dooinney ta coyrt e varrant ersyn.
O gow‐jee aggle roish y Chiarn, shiuish e nooghyn; son adsyn ta goaill aggle roish cha bee nhee dy laccal orroo.
Ta ny lionyn ayns feme, as gennaghtyn accyrys:
agh adsyn ta shirrey yn Chiarn, cha bee ad laccal nhee erbee dy vel mie.
Tar‐jee, shiuish chloan, as eaisht‐jee rhym:
ynsee‐yms diu aggle y Chiarn.
Quoi'n dooinney eh ta aignagh dy ve beayn:
as baillish laghyn mie y akin?
Smaght dty hengey veih olk:
as dty veillyn nagh loayr ad foalsaght erbee.
Shaghyn dagh olk, as jean dy-mie:
shir lurg shee, as cur eh er y hoshiaght.
Ta sooillyn y Chiarn harrish y sleih cairal:
as ta ny cleayshyn echey foshlit gys nyn badjeryn.
Ta eddin y Chiarn noi ocsyn ta jannoo olk:
dy chur ass ny fraueyn yn chooinaghtyn oc veih eaghtyr y thallooin.
Ta'n sleih cairagh jannoo aghin, as ta'n Chiarn cur clashtyn daue:
as dy livrey ad ass ooilley nyn seaghyn.
Ta'n Chiarn er‐gerrey dauesyn ta jeh cree brisht:
as sauee eh nyn lheid as ta jeh spyrryd imlee.
S'mooar ta seaghyn y fer‐cairal:
agh ta'n Chiarn cur feaysley da assdoo ooilley.
T'eh coadey ooilley e chraueyn:
myr shen cha vel unnane jeu er ny vrishey.
Agh nee lhag‐haghyrt stroie ny mee‐chrauee; as adsyn ta cur dwoaie da'n sleih ynrick, hig y chragh orroo.
Ta'n Chiarn cur feaysley da anmeenyn e harvaantyn:
as adsyn ooilley ta cur nyn marrant ersyn, cha bee ad er nyn dreigeil.
GOW my chooish ayns laue, O Hiarn, roosyn ta streeu rhym:
as jean uss caggey noi ocsyn ta caggey m'oi.
Cur dty laue gys y scape as yn eilley‐caggee:
as shass seose dy chooney lhiam.
Tayrn magh y shleiy, as cur chyndaa dauesyn ta jannoo tranlaase orrym:
abbyr rish my annym, Mish dty haualtys.
Bee ad er nyn gastey, as er nyn goyrt gys nearey, ta shelg lurg my annym:
ver ad cooyl, as bee ad er nyn goyrt mow, ta kiarail olk m'oi.
Bee ad myr y joan roish y gheay:
as Ainle y Chiarn dyn skeayley ad.
Bee'n raad oc dorraghey as sliawin:
as nee Ainle y Chiarn ad y imman.
Son ren ad dy follit soiaghey nyn ribbey dy my stroie gyn oyr:
dy jarroo fegooish oyr ren ad ooig son my annym.
Hig toyrt‐mow doaltattym ersyn gyn‐yss, as nee'n ribbey t'eh er hoiaghey dy follit eh hene y hayrtyn:
dy vod eh tuittym ayns yn olkys echey hene.
As m'annym, bee gerjoilagh ayns y Chiarn:
nee eh boggey 'ghoaill ayns e haualtys.
Nee ooilley my chraueyn gra, Hiarn, quoi ta casley rhyts, ta livrey yn boght veihsyn ta ro hrean da:
dy jarroo yn boght, as eshyn ta ayns treihys, veihsyn ta dy spooilley eh?
Dirree feanishyn foalsey seose:
hug ad reddyn gys my lieh nagh row mee kyndagh jeu.
Deeck ad dooys olk son mie:
gys mee-gherjagh mooar my annym.
Ny yeih, tra va adsyn ching, hug mee orrym aanritsack, as ren mee my annym y injillaghey lesh trostey:
as chyndaa‐ee my phadjer gys my oghrish hene.
Ren mee gymmyrkey mee hene myr gys my charrey, ny my vraar:
hie mee dy trimshagh, myr fer ta dobberan son e voir.
Agh ayns my arkys ghow ad boggey as haggil ad cooidjagh:
dy jarroo, haink ny eer ghonnanyn cooidjagh m'oi nagh bione dou, jannoo craid jeem, as cha scuirr ad.
Marish ny brynnyree va grindeyryn connyssagh:
ren snaggeraght orrym lesh nyn veeacklyn.
Hiarn, caid yeeaghys oo er shoh:
O livrey my annym veih ny seaghyn t'ad cur lhieu orrym, as my annym veih ny lionyn.
Myr shen ver‐ym's booise dhyt ayns y chaglym mooar dy leih:
neem dty voylley mastey mooarane pobble.
O ny lhig dauesyn ta my noidyn boggyssagh harrym dy aggairagh:
chamoo lhig daue meekey lesh nyn sooillyn ta dwoaie oc orrym gyn oyr.
As cre'n oyr? cha vel y ghlare oc son shee:
agh t'ad soit er goan scammyltagh noi ocsyn ta sheeoil ayns y cheer.
Doshil ad nyn meeall orrym, as dooyrt ad:
Gow nearey, gow nearey, honnick shin eh lesh nyn sooillyn.
Shoh t'ou er vakin, O Hiarn, ny bee dty host eisht, ny gow foddey voym, O Hiarn.
Dooisht, as shass seose dy vriwnys my phlaiynt:
jean cairys ayns my chooish, my Yee, as my Hiarn.
Jean mish y vriwnys, O Hiarn my Yee, cordail rish dty chairys:
as ny lhig daue boggyssagh harrym.
Ny lhig daue gra ayns nyn greeaghyn, Shen, shen, shoh myr baillin eh:
chamoo lhig daue gra, Ta shin er choyrt mow eh.
Bee ad er nyn goyrt bun‐ry‐skyn as gys nearey cooidjagh ta goaill boggey jeh my heaghyn:
bee ad er nyn goodaghey lesh oghsan as mee‐ooashley ta boggyssagh m'oi.
Lhig dauesyn ve gennal as goaill boggey ta er cheu my ghellal yeeragh:
dy jarroo lhig daue dy kinjagh gra, Bannit dy row yn Chiarn, ta goaill taitnys ayns maynrys e harvaant.
As er son my hengey's, bee eh loayrt jeh dty chairys:
as jeh dty voylley fey‐ny laa.
TA my chree ginsh dou olkys y vee‐chrauee:
nagh vel veg yn aggle dy Yee roish e hooillyn.
Son t'eh brynneraght rish hene ayns e hilley hene:
derrey vees e pheccah eajee er ny gheddyn magh.
Ta goan e veeal neu‐ynrick as lane dy oalsaght:
t'eh er vaagail jeh dy ymmyrkey eh hene dy creeney, as jeh jannoo dy mie.
T'eh smooinaghtyn er olk er e lhiabbee, as cha vel eh er hoiaghey eh hene ayns raad mie erbee:
chamoo t'eh cur dwoaie da'n red ta olk.
Ta dty vyghin, O Hiarn, roshtyn gys ny niaughyn:
as dty ynrickys gys ny bodjallyn.
Ta dty chairys shassoo myr ny sleityn ard:
ta dty vriwnyssyn goll rish y diunid vooar.
Coadee uss, Hiarn, chammah dooinney as baagh; Cre cha ooasle ta dty vyghin, O Yee:
as ver cloan gheiney nyn marrant fo scaa dty skianyn.
Bee ad er nyn yannoo magh lesh palchey dty hie:
as ver uss daue jough dty eunyssyn myr ass yn awin.
Son mayrts ta farrane y vea:
as ayns dty hoilshey nee mayd fakin soilshey.
O sheeyn magh dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh hucsyn ta coyrt enney ort:
as dty chairys dauesyn ta firrinagh ayns cree.
O ny lhig da'n chass dy voyrn cheet m'oi:
as ny lhig da laue ny mee‐chrauee m'y hilgey sheese.
Shen y raad t'ad er duittym, ooilley ny ta gobbraghey mee‐chairys:
t'ad er nyn dilgey sheese, as cha bee bree ayndoo dy hassoo.
NY jean oo hene y heaghney er coontey ny mee‐chrauee:
chamoo jean uss troo mysh ny drogh‐yantee.
Son bee adsyn dy-gerrit giarit sheese myr y faiyr:
as fiojit myr glassyraght y vagher.
Cur uss dty varrant er y Chiarn, as jean dy mie:
jean cummal ayns y cheer, as bee oo dy firrinagh er dty yannoo magh.
Gow taitnys ayns y Chiarn:
as ver eh dhyt yeearree dty chree.
Treisht gys y Chiarn dty raad, as cur dty varrant er:
as ver eshyn lesh eh gy kione.
Nee eh dty chairys y yannoo cha sollys as y soilshey:
as dty ghellal yeeragh myr y vun-laa.
Cum shickyr gys y Chiarn, as farkee dy surransagh ersyn:
as ny lhig da sneih ve ort kyndagh rishyn ta'n seihll cheet lesh, noi'n dooinney ta jannoo lurg drogh choyrleyn.
Scuirr veih corree, as faag void jymmoose:
ny bee er dty vrasnaghey, er aggle dy bee oo er dty ghreinaghey dy yannoo olk.
Bee drogh‐yantee er nyn astyrt ass ny fraueyn:
as adsyn ta dy surransagh farkiaght er y Chiarn, yiow ad shoh eiraght 'sy cheer.
Foast maghey tammylt beg, as bee'n mee‐chrauee dy bollagh ersooyl:
nee uss jeeaghyn son yn ynnyd echey, as bee eh er n'immeeaght.
Agh yiow adsyn ta jeh spyrryd meen eiraght ayns y cheer:
as bee ad er nyn ooraghey ayns mooarane shee.
Ta'n vee‐chrauee goaill coyrle noi'n dooinney ynrick:
as snaggeraght er lesh e eeacklyn.
Cha jean y Chiarn agh craid jeh:
son t'eh er vakin dy vel y laa echey er‐gerrey.
Ta'n vee‐chrauee er dayrn y cliwe, as er lhoobey nyn mhow:
dy lieggal sheese y boght as yn ymmyrchagh, as dy stroie ny lheid ocsyn ta jeh ymmyrkey yeeragh.
Hed y cliwe oc trooid y chree oc hene:
as bee'n bow ocsyn er ny vrishey.
Ta'n red fardalagh t'ec y dooinney cairagh:
ny share na berchys vooar ny mee‐chrauee.
Son bee roihaghyn ny mee‐chrauee er nyn mrishey:
as ta'n Chiarn cummal seose yn sleih cairagh.
Ta fys ec y Chiarn er laghyn y vooinjer chrauee:
as farree yn eiraght oc son dy bragh.
Cha bee ad seaghnit ayns yn earish ghaueagh:
as ayns ny laghyn dy ghenney bee dy liooar oc.
Er son ny mee‐chrauee nee, ad cherraghtyn, as nee noidyn y Chiarn lheie ersooyl myr meeaylys eayin:
dy feer myr y jaagh bee ad eebrit ersooyl.
Ta'n mee‐chrauee goaill er eeasaght, as cha vel eh geeck:
agh ta'n dooinney cairagh erreeishagh as feoiltagh.
Nee adsyn ta bannit dy Yee, baghey 'sy cheer:
as adsyn t'eh er gheyrey vees astyrit ass ny fraueyn.
Ta'n Chiarn goardrail kesmadyn y dooinney mie:
as jannoo e raad booisal da hene.
Ga dy duitt eh, cha bee eh treigit:
son ta'n Chiarn dy chummal eh seose lesh e laue.
Va mee aeg, as nish ta mee shenn:
as foast cha vaik mee rieau yn dooinney cairagh treigit, chamoo e lhuight shooyl ny dhieyn.
Ta'n fer‐cairagh dy bragh myghinagh, as geeasaght:
as ta e lhuight er ny vannaghey.
Chea veih olk, as jean shen ny ta mie:
as bee dty chummal foddey beayn.
Son shynney lesh y Chiarn shen ny ta cairagh:
cha vel eh treigeil e vooinjer chrauee hene, agh t'ad er nyn goadey er son dy bragh.
Bee'n sleih neu‐chairagh er nyn gerraghey:
er son sluight ny mee‐chrauee, bee eh astyrit ass ny fraueyn.
Nee'n vooinjer chairagh eiraght' gheddyn 'sy cheer:
as baghey ayns shen son dy bragh.
Ta beeal y fer‐cairagh loayrt jeh creenaght:
as bee e hengey taggloo jeh briwnys.
Ta leigh e Yee ayns e chree:
as cha jean e chesmadyn skyrraghtyn.
Ta sooil ec y vee‐chrauee er y fer-ynrick:
as t'eh shirrey oyr dy stroie eh.
Cha vaag y Chiarn eh ayns e laue:
ny eh y gheyrey tra t'eh er ny vriwnys.
Treisht uss ayns y Chiarn, as freill yn raad echey, as nee eh uss y vishaghey dy bee eiraght ayd 'sy cheer:
tra ta ny mee‐chrauee cherraghtyn, nee oo shen y akin.
Ta mish mee hene er vakin ny mee‐chrauee ayns ard phooar:
as blaaghey myr billey glass bay.
Hie mee shaghey, as cur‐my‐ner, v'eh ersooyl:
vrie mee er y hon, agh cha row yn ynnyd echey raad erbee er ny gheddyn.
Freill oo hene gyn loght, as cur tastey da'n red ta jeeragh:
son shen ver lesh shee gys dooinney ec y jerrey.
Er son ny drogh‐yantee, nee ad cherraghtyn cooidjagh:
as cronney ny mee‐chrauee te, dy bee ad astyrit magh ec y jerrey.
Agh ta saualtys y sleih cairagh cheet veih'n Chiarn:
ta myrgeddin yn niart oc ayns y traa dy heaghyn.
As shassee yn Chiarn lioroo, as sauee eh ad:
nee eh ad y livrey veih ny mee‐chrauee, as sauail ad, er‐yn‐oyr dy vel ad coyrt nyn dreishteil aynsyn.
NY cur oghsan dooys, O Hiarn, ayns dty chorree:
chamoo jean m'y smaghtaghey ayns dty yymmoose hrome.
Son ta dty hideyn soit dy shickyr aynym:
as ta dty laue lhie orrym dy trome.
Cha vel veg y slaynt ayns my eill kyndagh rish dty yymmoose:
chamoo ta fea erbee ayns my chraueyn, kyndagh rish my pheccah.
Son ta my pheccaghyn er n'gholl harrish my chione:
as t'ad myr errey seaghnagh, ro hrome er my hon dy ymmyrkey.
Ta soar trome jeh my lottyn, as t'ad breinn:
trooid my ommijys.
Ta mee er jeet gys lheid y seaghyn mooar as treihys:
dy vel mee goll dobberan fey‐ny‐laa.
Son ta my veeaghyn lhieent lesh doghan trome:
as cha vel ayrn erbee slane ayns my chorp.
Ta mee moal, as gooint dy trome:
ta mee er yllaghey son eer angaaish my chree.
Hiarn, ta fys ayd er ooilley my yeearree:
as cha vel my accan keillit void's.
Ta my chree pandoogh, ta my niart er my ailleil:
as ta soilshey my hooillyn er gholl voym.
Hass my chaarjyn as my naboonyn jeeaghyn er my heaghyn:
as hass my gheiney mooinjerey foddey jeh.
Adsyn neesht va sleeuit er my vioys, ren ribbaghyn y hoiaghey er my hon:
as ren adsyn va shirrey dy yannoo aggair dou, taggloo jeh olkys, as smooinaghtyn er molteyraght fey‐ny‐laa.
Er my hon's, va mee myr dooinney bouyr nagh row clashtyn:
as myr fer ta balloo, nagh vel fosley e veeal.
Va mee dy jarroo myr dooinney nagh vel clashtyn:
as nagh vel fockle echey dy ghra er e hon hene.
Son ort's, O Hiarn, ta mee er choyrt my varrant:
nee uss m'y reggyrt, O Hiarn my Yee.
Ta mee er yeearree nagh jinnagh adsyn, dy jarroo my noidyn, boggyssagh harrym:
son tra ren my chass skyrraghtyn, ghow ad mooarane boggey m'oi.
As ta mish, dy firrinagh, soit ayns y cherraghey trome:
as ta my hrimshey kinjah kiongoyrt rhym.
Son neem goaill‐rish my olkys:
as beem trimshagh son my pheccah.
Agh ta my noidyn bio as niartal:
as t'adsyn ta dwoaie oc orrym gyn-oyr, ymmodee ayns earroo.
Adsyn neesht ta cooilleeney olk son mie, t'ad m'oi:
er‐yn‐oyr dy vel mee geiyrt er shen ny ta mie.
Ny treig mee, O Hiarn my Yee:
ny bee uss foddey voym.
Jean siyr dy chooney lhiam:
O Hiarn Yee my haualtys.
DOOYRT mee, Goym tastey jeh my raaidyn:
nagh jean‐ym peccah lesh my hengey.
Smaght ym my veeal myr lesh streean:
choud as ta'n vee‐chrauee ayns my hilley.
Chum mee my hengey, as cha loayr mee veg:
va mee my host, dy jarroo, veih goan mie; agh va shoh pian as trimshey dou.
Va my chree cheh cheu‐sthie jee'm; as choud va mee myr shoh ayns smooinaghtyn dowin, ren yn aile greesaghey:
as ec y jerrey loayr mee lesh my hengey.
Hiarn, cur toiggal dou jeh my yerrey, as earroo my laghyn:
dy vod fys ve aym cre cha giare ta my vea.
Cur‐my‐ner, t'ou uss er n'yannoo my laghyn myr liurid reaish:
as cha vel my eash agh myr red gyn veg dy ve soylit hoods; as dy firrinagh ta dy chooilley ghooinney bio ooilley cooidjagh fardail.
Son ta dooinney gimmeeaght ayns scadoo fardalagh, as dy voirey eh hene ayns fardail:
t'eh stoyral seose berchys, as cha vel fys echey quoi yiow soylley jeu.
As nish, Hiarn, cre ta my hreishteil? ta my hreishteil dy jarroo aynyds.
Livrey mee veih ooilley my loghtyn:
as ny lhig dou 've son craid da'n vooinjer vee‐chrauee.
Va mee my host, as cha doshil mee my veeal:
son dty ynnoo's ve.
Scugh dty cherraghey voym:
ta mee dy jarroo ceaut fo errey hrome dty laue.
Tra t'ou uss ayns dty chorree smaghtaghey dooinney son peccah, t'ou coyrt er yn aalid echey goll mow, myr dy beagh eh garmad eeit lesh lhemeen:
cha vel dy chooilley ghooinney er‐y‐fa-shen agh fardail.
Eaisht rish my phadjer, O Hiarn, as lesh dty chleayshyn cur geill da my accan:
ny bee uss dty host ec my yheir.
Son ta mish my yoarree mayrts, as my hroailtagh:
myr va ooilley my ayraghyn.
O ymmyrk lhiam son tammylt beg, dy voddym my niart y gheddyn reesht:
roish my vaag-ym yn seihll shoh, as nagh beem arragh er my akin.
REN mee farkiaght dy surransagh er y Chiarn:
as deaisht eh rhym, as cheayll eh my eam.
Hug eh lesh mee neesht magh ass y lhag atchimagh, magh ass y laagh as y chray:
as hoie eh my chassyn er y chreg, as ren eh my immeeaght y oardrail.
As t'eh er choyrt arrane noa ayns my veeal:
dy-jarroo, toyrt‐booise gys y Jee ain.
Nee ymmodee fakin shoh, as aggle y ghoaill:
as ver ad nyn dreishteil ayns y Chiarn.
Bannit ta'n dooinney ta er hoiaghey e hreishteil ayns y Chiarn:
as nagh vel er hyndaa gys y vooinjer voyrnagh, as gys nyn lheid as ta goll mygeayrt lesh breagyn.
O Hiarn my Yee, smooar ta ny obbraghyn yindyssagh t'ou uss er n'yannoo, myr ta neesht dty smooinaghtyn hooinyn:
as foast cha vel y dooinney shen oddys yn earroo oc y hoiaghey royd dy kiart.
Dy jinnin's goaill orrym dy hoilshaghey ad, as dy loayrt jeu:
veagh ad ny smoo na ta mee fondagh dy hoiaghey magh.
Toyrtys casherick as bee‐oural cha bailt's:
agh my chleayshyn t'ou er vosley.
Chebballyn losht, as oural son peccah cha vel oo er hirrey:
eisht dooyrt mish, Jeeagh, ta mee cheet.
Ayns corp y lioar te er ny scrieu jeem's, dy lhisin dty aigney y chooilleeney, O my Yee:
ta mee booiagh y yannoo eh; dy jarroo ta'n leigh ayds er cheu‐sthie jeh my chree.
Ta mee er hoilshaghey dty chairys ayns y chaglym mooar:
cur‐my‐ner, cha gumym my veillyn, O Hiarn, as shen ta fys ayd er.
Cha vel mee er cheiltyn dty chairys cheu‐sthie jeh my chree:
ta my haggloo er ny ve jeh dty ynrickys, as jeh dty haualtys.
Cha vel mee er vreayll ergooyl dty vyghin as firrinys:
veih'n chaglym mooar.
Ny tayrn dty vyghin ersooyl voym, O Hiarn:
lhig da dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh as dty irriney dy kinjagh mish y choadey.
Son ta seaghyn erskyn‐earroo er jeet mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
ta my pheccaghyn er ghoaill lheid y greme orrym, nagh vel mee abyl jeeaghyn seose:
s'feer eh, t'ad ny smoo ayns earroo na renaigyn my ching, as ta my chree dy my ailleil.
O Hiarn, lhig da ve dty aigney dy my livrey:
jean siyr, O Hiarn, dy chooney lhiam.
Lhig dauesyn ve er nyn goyrt gys nearey, as er nyn gastey cooidjagh, ta shirrey lurg my annym dy stroie eh:
lhig daue v'er nyn imman gour nyn drommey dy scammyltagh, ta wooishal olk dou.
Lhig daue ve treigit, as er nyn gooilleeney lesh nearey:
ta gra rhym, Fie ort, fie ort.
Lhig dauesyn ooilley ta dy dty hirrey, ve gennal as boggoil aynyds:
as lhig dauesyn ta graihagh er dty haualtys, dy kinjagh gra, Dy row moylley gys y Chiarn.
Er my hon's, ta mee boght as ymmyrchagh:
agh ta'n Chiarn kiarail er my hon.
Uss my er‐coonee as my er‐kionnee:
ny lhig shaghey foddey, O my Yee.
BANNIT t'eshyn ta smooinaghtyn er y voght as yn ymmyrchagh:
nee yn Chiarn eshyn y livrey ayns traa e heaghyn.
Dy jean y Chiarn eshyn y choadey as y reayll bio, dy vod eh ve bannit er y thalloo:
as ny livrey uss eh gys aigney e noidyn.
Dy jean y Chiarn eh y gherjaghey tra t'eh ny lhie dy ching er e lhiabbee:
jean uss ooilley e lhiabbee ayns e hingys.
Dooyrt mee, Hiarn, bee myghinagh dou:
slaanee m'annym, son ta mee er n'yannoo peccah dt'oi.
Ta my noidyn loayrt dy olk jeem:
Cuin yiow eh baase, as cuin nee e ennym cherraghtyn?
As my t'eh cheet dy my yeeaghyn, t'eh loayrt dy foalsey:
as ta e chree giennaghtyn molteyrys cheu‐sthie jeh; as tra t'eh goll roish t'eh dy insh eh.
Ta ooilley my noidyn sonsheraght cooidjagh m'oi:
dy-jarroo m'oi t'ad smooinaghtyn er yn olk shoh.
Lhig da briwnys baaish goll magh n'oi:
as nish dy vel eh ny lhie; ny lhig da girree seose arragh.
Dy jarroo, my charrey ainjyssagh hene, er hug mee my hreisht:
eshyn ren neesht gee jeh m'arran, t'eh dy mooar farkiaght dy follit er my hon.
Agh bee uss myghinagh dou, O Hiarn:
jean uss m'y hroggal seose reesht, as neem ad y chooilleeney,
Liorish shoh ta fys aym dy vel oo foayroil dou:
nagh vel my noid geddyn barriaght m'oi.
As tra ta mee ec my lhaynt, t'ou dy my chummal seose:
as nee oo m'y hoiaghey kiongoyrt rish dt'eddin er son dy bragh.
Bannit dy row yn Chiarn Jee d'Israel:
seihll gyn jerrey. Amen.
MYR ta'n feeaih shirrey lurg ny strooanyn ushtey:
myr shen ta m'annym goaill foddeeaght dty yeih's, O Yee.
Ta m'annym paagh son Jee, eer son y Jee bio:
cuin hig-ym dy hassoo kionfenish Yee?
Ta my yheir er ve my veaghey laa as oie; choud as t'ad gagh laa gra rhym, Cre vel nish dty Yee?
Nish tra ta mee smooinaghtyn er shoh, ta mee deayrtey magh my chree rhym pene:
son hie mee marish y cheshaght, as hug mee lhiam adsyn mârym stiagh ayns thie Yee:
Ayns y kiaulleeaght dy voylley as dy hoyrt‐booise:
mastey ny lheid as ta freayll laa feailley.
Cre'n‐fa t'ou cha lane dy hrimshey, O m'annym:
as cre'n‐fa t'ou cha seaghnit cheu‐sthie jeem?
Cur dty hreishteil ayns Jee:
son ver‐yms foast booise da son cooney e eddin.
My Yee, ta m'annym seaghnit cheu‐sthie jeem:
shen‐y‐fa neem's cooinaghtyn orts mychione thalloo Yordan, as cronk beg Hermon.
Ta diunid freggyrt gys diunid, liorish feiyr ny thooillaghyn ushtey:
ta ooilley ny tonnyn as sterrymyn ayds er gholl harrym.
Ta'n Chiarn er choyrt e chenjallys‐ghraihagh 'sy laa:
as ayns imbagh ny hoie ghow mish arrane jehsyn, as ren mee my phadjer gys y Jee jeh my vea.
Jir‐yms rish Jee my niart, Cre'n‐fa t'ou er my yarrood:
kys ta mee myr shoh goll trimshagh, choud as ta'n noid jannoo tranlaase orrym?
Ta my chraueyn er nyn scarrey veih my‐cheilley myr lesh cliwe:
choud as ta my noidyn ta dy my heaghney, ceau oltooanyn orrym:
Ta shen, choud as t'ad dagh laa gra rhym:
Cre vel nish yn Jee ayd?
Cre'n‐fa t'ou cha seaghnit, O m'annym:
as cre hon t'ou cha anveagh cheu‐sthie jeem?
O cur dty hreishteil ayns Jee:
son ver‐yms foast booise da, eh ta slaynt my eddin, as my Yee.
CUR briwnys er my heu:
O Yee, as jean my chooish y endeil noi'n sleih mee‐chrauee:
O jean m'y livrey veih'n dooinney molteyragh as olkyssagh.
Son uss Jee my niart, cre'n‐fa t'ou er my scughey void:
as cre hon ta mee goll cha trimshagh choud as ta'n noid jannoo tranlaase orrym?
O cur magh dty hoilshey as dty irriney, dy vod ad m'y leeideil:
as mee y choyrt lhieu gys dty chronk casherick, as gys dty ynnyd vaghee.
Dy voddym goll gys altar Yee, dy jarroo gys Jee jeh my voggey as my yennallys:
as er y chlaasagh ver‐yms booise dhyts, O Yee, my Yee.
Cre'n fa t'ou cha trimshagh, O m'annym:
as cre hon t'ow cha anveagh cheu‐sthie jeem?
O cur dty hreishteil ayns Jee:
son ver‐yms foast booise da, eh ta slaynt my eddin, as my Yee.
TA shin er chlashtyn lesh nyn gleayshyn, O Yee, ta nyn ayraghyn er n'insh dooin:
cre ny obbraghyn ren uss ayns y traa ocsyn 'sy chenn earish;
Kys t'ou er eiyrt magh ny ashoonyn‐quaagh lesh dty laue, as er hoiaghey adsyn stiagh 'syn ynnyd oc:
kys t'ou er stroie ny ashoonyn, as er n'eebyrt ad ersooyl.
Son cha dooar ad y cheer ayns nyn gummal liorish y chliwe oc hene:
chamoo she yn roih oc hene ren cooney lhieu.
Agh dty laue yesh, as dty roih, as soilshey dt'eddin:
son dy row aigney mie ayd daue.
Uss my Ree, O Yee:
cur cooney gys Jacob.
Dty hrooid's ver mayd nyn noidyn fo chosh:
as ayns dty Ennym nee mayd stampey sheese adsyn ta girree seose nyn 'oi.
Son cha der‐ym my varrant gys my vhow:
cha nee my chliwe chooinys lhiam.
Agh uss eh ta sauail shin veih nyn noidyn:
as ta cur adsyn bun‐ry‐skyn ta dwoaie oc orrin.
Ta shin boggyssagh ayns Jee fey‐ny‐laa:
as ver mayd moylley da dty Ennym son dy bragh.
Agh nish t'ou toddey jeh, as coyrt shin gys nearey:
as cha vel oo goll magh marish nyn sheshaghtyn‐caggee.
T'ou coyrt orrin chyndaa nyn gooyl er nyn noidyn:
myr shen dy vel adsyn ta dwoaie oc orrin spooilley nyn gooid.
T'ou lhiggey dooin v'er nyn ee seose myr kirree:
as er skeayley shin fud ny ashoonyn.
T'ou creck dty phobble son veg:
as cha vel oo goaill veg yn argid er nyn son.
T'ou coyrt orrin ve er nyn naaraghey liorish nyn naboonyn:
as dy ve son gannidys, as ayns faghid lioroosyn ta mygeayrt‐y mooin.
T'ou coyrt orrin dy ve anghoo mastey ny ashoonyn:
as dy vel y pobble craa nyn ghing orrin.
Ta my stayd hreih gaghlaa kiongoyrt rhym:
as ta nearey my eddin er my choodaghey.
Kyndagh rish goan yn fer‐lunagh as y mollaghtagh:
kyndagh rish y noid as yn eulyssagh.
As ga dy vel ooilley shoh er jeet orrin, ny‐yeih cha vel shin dy dty yarrood:
ny gymmyrkey shin hene dy frourtagh ayns dty chonaant.
Cha vel nyn gree er choyrt cooyl rhyt:
chamoo ta ny kesmadyn ain er gholl ass dty raad;
Cha vel, ga dy vel oo er woalley shin ayns ynnyd ny dragonyn:
as er choodaghey shin lesh scadoo yn vaaish.
My ta shin er yarrood Ennym y Jee ain, as er chummal seose nyn laueyn gys Jee erbee joarree:
nagh jean Jee eh y ronsaghey magh? son ta fys echey er eer folliaghtyn y chree.
Er y ghraih ayds neesht ta shin er nyn gerraghey fey‐ny‐laa:
as coontit myr kirree ta pointit dy v'er nyn stroie.
Seose, Hiarn, cre'n‐fa t'ou cadley:
dooisht, as ny fuirree voin er son dy bragh.
Cre'n‐oyr t'ou follaghey dty eddin:
as jarrood nyn dreihys as seaghyn?
Son ta'n annym ain er ny chur lesh dy injil, dy jarroo gys y joan:
ta'n bolg ain lhiantyn gys y thalloo.
Irree as cooin lhien:
as livrey shin er graih dty vyghinyn.
TA my chree smooinaghtyn dy dowin er cooish vie:
ta mee goaill lesh bingys ny arraneyn ta mee er n'yannoo mychione y Ree.
Ta my hengey myr fedjag‐screeuee yn scrudeyr tappee.
T'ou ny s'aailey na cloan gheiney:
lane dy ghrayse ta dty veillyn, er‐y‐fa dy vel Jee er dty vannaghey son dy bragh.
Kiangle dty chliwe gys dty lheayst, O uss smoo niartal:
cordail rish dty ooashley as dty ghloyr.
Aigh mie dy row lhiat lesh dty ooashley:
markee er dty hoshiaght, er coontey yn goo dy firrinys, dy veenid, as dy chairys; as nee dty laue yesh reddyn atchimagh y ynsaghey dhyt.
Ta dty hideyn feer virragh, as bee yn pobble er nyn injillaghey hoods:
dy jarroo ayns y vean mastey noidyn y Ree.
Ta dty stoyl, O Yee, farraghtyn son dy bragh:
ta lorg‐reill dty reeriaght lorg-reill chairagh.
T'ou er choyrt graih da cairys, as feoh da mee‐chairys:
shen‐y‐fa ta Jee, dy jarroo yn Jee ayds, er dty ooillaghey lesh yn ooill dy ghennallys erskyn dty heshaghyn.
Ta ooilley dty gharmadyn soaral jeh myrrh, aloes, as cassia:
magh ass ny plaaseyn ivory, lhieu t'ad er dty yannoo gennal.
Va inneenyn reeaghyn mastey dty vraane ooasle:
er dty laue yesh hass y venrein ayns coamrey dy airh, obbrit mygeayrt lesh caghlaaghyn daah.
Clasht, O inneen, as smooinee ort, croym dty chleaysh:
jarrood myrgeddin dty phobble hene, as thie dty ayrey.
Myr shen bee taitnys ec y Ree ayns dty aalid:
son eshyn y Chiarn dty Yee, as cur uss ooashley da.
As bee inneen Tyre ayns shen lesh gioot:
myr nee ny berchee myrgeddin mast' yn pobble nyn aghinyn y yannoo kiongoyrt rhyt.
Ta inneen y Ree ooilley gloyroil er cheu‐sthie:
ta'n coamrey eck dy airh obbrit.
Bee ee er ny choyrt lh'ee gys y Ree ayns garmad dy obbyr snaidey:
hig ny moidynyn ta fieau urree ayns dty enish ta e sheshaghyn, as bee ad er nyn jebbal hoods.
Lesh boggey as gennallys hig ad lhieu mâree:
as hed ad stiagh ayns plaase y Ree.
Ayns ynnyd dty ayraghyn bee ayd cloan:
ad oddys oo y yannoo prinsyn ayns dy chooilley cheer.
Cooin‐yms er dty Ennym veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe:
shen‐y‐fa ver y pobble booise dhyt, seihll gyn jerrey.
SHE Jee nyn dreishteil as niart:
cooney feer faggys ayns seaghyn.
Shen‐y‐fa cha gow mayd aggle, ga dy beagh y seihll er ny chraa:
as ga dy beagh ny croink er nyn scughey gys mean yn aarkey.
Ga dy jinnagh ny ushtaghyn echey freaney as gatt; as ga dy jinnagh ny sleityn craa lesh dorrin y chooid cheddin.
Nee ushtaghyn y thooilley echey ard‐valley Yee y yannoo gennal:
ynnyd casherick cabbane‐agglish yn Jee smoo ard.
Ta Jee ayns y vean eck, shen‐y‐fa cha bee ee er ny scughey:
nee Jee cooney lh'ee, as shen dy feer voghey.
Ta ny ashoonyn goaill lane bea orroo, as ta ny reeriaghtyn er nyn scughey:
agh ta Jee er hoilshaghey e choraa, as nee'n seihll lheie ersooyl.
Ta'n Chiarn dy heshaght chaggee flaunys mârin:
she Jee Yacob nyn gemmyrk.
O tar‐jee ayns shoh, as jeeagh‐jee er obbraghyn y Chiarn:
cre'n traartys t'eh er choyrt lesh er y theihll.
T'eh cur er caggaghyn dy scuirr ayns ooilley yn seihll:
t'eh brishey yn bow, as giarey yn shleiy dy peeshyn, as lostey ny fainaghyn 'syn aile.
Bee‐jee feagh eisht, as toig‐jee dy vel mish Jee:
beem's er my hoiaghey seose mastey ny ashoonyn, as beem er my hoiaghey seose er y thalloo.
Ta'n Jee dy heshaght‐chaggee flaunys mârin:
she Jee Yacob nyn gemmyrk.
OBWOAILL‐JEE nyn massyn cooidjagh, ooilley shiuish phobble:
O gow‐jee arrane gys Jee lesh y choraa dy vingys.
Son ta'n Chiarn ard, as aggle dy ve er ny ghoaill roish:
she eshyn y Ree mooar er fey‐ny‐cruinney.
Ver eh sheese y pobble fo-in:
as ny ashoonyn fo nyn gassyn.
Nee eshyn eiraght y reih magh nyn gour:
dy jarroo ynnyd ooasle Yacob hug eh graih da.
Ta Jee er gholl seose lesh kiaulleeaght ghennal:
as y Chiarn lesh fieyr y chayrn.
O gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee, gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee gys y Jee ain:
O gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee, gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee gys nyn Ree.
Son she Jee Ree'n theihll ooilley:
gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee lesh tushtey.
Ta Jee reill harrish ny ashoonyn:
ta Jee ny hoie er e stoyl‐reeoil casherick.
Ta prinsyn ny ashoonyn er lhiantyn gys pobble Yee Abraham:
son Jee, ta dy ard er ny hoiaghey seose, ta fendeil y seihll, myr dy beagh eh lesh eilley‐caggee.
MOOAR ta'n Chiarn, as dy ard dy ve er ny voylley:
ayns ard‐valley yn Jee ain, dy jarroo er e chronk chasherick.
Ta cronk Sion ynnyd aalin, as boggey yn seihll ooilley:
er y cheu-twoaie ta ard‐valley yn Ree mooar:
te ry akin dy vel Jee ayns ny plaasyn eck myr kemmyrk shickyr.
Son cur‐my‐ner, ta reeaghyn y thallooin:
er nyn jaglym, as er n'gholl shaghey cooidjagh.
Ghow ad yindys dy akin lheid ny reddyn:
v'ad lhieent lesh atchim, as ayns y tullogh chaill ad nyn gree.
Haink aggle orroo, as trimshey:
myr er ben er‐troailt.
Nee uss brishey lhongyn ny marrey:
lesh y gheay niar.
Myr ta shin er chlashtyn, myr shen ta shin er vakin ayns ard‐valley yn Chiarn dy heshaght‐chaggee flaunys, ayns ard‐valley yn Jee ain:
ta Jee dy chummal eh seose son dy bragh.
Ta shin farkiaght er dty chenjallys ghraihagh, O Yee:
ayns mean dty hiamble.
O Yee, myr ta dty Ennym, myr shen ta dty voylley gys king y theihll:
ta dty laue yesh lane dy chairys.
Lhig da'n cronk Sion goaill boggey, as inneen Yudah ve gennal:
er coontey dty vriwnyssyn.
Shooill‐jee mysh Sion, as immee‐jee mygeayrt‐y‐moo'ee:
as gow-jee coontey ny tooryn eck.
Gow-jee tastey vie jeh ny voallaghyn lajer eck, soie‐jee seose ny thieyn eck:
dy vod shiu ginsh dauesyn hig nyn yei.
Son she'n Jee shoh yn Jee ain son dy-bragh as dy-bragh:
eshyn vees y leeideilagh ain gys laa nyn maaish.
OCLASHT‐JEE rish shoh, ooilley shiuish phobble:
eaisht‐jee rish ooilley shiuish ta baghey 'sy theihll.
Ard as injil, berchagh as boght:
dagh unnane ry‐cheilley.
Loayree my veeal jeh creenaght:
as nee my chree smooinaghtyn er tushtey:
Croym‐ym my chleaysh gys y coraa‐dorraghey:
as neem soilshaghey my ghlare dowin er y chlaasagh.
Cre hon yinnin aggle y ghoaill ayns ny laghyn dy olkys:
tra ta olkys my vonnyn cruinnaghey mee mygeayrt.
Ta paart ta cur nyn marrant gys nyn gooid:
as boggyssagh ayns earroo nyn merchys.
Agh cha vod dooinney erbee e vraar y livrey:
ny coonrey y yannoo rish Jee er y hon.
Son haink eh gys ny smoo dy livrey nyn anmeenyn:
myr shen dy nhegin da shen y aagail voish er son dy-bragh;
Ga dy beagh eh foddey bio:
as gyn yn oaie y akin.
Son t'eh fakin dy vel deiney creeney neesht geddyn vaaish as cherraghtyn cooidjagh:
chammah as ta'n sleih neu‐chreeney as ommijagh, as faagail nyn merchys da feallagh elley.
As foast t'ad sheiltyn dy jean ny thieyn oc farraghtyn son dy bragh:
as dy bee ny ynnydyn‐vaghee oc er‐mayrn veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe; as t'ad genmys ny baljyn oc lurg nyn ennym hene.
Ny-yeih, cha jean dooinney tannaghtyn foddey ayns ooashley:
fakin dy vod eh ve er ny hoyllaghey gys y maase ta cherraghtyn; shoh'n raad oc.
Shoh'n ommijys oc:
as ta nyn sluight moylley yn raa oc.
T'ad lhie 'syn oaie myr kirree, ta'n baase caigney orroo, as bee reill ec y sleih cairal harrystoo 'sy voghrey:
hed yn aalid oc mow ayns yn oaie ass ny cummallyn oc.
Agh nee Jee m'annym y livrey veih pooar yn oaie:
son nee eh m'y ghoaill huggey hene.
Ny gow aggle, ga dy bee fer er ny yannoo berchagh:
ny my ta gloyr e hie er ny vishaghey;
Son cha der eh lesh veg ersooyl mârish tra t'eh geddyn baase:
chamoo nee e stayd vooar geiyrt er.
