Son choud's v'eh bio, yeeagh eh er hene dy ve dooinney maynrey:
as choud's t'ou jannoo dy mie dhyt hene, loayree deiney dy mie jeed.
Eiyree eshyn er sheeloghe e ayraghyn:
as cha jean eh dy bragh soilshey y akin.
Dooinney ta ayns ooashley as fegooish tushtey:
t'eh er ny hoyllaghey gys ny beiyn ta cherraghtyn.
TA'N Chiarn, dy jarroo yn Jee smoo niartal, er loayrt:
as er choyrt eam da'n seihll veih irree seose ny greiney gys y gholl sheese echey.
Magh ass Sion ta Jee er hoilshaghey eh hene:
ayns aalid firrinagh.
Hig y Jee ain, as cha bee eh ny‐host:
hed aile roishyn nee toyrt mow, as bee dorrin niartal er ny ghoostey seose mygeayrt‐y‐mysh.
Nee eh geamagh er ny niaughyn veih'n yrjid:
as er y theihll, dy vod eh briwnys e phobble.
Chaggle‐jee my nooghyn cooidjagh hyms:
ad shen ta er n'yannoo conaant rhym lesh oural;
As nee ny niaughyn fockley magh e chairys:
son Jee hene yn Briw.
Clasht, O my phobble, as neem's loayrt:
neem's mee hene feanish y ymmyrkey dt'oi, O Israel; son mish Jee, dy jarroo yn Jee ayds.
Cha der‐yms oghsan dhyt son dty ourallyn, ny son dty hebballyn‐losht:
son nagh row ad kinjagh kiongoyrt rhym.
Cha jean‐ym soiagh jeh dow erbee ass dty hie:
ny goar yrryn ass dty woaillee.
Son lhiam's ta ooilley maase ny keilley:
as myrgeddin ta'n ollagh er thousane cronk.
Shione dou ooilley ny eeanlee t'er ny sleityn:
as ta maase feie yn vagher ayns my hilley.
My ta mee accryssagh, cha ninsh‐ym dhyts:
son ta'n slane seihll lhiam's, as ooilley ny t'ayn.
Vel oo smooinaghtyn dy nee‐ym feill teirroo:
as dy niu‐ym fuill goair?
Cheb yn oural dy hoyrt‐booise gys Jee:
as eeck dty vreearaghyn dasyn smoo Ard;
As eie orryms ayns traa dy heaghyn:
myr shen neem's geaishtagh rhyt, as nee oo mish y voylley.
Agh rish ny mee‐chrauee dooyrt Jee:
Cre hon t'ou preacheil my leighyn, as goaill my chonaant ayns dty veeall:
Fakin dy vel dwoaie ayd er lhiasaghey-bea:
as t'ou er hilgey my ghoan cheu dty-chooyloo.
Tra honnick oo maarliagh, va dt'aigney lesh:
as t'ou er ghoaill ayrn mâroosyn ta brishey poosey.
T'ou er choyrt reamys da dty veeall dy loayrt olkys:
as lesh dty hengey t'ou er hoiaghey magh molteyraght.
Hoie oo, as loayr oo noi dty vraar:
dy jarroo, as t'ou er choyrt scammylt da mac dty vayrey.
Ny reddyn shoh t'ou er n'yannoo, as chumm mish my hengey; as heill oo dy olkyssagh dy row mish eer dty lheid hene:
agh ver‐yms oghsan dhyt, as soie‐ym kiongoyrt rhyt ny reddyn t'ou er n'yannoo.
O smooinee‐jee er shoh, shiuish ta jarrood Jee:
er aggle dy raip‐ym shiu ersooyl, as nagh bee unnane erbee dy livrey shiu.
Quoi‐erbee ta chebbal dou booise as moylley, t'eh cur onnor dou:
as dasyn, ta reill e ymmyrkey dy cair, soilsheeyms saualtys Yee.
JEAN myghin orrym, O Yee, lurg dty vieys vooar:
cordail rish ymmodee dty vyghinyn cur ersooyl my loghtyn.
Niee mee dy bollagh veih m'olkys:
as glen mee veih my pheccah.
Son ta mee goaill‐rish m'oiljyn:
as ta my pheccah kinjagh kiongoyrt rhym.
Dt'oi's dty‐lomarcan ta mee er n'yannoo peccah, as er chur rish yn olk shoh ayns dty hilley:
dy voddagh oo v'er dty heyrey ayns dty raa, as ynrick tra t'ou briwnys.
Cur‐my‐ner va mee er my chummey ayns olkys:
as ayns peccah ren my voir m'y ghiennaghtyn.
Agh cur‐my‐ner, t'ou shirrey firrinys ayns ny ayrnyn er cheu‐sthie:
as ver oo orrym toiggal creenaght dy follit.
Nee oo mish y ghlenney lesh hyssop, as beem glen:
nee oo m'y niee, as beem ny s'gilley na sniaghtey.
Ver oo orrym clashtyn jeh boggey as gennallys:
dy vod ny craueyn t'ou er vrishey boggey 'ghoaill.
Chyndaa dt'eddin veih my pheccah:
as cur ersooyl ooilley my ghrogh‐yannoo.
Croo aynym cree glen, O Yee:
as jean ass‐y‐noa spyrryd cairagh cheu‐sthie jee'm.
Ny tilg mee ersooyl veih dt'enish:
as ny gow dty Spyrryd Casherick voym.
O cur dou reesht gerjagh dty chooney:
as niartee mee lesh dty Spyrryd arryltagh.
Eisht neem's dty raaidyn y ynsaghey da ny mee‐chrauee:
as bee peccee er nyn jyndaa hoods,
Livrey mee veih loght‐folley, O Yee, uss ta Jee my lhaynt:
as nee my hengey arrane y ghoaill jeh dty chairys.
Nee uss my veillyn y osley, O Hiarn:
as nee my veeal soilshaghey magh dty voylley.
Son cha vel oo shirrey oural, nonney yinnin dhyt eh:
cha vel taitnys ayd ayns chebballyn‐losht.
Ta ourallyn Yee spyrryd seaghnit:
cree brisht as arryssagh, O Yee, cha soie uss beg jeh.
O bee uss foayroil as graysoil da Sion:
trog seose voallaghyn Yerusalem.
Eisht nee uss boggey 'ghoaill ayns yn oural dy chairys, ayns ourallyn‐losht as chebballyn:
eisht nee ad chebbal dew aegey er dt'altar.
CRE hon t'ou boggyssagh jeed hene, uss hranlaasagh:
dy vod oo olk y yannoo;
Fakin dy vel mieys Yee:
farraghtyn foast gagh‐laa?
Ta dty hengey soit er olkys:
as lesh breagyn t'ou giarey goll‐rish skynn-ghyere.
T'ou er ve ny s'graihee er neu‐chairys na er mieys:
as dy haggloo jeh breagyn ny smoo na jeh cairys.
Va taitnys ayd dy loayrt dy chooilley ockle oddagh assee y yannoo:
O uss hengey oalsey.
Shen‐y‐fa nee Jee oo y stroie er son dy bragh:
nee eh dty ghoaill, as dty hayrn ass dty chummal, as nee eh oo y astyrt magh ass cheer y sleih bio.
Hee yn sleih cairal shoh myrgeddin, as gow-ee ad aggle:
as nee ad craidey mysh as gearey;
Jeeagh shoh'n dooinney nagh ghow Jee son e niart:
agh hug e varrant gys e verchys vooar, as ren eh hene y niartaghey ayns e olkys.
Er my hon's, ta mee myr billey‐olive glass ayns thie Yee:
ta my hreishteil ayns myghin meiygh Yee son dy bragh as dy bragh.
Ver‐yms booise dhyt dy kinjagh son shen ny t'ou er n'yannoo:
as neem treishteil ayns dty Ennym, son shynney lesh dty nooghyn eh dy mie.
TA'N peccagh ommijagh er ghra ayns e chree:
Cha vel Jee erbee ayn.
T'adsyn er jeet dy ve feer vee‐chrauee, as dwoaiagh ayns yn olkys oc:
cha vel unnane erbee ta jannoo dy mie.
Yeeagh Jee neose veih niau er cloan gheiney:
dy akin row veg jeu yinnagh toiggal, as shirrey lurg Jee.
Agh t'ad ooilley er gholl ass y raad, t'ad ooilley cooidjagh er jeet dy ve feohdoil:
cha vel unnane myrgeddin ta jannoo dy mie, cha vel eer unnane.
Nagh vel adsyn fegooish tushtey ta gobbraghey olkys:
gee seose my phobble myr ee‐agh ad arran? cha vel ad er n'eamagh er Jee.
V'ad agglit raad nagh row oyr aggle:
son ta Jee er vrishey ny craueyn echeysyn ren soiaghey ort; t'ou er choyrt ad gys nearey, son dy vel Jee er hoiaghey beg jeu.
Oh, dy jinnagh Jee saualtys da Israel magh ass Sion:
Oh, dy jinnagh y Chiarn e phobble y livrey magh ass cappeeys!
Eisht yinnagh Jacob boggey 'ghoaill:
as veagh Israel feer ghennal.
SAUE mee, O Yee, er graih dty Ennym:
as gow my phaart ayns dty niart.
Cur clashtyn da my phadjer, O Yee:
as eaisht rish goan my veeal.
Son ta joarreeyn er n'irree seose m'oi:
as ta tranlaasee nagh vel Jee oc roish nyn sooillyn shirrey lurg my vioys.
Cur‐my‐ner, she Jee m'er‐coonee:
ta'n Chiarn mâroosyn ta cummal seose my annym.
Cooilleenee eshyn olk da my noidyn:
jean adsyn y stroie ayns dty ynrickys.
Oural dy chree arryltagh ver‐ym dhyt, as dty Ennym y voylley, O Hiarn:
son dy vel eh cha gerjoilagh.
Son t'eh er my livrey ass ooilley my heaghyn:
as ta my hooill er vakin e yeearree er my noidyn.
CLASHT rish my phadjer, O Yee:
as ny follee oo hene veih my accan.
Gow tastey jeem, as eaisht rhym:
kys ta mee gaccan ayns my phadjer, as ta mee seaghnit.
Ta lheid yn yllagh er my noid, as ta ny mee‐chrauee cheet orrym cha chion:
son t'ad kiarit dy yannoo olk ennagh dou, cha goanlyssagh shen t'ad soit m'oi.
Ta my chree anveagh cheu‐sthie jeem:
as ta aggle y vaaish er duittym orrym.
Ta aggle as creau er jeet orrym:
as ta atchim seaghnagh er my hilgey harrish.
As dooyrt mee, O dy beagh aym skianyn myr t'ec calmane:
son eisht etlin ersooyl, as veign ec fea.
Cur‐my‐ner, yinnin eisht cosney roym foddey jeh:
as fuirraght ayns yn aasagh.
Yinnin siyr dy scapail:
kyndagh rish y gheay stermagh as y dorrin.
Stroie ny chengaghyn oc, O Hiarn, as cur ad noi ry‐hoi:
son ta mee er vakin neu‐chairys as streeu ayns yn ard‐valley.
Laa as oie t'ad goll mygeayrt ny vollaghyn eck; ta olkys neesht as trimshey 'sy vean eck.
Olkys t'ayn:
cha vel molteyraght as foalsaght goll ass ny straidyn oc.
Son cha nee noid foshlit t'er n'yannoo yn vee‐onnor shoh dou:
son eisht oddin v'er ymmyrkey eh.
Chamoo she fer va ayns drogh aigney dou hrog eh hene seose m'oi:
son eisht foddee dy beign er vollaghey mee hene voish;
Agh oo hene v'ayn, my heshey:
my leeideilagh, as my charrey ainjyssagh.
Ghow shin coyrle villish cooidjagh, as ren shin shooyl gys thie Yee myr caarjyn.
Lhig da baase cheet orroo dy siyragh, as lhig daue goll sheese bio ayns yn oaie:
son ta olkys ayns nyn gummallyn, as ny mast' oc.
Er my hon's, eie‐ym er Jee:
as nee'n Chiarn m'y hauail.
Fastyr, as moghrey, as ec y vun‐laa neem padjer y ghoaill, as shen dy-jeean:
as clynnee eh my choraa.
She eshyn ta er livrey my annym ayns shee, veih'n chaggey va m'oi:
son va ymmodee mârym.
Dy jarroo, Jee hene, ta farraghtyn dy bragh, nee m'y chlashtyn, as ver lesh adsyn sheese:
son cha jean ad chyndaa, ny goaill aggle roish Jee.
Chur eh e laueyn orroosyn va ayns shee rish:
as vrish eh e chonaant.
Va goan e veeal ny s'buiggey na eeym, as caggey ayns e chree:
va e ghoan ny shliawney na ooil, as foast t'ad cliwenyn hene.
O tilg dty errey er y Chiarn as nee eh dty chummal seose:
as cha lhig eh da'n fer‐cairagh tuittym son dy bragh.
Agh er nyn son ocsyn:
ver uss lhiat ad, O Yee, ayns yn ooig dy hoyrt-mow.
Cha bee ny deiney folley as molteyragh bio yn derrey lieh jeh nyn laghyn:
agh bee my hreishteil aynyds, O Hiarn.
BEE myghinagh dooys, O Yee, son ta dooinney shirrey dy my stroie:
t'eh gagh‐laa caggey as dy my heaghney.
Ta my noidyn gagh‐laa goaill ayns laue dy my lhuggey seose:
son t'adsyn ymmodee ta caggey m'oi, O uss smoo Syrjey.
Ny‐yeih, ga dy vel aggle orrym ny cheayrtyn:
foast ta mee coyrt my hreishteil aynyds.
Ver‐yms moylley da Jee son e ghoo:
ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil ayns Jee, as cha goym aggle cre oddys dooinney y yannoo rhym.
T'ad gagh‐laa goaill my ghoan marran:
ooilley ny t'ad smooinaghtyn er te dy yannoo olk dou.
T'ad ooilley lhiantyn rycheilley, as freayll ad hene dy follit:
as cur tastey da my chesmadyn, tra t'ad lhie farkiaght son my annym.
Jed ad gyn kerraghey son nyn olkys:
nee uss, O Yee, ayns dty yymmoose ad y hilgey sheese.
T'ou freayll coontey jeh my imman veih boayl dy boayl; cur my yheir ayns dty voteil:
nagh vel ny reddyn shoh scruit ayns dty lioar?
Cre‐erbee yn traa ta mee geamagh ort, eisht bee my noidyn eebrit ersooyl:
shoh ta fys aym er; son ta Jee er my heu.
Ayns goo Yee goym boggey:
ayns goo yn Chiarn neem mee hene y gherjaghey.
Dy jarroo ayns Jee ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil:
cha goym aggle cre oddys dooinney y yannoo rhym.
Dhyts, O Yee, eeck‐ym my vreearaghyn:
dhyts ver‐ym booise.
Son t'ou er livrey m'annym veih baase, as my chassyn veih tuittym:
dy voddym gimmeeaght kiongoyrt rish Jee ayns soilshey yn sleih bio.
BEE myghinagh dooys, O Yee, bee myghinagh dou, son ta m'annym treishteil aynyd:
as fo scaa dty skianyn vees my chemmyrk derrey vees y tranlaase shoh er n'gholl shagh‐ym.
Neem geam gys y Jee smoo ard:
dy jarroo gys y Jee nee yn chooish t'aym ayns laue y chooilleeney.
Ver eh cooney hym veih niau:
as sauee eh mee veih yn scammylt echeysyn baillish mee y stroie.
Ver Jee magh e vyghin as e ynrickys:
ta m'annym mastey lionyn.
As ta mee my lhie dy jarroo mastey cloan gheiney, ta soit er aile:
nyn veeacklyn t'ad shleiyghyn as sideyn, as nyn jengey ny chliwe gyere.
Soie oo hene seose, O Yee, erskyn ny niaughyn:
as dty ghloyr erskyn ooilley yn seihll.
T'ad er hoiaghey lieen son my chassyn, as er hionney sheese my annym:
t'ad er chleiy jeeg roym as ad hene er duittym ayns y vean echey.
Ta my chree soit er, O Yee, ta my chree soit er:
goym arrane, as ver‐ym moylley.
Dooisht seose, my ghloyr; dooisht lute as chlaasagh:
dooisht‐yms mee-hene feer voghey.
Ver‐yms booise dhyts, O Hiarn mastey'n pobble:
as goym arrane hoods mastey ny ashoonyn.
Son ta mooads dty vyghin roshtyn gys ny niaughyn:
as dty irriney gys ny bodjallyn.
Soie oo hene seose, O Yee, erskyn ny niaughyn:
as dty ghloyr erskyn ooilley yn seihll.
VEL nyn aignaghyn soit er cairys O shiuish phobble:
as vel shiu briwnys shen ta cairagh, O shiuish cloan gheiney?
Dy jarroo ta shiu smooinaghtyn er olkys ayns nyn gree er y thalloo:
as ta ny laueyn eu dellal rish mee‐chraueeaght.
Ta ny mee‐chrauee frourtagh, dy jarroo veih brein nyn mayrey:
cha leah as t'ad er nyn ruggey, t'ad goll er‐shaghryn, as loayrt breagyn.
T'ad cha nieunagh as pyshoon ard‐nieu:
dy jarroo myr yn adder bouyr ta dooney ny cleayshyn eck;
Ta gobbal dy eaishtagh rish bingys y chiaulleyder:
lhig e haase‐kiaullee 've cha millish as sallish.
Brish ny feeacklyn oc, O Yee, ayns nyn meeal; bwoaill craueyn‐keeil ny lionyn, O Hiarn:
lhig daue tuittym ersooyl myr ushtey ta roie dy tappee; as tra t'ad lhiggey nyn sideyn, lhig daue ve astyrit ass ny fraueyn.
Lhig daue lheie ersooyl myr crammag, as ve goll‐rish mess ben ta er jeet roish y traa:
as ny lhig daue fakin y ghrian.
Ny roish ta ny pooiyt eu er ny hiow lesh drineyn:
myr shen lhig da jymmoose eh y heaghney myr red ta'n vio rish.
Gow‐ee yn dooinney cairagh boggey tra hee eh yn kerraghey:
nee eh e chesmadyn y niee ayns fuill ny mee‐chrauee.
Myr shen dy jir dooinney, Dy firrinagh ta leagh gour y sleih cairagh:
gyn dooyt ta Jee ayn ta briwnys y theihll.
LIVREY mee veih my noidyn, O Yee:
jean m'y endeil vouesyn ta girree‐magh m'oi.
O livrey mee veih ny drogh‐yantee:
as saue mee veih ny deiney ta paagh lurg fuill.
Son cur‐my‐ner, t'ad lhie farkiaght son my vioys:
ta ny deiney niartal er nyn jaglym m'oi, fegooish foill ny aggair erbee voym's, O Hiarn.
T'ad roie as jannoo ad hene aarloo fegooish foill erbee aynyms:
trog ort er‐y‐fa shen dy chooney lhiam, as cur‐my‐ner.
Shass seose, O Hiarn Yee dy heshaght‐chaggee flaunys, uss Yee Israel, dy ghoaill kerraghey er ooilley ny ashoonyn:
as ny bee myghinagh dauesyn ta ass olkys goanlyssagh jannoo aggair.
T'ad goll noon as noal 'syn astyr:
t'ad grindee myr moddey, as roie mygeayrt trooid yn ard‐valley.
Cur‐my‐ner, t'ad loayrt lesh nyn meeal, as ta cliwenyn ayns nyn meillyn:
son quoi ta clashtyn?
Bee ad, O Hiarn, ayds ayns faghid:
as nee oo garaghtee er ooilley ny ashoonyn‐quaagh gys craid.
My niart goym rish dy nee voids te:
son uss yn Jee dy my chemmyrk.
Ta Jee jeeaghyn dou e vieys dy palchey:
as lhiggee Jee dou my yeearree y akin er my noidyn.
Ny marr ad, er‐aggle dy jarrood my phobble eh:
agh skeayl ad dy lhean mastey yn pobble, as cur sheese ad, O Hiarn, nyn vendeilagh.
Kyndagh rish peccah nyn meeal, as goan nyn meillyn, bee ad goit ayns y voyrn oc hene:
as cre'n‐oyr? ta'n ghlare oc jeant jeh gweeaghyn as breagyn.
Cur mow ad ayns dty chorree, cur mow ad, dy vod ad cherraghtyn:
as toiggal dy nee Jee ta reill ayns Jacob as gys king y theihll.
As ayns yn astyr nee ad chyndaa reesht:
grindee myr moddey, as hed ad mygeayrt yn ard‐valley.
Roie‐ee ad noon as noal son bee:
as gow‐ee ad dy olk rish, mannagh bee ad jeant magh.
Er my hon's, goym arrane jeh dty phooar, as neem dty vyghin y voylley dy leah 'sy voghrey:
son t'ou uss er ve my choadey as my chemmyrk ayns laa my heaghyn.
Hoods, O my niart, goym arrane:
son t'ou uss, O Yee, my chemmyrk, as my Yee vyghinagh.
O YEE t'ou er hilgey shin magh, as er skeayley shin dy lhean:
t'ou myrgeddin er ve jymmoosagh rooin; O chyndaa hooinyn reesht.
T'ou er ghleashaght y cheer, as er scarrey eh:
slaanee ny chingyn echey, son te craa.
T'ou er yeeaghyn da dty phobble reddyn trimshagh:
t'ou er choyrt dooin jough feeyney baasoil.
T'ou er choyrt cowrey da nyn lheid as ta goaill aggle royd:
dy vod ad boggyssagh er coontey yn irriney.
Shen‐y‐fa va'n vooinjer bynney lhiat er nyn livrey:
cooin lhiam lesh dty laue yesh, as clasht rhym.
Ta Jee er loayrt ayns e chasherickys, Neem boggey ghoaill as rheynn‐ym Sichem:
as towse‐ym magh coan Succoth.
Ta Gilead lhiam's, as lhiam's Manasses:
ta Ephraim myrgeddin niart my chione:
she Juda ta coyrt my leigh.
Moab my haagh‐nieeaghyn, shooill‐ym harrish Edom:
Philistia, gow uss boggey jeem.
Quoi nee m'y leeideil ayns yn ard‐valley lajer:
quoi ver lesh mee stiagh gys Edom?
Nagh vel uss er hilgey magh shin, O Yee:
Nagh jean uss, O Yee, goll magh marish ny sheshaghtyn‐caggee ain?
O bee uss nyn gooney ayns seaghyn:
son s'fardalagh ta cooney dooinney.
Trooid Jee nee mayd obbraghyn mooarey:
son she eshyn stampys sheese nyn noidyn.
CLASHT rish my eam, O Yee:
eaisht rish my phadjer.
Veih king y theihll neem geamagh ort:
tra ta my chree ayns trimshey.
O soie mee seose er y chreg ta ny syrjey na mee:
son t'ou er ve my hreishteil, as toor lajer dooys noi yn noid.
Neem cummal ayns dty chabbane‐agglish son dy bragh:
as bee my hreishteil fo scaa dty skianyn.
Son t'ou uss, O Hiarn, er chlashtyn my yeearreeyn:
as er choyrt eiraght dauesyn ta goaill aggle roish dt'Ennym.
Ver oo da'n ree bea liauyr:
dy vod e vleeantyn farraghtyn trooid magh dy chooilley heeloghe.
Nee eh baghey fenish Yee son dy bragh:
O kiare dty vyghin ghraihagh as dt'irriney, dy vod ad eh y choadey.
Myr shen goym dy-kinjagh arrane‐moyllee gys dt'Ennym:
dy voddym gagh‐laa my vreearaghyn y chooilleeney.
TA m'annym dy firrinagh farkiaght dy kinjagh er Jee:
son veihsyn ta my haualtys.
Eshyn dy feer my niart as my haualtys:
eshyn my endeil, myr shen nagh bee my lhieggey mooar.
Caid smooinys shiu er olk noi dy chooilley ghooinney:
hed shiu er stroie ooilley yn sorch eu; dy jarroo, myr voalley ta aarloo dy huittym vees shiu, as myr cleiy brisht.
Ta'n smooinaghtyn croutagh oc ny‐lomarcan kys dy chur eshyn sheese baillish Jee y hoiaghey seose:
t'ad goaill taitnys ayns breagyn; t'ad cur goan mie lesh nyn meeal, agh gweeaghyn ayns nyn gree.
Ny‐yeih, m'annym, farkee uss dy kinjagh er Jee:
son ta my hreishteil aynsyn.
Eshyn dy firrinagh my niart as my haualtys:
eshyn my endeilagh, myr shen nagh duittym.
Ayns Jee ta my lhaynt as my ghloyr:
creg my niart, as ayns Jee ta my hreishteil.
O cur‐jee nyn marrant er dy kinjagh, shiuish phobble:
deayrt‐jee magh nyn greeaghyn kiongoyrt rish; son ta Jee nyn dreishteil.
Er son cloan gheiney, cha vel ad agh fardail:
ta cloan gheiney molteyragh er ny meihaghyn, t'ad ooilley cooidjagh ny s'eddrym na fardailys hene.
O ny treisht‐jee ayns aggair as roosteyrys; ny cur‐jee shiu hene seose gys molteyrys; my ta berchys bishaghey, ny soie‐jee nyn gree orroo.
Loayr Jee un cheayrt, as daa cheayrt ta mish er chlashtyn y lheid cheddin:
dy vel pooar bentyn gys Jee:
As dy vel uss, Hiarn, myghinagh:
son t'ou cooilleeney dy chooilley ghooinney cordail rish e obbyr.
O YEE, uss my Yee:
dy moghey neem dty hirrey.
Ta m'annym paagh er dty hon, ta m'eill myrgeddin goaill foddeeaght dty yei:
ayns thalloo gennish as chirrym raad nagh vel veg yn ushtey.
Myr shoh ta mee er yeeaghyn er dty hon ayns casherickys:
dy voddin dty phooar as dty ghloyr y akin.
Son ta dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh ny share na'n vioys hene:
nee my veillyn oo y voylley.
Choud's vee'm bio ver‐ym ard‐voylley dhyt er yn aght shoh:
as trog‐ym seose my laueyn ayns dty Ennym.
Bee m'annym er ny yannoo magh, dy jarroo myr dy beagh eh lesh smuirr as meeaylys:
tra ta my veeal dy dty voylley lesh meillyn gerjoil.
Nagh vel mee er chooinaghtyn orts ayns my lhiabbee:
as er smooinaghtyn ort tra va mee doostey?
Er‐yn‐oyr dy vel oo er ve m'er‐coonee:
shen‐y‐fa fo scaa dty skianyn goym boggey.
Ta my annym lhiantyn hoods:
ta dty laue yesh er my chummal seose.
Ad shoh myrgeddin ta shirrey aggair m'annym:
hed ad fo'n thalloo.
Lhig daue tuittym er foyr y chliwe:
dy vod ad ve son beagney da shynnee.
Agh gow‐ee yn Ree boggey ayns Jee; adsyn ooilley myrgeddin ta loo biallys dasyn, vees er nyn moylley:
son bee yn beeal ocsyn ta loayrt breagyn er ny yeigh.
CLASHT rish my choraa, O Yee, ayns my phadjer:
freill my vioys veih aggle y noid.
Follee mee veih chaglym cooidjagh ny mee‐viallee:
as veih irree‐magh ny drogh yantee;
T'er shlieeu nyn jengey myr cliwe:
as ta lhiggey nyn sideyn, dy jarroo goan sharroo;
Dy vod ad dy follit lhiggey ersyn ta firrinagh:
t'ad dy woalley eh doaltattym, as cha vel aggle orroo.
T'ad jannoo ad hene daaney ayns olkys:
as cur nyn goyrle dy cheilley, kys oddys ad ribbaghyn y hoiaghey; as gra, nagh vaik dooinney erbee ad.
T'ad smooinaghtyn dy dowin er olkys, as dy chliaghtey eh:
shen t'ad dy reayll follit eddyr ad hene, dy chooilley ghooinney ayns diunid e chree.
Agh nee Jee lhiggey doaltattym orroo lesh side:
dy bee ad dy leah lhottit.
Dy feer, ver nyn jengaghyn hene orroo tuittym:
ayns wheesh as dy jean adsyn ta fakin ad, garaghtee as craid y yannoo jeu.
As jir dy chooilley ghooinney hee eh, She Jee t'er n'yannoo shoh:
son ver ad tastey dy nee eh yn obbyr echeysyn.
Gowee yn dooinney cairagh boggey ayns y Chiarn, as ver eh e hreishteil ayn:
as nee adsyn ooilley ta firrinagh ayns cree, boggey ghoaill.
T'OU uss, O Yee, er ny voylley ayns Sion:
as dhyts vees y breearrey er ny chooilleeney ayns Jerusalem.
Uss ta clashtyn y phadjer:
hoods nee dy chooilley eill cheet.
Ta my ghrogh‐yannoo geddyn y varriaght orrym:
O bee uss myghinagh da nyn beccaghyn.
Bannit ta'n dooinney t'ou uss dy reih, as dy ghoaill hood hene:
nee eh baghey ayns dty chooyrt, as bee eh jeant magh lesh eunyssyn dty hie, dy jarroo dy dty hiamble casherick.
Nee oo jeeaghyn dooin reddyn yindyssagh ayns dty chairys, O Yee nyn Saualtys:
uss ta sauchys ooilley king y theihll, as dauesyn ta cummal er y faarkey lhean.
Ta ayns e niart soiaghey ny sleityn dy shickyr:
as t'er ny choamrey lesh pooar.
Ta kuinaghey sterrym ny marrey:
as feiyr ny tonnyn echey, as mee‐reilltys y phobble.
Adsyn myrgeddin ta baghey ayns ny ayrnyn sodjey magh jeh'n seihll, vees agglagh roish dty chowraghyn:
uss ta cur er immeeaght (
T'ou jeeaghyn er y thalloo, as dy vannaghey eh:
t'ou jannoo eh feer vessoil.
Ta awin Yee lane dy ushtey:
t'ou cur er yn arroo oc bishaghey; son myr shoh t'ou kiarail son y seihll.
T'ou gushtaghey ny creaghyn eck, t'ou cur fliaghey neose er ny coanyn beggey eck:
t'ou boggaghey ee lesh ny bineyn dy 'liaghey, as bannaghey yn mess eck.
T'ou coamrey yn vlein lesh dty vieys:
as ta dty vodjallyn shilley neose meeaylys.
Nee ad shilley neose er cummallyn yn aasagh,
as gowee ny croink veggey boggey er dagh cheu.
Bee ny bwoailtchyn lane dy chirree:
nee ny coanyn myrgeddin shassoo cha chiu lesh arroo, dy jean ad gearrey as goaill arrane.
OBEE‐JEE gerjoil ayns Jee, ooilley shiuish cheeraghyn:
gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee gys onnor e Ennym; cur‐jee er e voylley dy ve gloyroil.
Abbyr‐jee rish Jee, O cre cha yindyssagh as t'ou ayns dty obbraghyn:
trooid mooads dty phooar vees dty noidyn er nyn gheddyn nyn mreageryn ayns dty enish.
Son nee ooilley yn seihll ooashley chur dhyt:
goaill arrane jeed, as moylley dty Ennym.
O tar‐jee ayns shoh, as cur‐jee tastey da obbraghyn Yee:
cre cha-yindyssagh as t'eh ayns e yannoo gys cloan gheiney!
Hyndaa eh yn faarkey gys thalloo chirrym:
myr shen dy jagh ad trooid yn ushtey rish nyn gosh:
ayns shen ghow shin boggey jeh.
T'eh reill lesh e phooar son dy bragh; ta e hooillyn cur tastey da'n pobble:
as ny lheid as nagh jean credjal, cha bee abyl ad hene y hoiaghey seose.
O cur‐jee moylley da'n Jee ain, shiuish phobble:
as cur‐jee er coraa e voylley dy ve er ny chlashtyn;
Ta freayll yn annym ain ayns bioys:
as nagh vel lhiggey da nyn gassyn dy skyrraghtyn,
Son t'ou uss, O Yee, er phrowal shin:
t'ou myrgeddin er hrial shin, myr ta argid er ny hrial.
Hug oo lhiat shiu ayns y ribbey:
as hug oo seaghyn er nyn meeghyn:
Lhig oo da deiney dy varkiagh harrish nyn ghing:
hie shin trooid aile as ushtey, as hug oo lhiat shin magh gys ynnyd verchagh.
Hem stiagh gys dty hie lesh chebballyn‐losht:
as eeckym dhyt my vreearaghyn, ghiall mee lesh my veillyn, as loayr mee lesh my veeal, tra va mee ayns seaghyn.
Cheb‐yms dhyt ourallyn‐losht roauyrey, marish oural millish reaghyn:
cheb‐ym dew as goair.
O tar‐jee ayns shoh, as eaisht‐jee, ooilley shiuish ta goaill aggle roish Jee:
as inshym diu cre t'eh er n'yannoo son m'annym.
Deie mee er lesh my veeal:
as hug mee moylley da lesh my hengey.
My ta my chree goaill taitnys ayns mee‐chairys:
cha jean y Chiarn m'y chlashtyn.
Agh ta Jee er my chlashtyn:
as er choyrt tastey da coraa my phadjer.
Moylley dy row gys Jee, nagh vel er hoiaghey beg jeh my phadjer:
ny er hyndaa e vyghin voym.
DY row Jee myghinagh dooin, as dy bannee eh shin:
as soilshey e eddin y yeeaghyn dooin, as dy row eh myghinagh dooin.
Dy vod enney v'er ny choyrt er dty raad er y thalloo:
dty haualtys anmey mastey dy chooilley ashoon.
Lhig da'n pobble uss y voylley, O Yee:
dy jarroo lhig da ooilley'n pobble moylley 'choyrt dhyt.
O lhig da ny ashoonyn boggey ghoaill as ve gennal:
son nee uss y pobble y vriwnys dy cairal, as ny ashoonyn y reill er y thalloo.
Lhig da'n pobble uss y voylley, O Yee:
dy jarroo lhig da ooilley'n pobble moylley choyrt dhyt.
Eisht nee'n thalloo cur magh e bishaghey:
as nee Jee, dy jarroo yn Jee ain, e vannaght y choyrt dooin.
Nee Jee shin y vannaghey:
as nee dy chooilley ard jeh'n seihll aggle y ghoaill roish.
LHIG da Jee girree seose, as lhig da e noidyn v'er nyn skeayley:
lhig dauesyn myrgeddin ta dwoaie oc er, roie er-chea roishyn.
Myr ta'n jaagh goll ass nyn shilley, myr shen nee oo gimman ad ersooyl:
as myr ta kere lheie rish yn aile, myr shen lhig da'n vee‐chrauee cherraghtyn ec kionfenish Yee.
Agh lhig da'n vooinjer chairagh ve gerjoil, as boggey 'ghoaill kiongoyrt rish Jee:
lhig daue myrgeddin ve gennal as lane dy voggey.
O gow‐jee arrane gys Jee, as arraneyn‐moyllee gys e Ennym:
cur‐jee ard‐voylley dasyn ta markiagh er ny niaughyn, myr er, cabbyl:
cur‐jee moylley da ayns e Ennym Jah, as gow‐jee boggey kiongoyrt rish.
Eshyn Ayr yn chloan gyn ayr, ta fendeil cooish ny mraane treoghe:
dy jarroo Jee ayns e ynnyd‐vaghee casherick.
Eshyn y Jee ta cur er deiney dy ve jeh un aigney ayns thie, as ta cur lesh ny pryssoonee magh ass cappeeys:
agh lhiggey da ny wagaantee tannaghtyn ayns genney.
O Yee, tra hie uss magh roish y pobble:
tra hie oo roue trooid yn aasagh.
Chrie yn thalloo, as ren ny niaughyn shilley ec kionfenish Yee:
myr va Sinai myrgeddin er ny chraa ec fenish Yee, eh ta Jee Israel.
Hug uss, O Yee, fliaghey graysoil er dty eiraght:
as dooiree oo eh tra ve tooillit.
Nee dty hioltane cummal ayn:
son t'ou uss, O Yee, jeh dty vieys er chiarail son ny boghtyn.
Ren y Chiarn yn fockle y choyrt:
s'mooar va sheshaght ny preachooryn.
Ren reeaghyn lesh nyn sheshaghtyn-caggee roie er‐chea, as v'ad er nyn goyrt fochosh:
as adsyn jeh'n lught‐thie rheynn ad y spooilley.
Ga dy vel shiu er ve ny lhie mastey ny pooiyt, foast vees shiu myr skianyn calmane:
ta coodit lesh skianyn argid, as ny fedjagyn eck goll‐rish airh.
Tra ren yn Ooilley‐niartal reeaghyn y skeayley er y choontey ocsyn:
eisht v'ad cha gial as sniaghtey ayns Salmon.
Myr ta cronk Vasan, myr shen ta cronk Yee:
dy jarroo cronk ard, myr cronk Vasan.
Cre'n‐fa ta shiu lheim myr shen, shiuish chroink ard? shoh cronk Yee, ayn s'gooidsave lesh dy chummal:
dy jarroo, nee yn Chiarn tannaghtyn ayn son dy bragh.
Ta fainee Yee feed thousane, dy jarroo thousaneyn dy ainleyn:
as ta'n Chiarn ny mast' oc, myr ayns ynnyd casherick Sinai.
T'ou er n'gholl seose er yn yrjid, t'ou er leeideil cappeeys ayns bondiaght, as er gheddyn giootyn son deiney:
dy jarroo, son dty eer noidyn, dy voddagh y Chiarn Jee cummal ny mast' oc.
Moylley dy row gys y Chiarn gagh‐laa:
dy jarroo yn Jee ta cooney lhien, as deayrtey e hoyrtyssyn orrin.
Eshyn y Jee ain, dy jarroo yn Jee veih ta cheet nyn saualtys:
Jee yn Chiarn, liorish ta shin shaghney baase.
Nee Jee broo kione e noidyn:
as claigin renaigagh lheid y fer as ta goll kinjagh er e hoshiaght ayns e vee‐chraueeaght.
Ta'n Chiarn er ghra, Ver‐yms lhiam my phobble reesht, myr ren mee veih Basan:
my vooinjer hene ver‐ym lhiam reesht myr ren mee keayrt dy row veih diunid ny marrey;
Dy vod dty chass ve er ny hummey ayns fuill dty noidyn:
as dy vod chengey dty voddee ve jiarg lesh yn uill cheddin.
S'mie te ry akin, O Yee, kys t'ou uss gimmeeaght:
kys t'ou uss, my Yee as Ree, gimmeeaght ayns yn ynnyd casherick.
Ta adsyn ta goaill arraneyn shooyll hoshiaght, adsyn ta jannoo bingys er grein-yn-kiaull cheet nyn‐yei:
ayns y vean ta ny mraane‐aegey cloie er ny timbrelyn.
Cur booise, O Israel, da Jee yn Chiarn ayns y chaglym cooidjagh:
veih grunt y chree.
Ayns shen ta Benjamin beg nyn ver‐reill, as princeyn Yuda nyn vir‐choyrlee:
princeyn Zabulon, as princeyn Naphthali.
Ta dty Yee er choyrt magh niart er dty hon's:
jean y red y hickyraghey, O Yee, t'ou er n'obbraghey aynin.
Son graih dty hiamble ec Jerusalem:
myr shen ver reeaghyn lhieu giootyn hoods.
Tra vees sheshaght ny deiney shleiy, as earrooyn ny deiney niartal er nyn skeayley dy lhean (mastey feieys y phobble,) myr shen dy vel ad dy imlee cur lhieu peeshyn dy argid:
as tra t'eh er skeayley yn pobble ta goaill taitnys ayns caggey:
Eisht hig ny princeyn magh ass Egypt:
nee cheer ny Morianee dy leah ny laueyn eck y heeyney magh gys Jee.
Gow‐jee arrane gys Jee, O shiuish reeriaghtyn yn ooir:
O Gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee gys y Chiarn.
Ta ny hoie ayns ny niaughyn erskyn ooilley er dyn toshiaght:
cur‐my‐ner, t'eh cur magh e choraa, dy jarroo, as shen coraa niartal.
Gow‐jee rish dy nee ec Jee ta'n phooar harrish Israel:
ta e ooashley as e niart ayns ny bodjallyn.
O Yee, yindyssagh t'ou uss ayns dty ynnydyn casherick:
dy jarroo yn Jee dy Israel; ver eshyn niart as pooar da e phobble; bannit dy row Jee.
SAUE mee, O Yee:
son ta ny ushtaghyn er jeet stiagh, dy jarroo gys my annym.
Ta mee cummit shickyr ayns y laagh ghowin, raad nagh vel grunt erbee:
ta mee er jeet ayns ushtaghyn dowiney, myr shen dy vel ny thooillaghyn roie harrym.
Ta mee skee lesh geamagh; ta my scoarnagh chirrym:
ta my hoilshey dy my ailleil son farkiaght choud er my Yee.
Adsyn ta dwoaie oc orrym gyn-oyr, t'ad ny sliee na renaigyn my ching:
adsyn ta my noidyn, as bailliu mish ta neu‐chyndagh y stroie, t'ad niartal.
Deeck mee daue my reddyn nagh ren mee rieau y ghoaill:
Yee, ta fys ayd er my ônid, as cha vel my oiljyn keillit void's.
Ny lhig dauesyn ta treishteil aynyds, O Hiarn Yee dy heshaghtyn‐caggee, ve er nyn naaraghey son y chooish ayms:
ny lhig dauesyn ta dy dty hirrey, v'er nyn goyrt mow my hrooid's, O Hiarn Yee dy Israel.
As cre'n‐oyr? er y choontey ayds ta mee er hurranse oghsan:
ta nearey er choodaghey my eddin.
Ta mee myr dooinney joarree da my vraaraghyn:
dy jarroo myr fer quaagh da cloan my vayrey.
Son ta'n graih jeean t'aym da dty hie dy jarroo er ghuinney mee gys y chree:
as ta ny oghsanyn ocsyn hug scammylt dhyts, er duittym orrym's.
Ren mee dobberan as smaghtaghey mee hene lesh trostey:
as va shen er ny hyndaa gys my scammylt.
Hug mee orrym aanrit sack myrgeddin:
as ren ad craidey moo'm.
T'adsyn ta soie 'sy ghiat loayrt m'oi:
as ta'n vooinjer veshtal jannoo ronneeaght orrym.
Agh Hiarn, ta mee jannoo my phadjer hoods:
ayns traa nee oo soiaghey jeh.
Clasht rhym, O Yee, ayns earroo dty vyghin:
dy jarroo ayns firrinys dty haualtys.
Gow mee ass y laagh, nagh jem fo:
O lhig dou ve er my livrey vouesyn ta feoh oc orrym, as ass ny ushtaghyn dowin.
Ny lhig da ny thooillaghyn ushtey mee y vaih, chamoo lhig da'n diunid mee y lhuggey seose:
as ny lhig da'n ooig e beeal y yeigh orrym.
Clasht rhym, O Hiarn, son ta dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh gerjoilagh:
chyndaa uss hym's cordail rish earroo dty vyghinyn.
As ny follee dty eddin veih dty harvaant, son ta mee ayns seaghyn:
O jean siyr, as clasht rhym.
Tayrn er‐gerrey gys my annym, as saue eh:
O livrey mee, kyndagh rish my noidyn.
T'ou uss er hoiggal my oghsan, my nearey, as my vee‐onnor:
ta my noidyn ooilley ayns dty hilley.
Ta dty oghsan er vrishey my chree, ta mee lane dy hrimshey:
yeeagh mee son fer ennagh dy ghoaill chymmey orrym, agh cha row dooinney erbee; chamoo hooar mee unnane erbee dy my gherjaghey.
Hug ad dou gall dy ee:
as tra va mee paagh, hug ad dou vinegar dy iu.
Lhig da'n voayrd oc ve er ny yannoo ny ribbey dy ghoaill ad hene lesh:
as lhig da ny reddyn lhisagh y ve son y foays oc, ve dauesyn oyr tuittym.
Lhig da ny sooillyn oc ve er nyn gholley, nagh jean ad fakin:
as jean uss dy kinjagh yn dreeym oc y chroymmey sheese.
Deayrt magh dty eulys orroo:
as lhig dty yymmoose hrome ad y ghreimmey.
Lhig da'n ynnyd‐vaghee oc ve follym faase:
as gyn dooinney erbee dy chummal ayns ny cabbaneyn oc;
Son t'ad jannoo tranlaase ersyn t'ou er woalley:
as ta'n taggloo oc kys oddys ad adsyn y heaghney t'ou uss er lhottey.
Lhig daue tuittym veih un pheccah gys peccah elley:
as gyn cheet stiagh gys dty ynrickys.
Bee ad er ny chrossey ass lioar ny bioee:
as cha bee ad scruit mastey'n vooinjer chairagh.
Er my hon's, tra ta mee boght as ayns trimshey:
nee dty chooney, O Yee, mish y hroggal seose.
Neem Ennym Yee y voylley lesh arrane:
as ver‐ym ard‐voylley da lesh toyrt‐booise.
Nee shoh myrgeddin yn Chiarn y wooiys:
ny share na dow lesh eairkyn as yngnyn.
Ver y vooinjer imlee tastey da shoh, as bee ad gennal:
shirjee lurg Jee, as bee yn annym eu bio.
Son ta'n Chiarn clashtyn ny boghtyn:
as cha vel eh soiaghey beg jeh e phryssoonee.
Lhig da niau as thalloo eh y voylley:
yn faarkey as ooilley ny ta gleashaght ayn.
Son nee Jee Sion y hauail, as troggee eh ard‐valjyn Yudah:
dy vod deiney baghey ayns shen, as eh y ghoaill ayns nyn gummal.
Nee sluight e harvaantyn myrgeddin y ghoaill eh ayns eiraght:
as adsyn ta graihagh er e Ennym nee ad baghey ayn.
JEAN siyr, O Yee, dy my livrey:
jean siyr dy chooney lhiam, O Hiarn.
Lhig dauesyn v'er nyn goyrt gys nearey, as er nyn gastey cooidjagh, ta shirrey lurg m'annym dy stroie eh:
lhig daue v'er nyn imman gour nyn drommey dy scammyltagh, ta wooishal olk dou.
Lhig daue son y leagh oc ve dy leah er nyn goyrt gys nearey:
ta geamagh harrym, Shen, shen.
Agh lhig dauesyn ooilley ta dy dty hirrey, ve gennal as boggoil aynyds:
as lhig dauesyn ta graihagh er dty haualtys, dy kinjagh, gra, Dy row moylley gys y Chiarn.
Er my hon's, ta mee boght as ayns treihys:
jean siyr hym, O Yee.
Uss my Er‐coonee as my Er‐kionnee:
ny lhig shaggey foddey, O Hiarn.
AYNYDS, O Hiarn, ta mee er choyrt my hreishteil; ny lhig dou dy bragh ve er my choyrt gys nearey:
agh feayshil orrym, as livrey mee ayns dty chairys; croym dty chleaysh hym, as saue mee.
Bee oo my chummal lajer, huggey oddyms kinjagh goll son sauchys:
t'ou er ghialdyn dy chooney lhiam:
son oo thie my endeilys as my chashtal.
Livrey mee, O my Yee, veih pooar ny mee‐chrauee; veih laue yn dooinney neu‐chairagh as dewil.
Son dty lurg's, O Hiarn Yee, ta mee goaill foddeeaght:
uss my hreishteil, dy jarroo veih my aegid.
Liorts ta mee er ny chummal seose neayr's ruggyr mee:
uss ren m'y ghoaill ass brein my vayrey; bee my voylley dy bragh jeeds.
Ta mee er jeet dy ve shilley agglagh da ymmodee:
agh ta my hreishteil shickyr aynyds.
O lhig da my veeal v'er ny lhieeney lesh dty voylley; dy voddym arrane y ghoaill jeh dty ghloyr as dty onnor slane lhiurid y laa.
Ny tilg mee ersooyl ayns my henn eash:
ny treig mee tra ta my niart dy m'ailleil;
Son ta my noidyn loayrt m'oi, as t'adsyn ta lhie farkiaght son my annym, coyrt nyn goyrle dy cheilley, gra; Ta Jee er hreigeil eh; eiyr‐jee er, as gow‐jee eh; son cha vel fer erbee dy livrey eh.
Ny gow foddey voym, O Yee:
my Yee, jean siyr dy chooney lhiam.
Lhig dauesyn ta noi my annym ve er nyn goyrt mow as cherraghtyn:
lhig daue ve coodit lesh nearey as mee‐ooashley ta shirrey dy yannoo aggair dou.
Agh er my hon's neem dy meen farkiaght dy kinjagh:
as moyll‐ym oo ny smoo as ny smoo.
Loayree my veeal dagh‐laa jeh dty chairys as jeh dty livreyys:
son cha nione dou yn carroo oc.
Hem magh ayns niart y Chiarn Jee:
as loayr‐ym ynrycan jeh dty chairys.
T'ou uss, O Yee, er my ynsaghey veih my aegid derrey nish:
shen‐y‐fa soilshee‐ym's magh dty obbraghyn yindyssagh.
Ny treig mee, O Yee, ayns my henn eash, tra ta my chione lheeah;
derrey ta mee er hoilshaghey dty niart da'n cheeloghe shoh, as dty phooar dauesyn ooilley ta foast ry‐hoi cheet.
Ta dty chairys, O Yee, feer ard, as s'mooar ny reddyn shen t'ou er n'yannoo:
O Yee, quoi ta dy ve er ny hoyllaghey hoods!
O cre'n seaghyn as yn arkys trome t'ou er choyrt my raad! as foast hyndaa oo as ren oo mee y ooraghey:
dy jarroo, as hug oo lhiat mee reesht veih diunid ny hooirey.
T'ou er chur lhiat mee gys onnor; as er my gherjaghey er dy chooilley heu;
Shen‐y‐fa nee'm uss as dty irriney y voylley, O Yee, cloie er greie dy vingys:
hoods goym arrane er y chlaasagh, O uss Er‐casherick dy Israel.
Bee my veillyn gannal tra ta mee goaill arrane hoods:
as myr shen-vees my annym t'ou uss er livrey.
Nee my hengey myrgeddin loayrt jeh dty chairys fey‐ny‐laa:
son t'ad er nyn goyrt mow as er nyn goyrt lhieu gys nearey, ta shirrey olk y yannoo dooys.
CUR da'n Ree dty vriwnyssyn, O Yee:
as dty chairys da mac y Ree.
Eisht nee eh dty phobble y vriwnys cordail rish cairys:
as nee eh ny boghtyn y endeil.
Ver ny sleityn myrgeddin lhieu shee:
as ny croink veggey cairys da'n pobble.
Freilee eh yn vooinjer ôney ayns nyn gair:
cloan y voght nee eh y endeil, as ny tranlaasee y cherraghey.
Gow‐ee ad aggle royd choud as ta'n ghrian as yn eayst ermayrn:
veih un heeloghe gys sheeloghe elley.
Hig eh neose myr y fliaghey ayns loamrey olley:
dy jarroo myr ny bineyn ta gushtaghey yn thalloo.
Ayns y lhing echeysyn nee yn vooinjer chairagh bishaghey:
dy jarroo, as palchey dy hee, choud as ta'n eayst farraghtyn.
Bee yn reilltys echey myrgeddin veih un aarkey gys faarkey elley:
as veih'n awin vooar gys ayrnyn sodjey yn ooir.
Adsyn ta baghey 'syn aasagh nee ad gliooney sheese kiongoyrt rish:
nee e noidyn yn joan y liee.
Reeaghyn Tharsis as ny ellanyn ver ad lhieu toyrtyssyn:
ver reeaghyn Arabia as Saba lhieu giootyn.
Nee dy chooilley ree tuittym sheese kiongoyrt rish:
nee dy chooilley ashoon eh y hirveish.
Son nee eh yn boght y livrey, tra t'eh geam:
yn ymmyrchagh neesht, as eshyn nagh vel fer‐coonee erbee echey.
Bee eh foayroil da'n vooinjer ôney as ny ymmyrchee:
as nee eh anmeenyn ny boghtyn y choadey.
Nee eh ny anmeenyn oc y livrey veih foalsaght as aggair:
as deyr vees yn uill oc ayns e hilley.
Bee eh bio, as dasyn vees er ny choyrt jeh airh Arabia:
bee padjer er ny yannoo dy-kinjagh huggey, as gagh‐laa vees moylley er ny choyrt da.
Bee palchey arroo er y thalloo, ard er ny croink:
nee yn mess echey craa myr Libanus, as bee eh glass 'syn ard‐valley myr faiyr er y thalloo.
Nee yn Ennym echey farraghtyn son dy bragh, bee yn Ennym echey er‐mayrn fo'n ghrian mastey ny sheelogheyn ta foast ry‐heet:
vees er nyn mannaghey ny hrooidsyn, as nee ooilley ny ashoonyn eh y voylley.
Bannit dy row yn Chiarn Jee, dy jarroo yn Jee dy Israel:
ta ny lomarcan jannoo reddyn yindyssagh;
As bannit dy row Ennym yn Ard‐ooashley echey son dy bragh:
as bee ooilley yn seihll er ny lhieeney lesh e Ard‐ooashley. Amen, Amen.
DY firrinagh ta Jee graihagh er Israel:
dy jarroo er nyn lheid as ta jeh cree glen.
Ny yeih, va my chassyn faggys er n'gholl voym:
va my chesmadyn er‐gerrey dy skyrraghtyn.
As cre'n‐oyr? va mee seaghnit er coontey ny mee‐chrauee:
ta mee myrgeddin fakin drogh leih ayns lheid y raah.
Son cha vel ad ayns gaue erbee jeh'n vaase; agh t'ad trean as lajer.
Cha vel ad cheet ayns drogh‐haghyrt erbee myr sleih elley:
chamoo t'ad er nyn gerraghey myr deiney elley.
As shoh yn oyr dy vel ad sheidit seose lesh moyrn:
as coodit harrish lesh dewlys.
Ta ny sooillyn oc gatt lesh riurid:
as t'ad jannoo dy jarroo myr sailliu.
T'ad mhilley sleih elley, as dy mee‐chrauee loayrt goan mollaghtagh:
ta'n ghlare oc noi yn Er‐syrjey;
Son t'ad sheeyney magh nyn meeal noi niau:
as ta'n chengey oc goll trooid y theihll.
Shen‐y‐fa ta'n pobble tuittym lhieu:
as cha nee beggan cosney t'ad dy hayrn ass shen.
Twish, t'ad gra, Kys ver Jee tastey da:
vel fyssyree ayns yn Er‐syrjey?
Jeeagh, ad shoh ny mee‐chrauee, ad shoh ta bishaghey ayns y theihll, as oc shoh ta berchys ayns nyn gummal:
as dooyrt mee, Eisht ta mish er ghlenney my chree ayns fardail, as er niee my laueyn ayns ônid.
Fey‐ny‐laa ta mee er ve er my cherraghey:
as er my smaghtaghey dy chooilley voghrey;
Dy jarroo, as va mee er loayrt faggys myr ren adsyn:
agh cur‐my‐ner, veign eisht er gheyrey sheeloghe dty cloan.
Eisht ghow mee ayns laue dy hoiggal shoh:
agh ve ro ghoillee er my hon.
Derrey hie mee stiagh ayns ynnyd casherick Yee:
eisht hoig mee jerrey ny deiney shoh;
Ta shen, Kys t'ou uss dy hoiaghey ad ayns ynnydyn shliawn:
as dy hilgey ad sheese, as dy stroie ad.
Oh, cre cha leah as t'ad goll naardey:
cherraghtyn, as cheet gys jerrey agglagh!
Dy jarroo, eer myr dreamal tra ta fer doostey:
myr shen ver oo er y chaslys oc dy lheie ersooyl ass yn ard‐valley.
Shoh myr va my chree seaghnit:
as hie eh eer trooid my veeghyn.
Cha ommijagh shen va mee, as cha mee‐hushtagh:
dy jarroo myr dy beagh eh baagh kiongoyrt rhyts.
Ny yeih, ta mee kinjagh liort's:
son t'ou er my chummal rish my laue yesh.
Nee oo m'y leeideil lesh dty choyrle:
as ny lurg m'y ghoaill gys gloyr.
Quoi t'aym ayns niau agh uss:
as cha vel unnane erbee er y thalloo ta mee dy yeearree ayns soylaghey jeeds.
Ta my eill as my chree failleil:
agh ta Jee niart my chree, as my hoghyr son dy bragh.
Son cur‐my‐ner, nee adsyn ta dy dty hreigeil, cherraghtyn:
t'ou er stroie adsyn ooilley ta kyndagh jeh maarderys dt'oi.
Agh te mie er my hon's dy chummal shickyr gys Jee, dy chur my hreishteil ayns y Chiarn Jee:
as dy loayrt jeh ooilley dty obbraghyn ayns giattyn inneen Sion.
OYEE, cre'n‐fa t'ou freayll oo hene voin choud dy hraa:
cre'n‐fa ta dty yymmoose cha cheh noi kirree dty phastyr?
O smooinee er dty phobble t'ou er chionnaghey, as er veaysley er dyn chenn earish.
Smooinee er sheeloghe dty eiraght:
as er cronk Sion, ayn t'ou er chummal.
Trog seose dty chassyn, dy vod oo dy bollagh dy chooilley noid y stroie:
t'er n'yannoo olk ayns dty ynnyd casherick.
Ta dty noidyn gyllaghey ayns mean dty haglym cooidjagh:
as soiaghey seose nyn mergaghyn son cowraghyn.
Eshyn ren fuygh y ghiarey sheese roish nish ass ny biljyn chiu:
v'eh ry‐akin dy chur lesh eh gys obbyr aalin.
Agh nish t'ad brishey sheese ooilley yn obbyr ghranit eck:
lesh teighyn as oardyn.
T'ad er hoiaghey dty ynnydyn casherick er aile:
as er lhieggal sheese ynnyd‐vaghee dty Ennym, eer gys y laare.
Dy jarroo, dooyrt ad ayns nyn greeaghyn, Lhig dooin ad y stroie dy bollagh ooilley‐cooidjagh:
myr shoh t'ad er lostey seose ooilley thieyn Yee 'sy cheer.
Cha vel shin fakin nyn gowraghyn; cha vel phadeyr er-mayrn:
cha vel unnane ta toiggal caid.
O Yee, caid nee eshyn ta dt'oi yn vee‐onnor shoh y yannoo:
caid nee yn noid loayrt dy mollaghtagh noi dty Ennym, nee son dy bragh?
Cre'n‐fa t'ou tayrn back dty laue:
kys te nagh vel oo goaill dty laue yesh ass dt'oghrish dy chur mow yn noid?
Son Jee my Ree er dyn chenn earish:
yn cooney ta jeant er y thalloo, eh hene ta dy yannoo eh.
Ren oo yn aarkey y scarrey trooid dty phooar:
vrish oo king ny dragonyn ayns ny ushtaghyn.
Woaill oo king y Leviathan ayns peeshyn:
as hug oo eh dy ve son beaghey da'n pobble ayns yn aasagh.
Hug oo lhiat farraneyn, as ushtaghyn magh ass ny creggyn creoi:
hyrmee oo seose ushtaghyn niartal.
She lhiats yn laa, as lhiats yn oie:
uss t'er phointeil yn soilshey as y ghrian.
T'ou er hoiaghey ooilley cagliaghyn ny hooirey:
t'ou er yannoo sourey as geurey.
Cooinee er shoh, O Hiarn, kys ta'n noid er oltooaney:
as kys ta'n pobble ommijagh er loayrt goan mollaghtagh noi dt'Ennym.
O ny livrey annym dty chalmane meen gys earroo ny noidyn:
as ny jarrood sheshaght ny boghtyn son dy bragh.
Jeeagh er y chonaant:
son ta ooilley yn ooir lane dy ghorraghys as dy chummallyn dewil.
O ny lhig da'n vooinjer gyn loght goll roue lesh nearey:
agh lhig da ny boghtyn as ny ymmyrchee moylley 'choyrt da dt'Ennym.
Trog, O Yee, jean dty chooish hene y chummal seose:
cooinee kys ta'n dooinney ommijagh dy dt'oltooaney dy chooilley laa.
Ny jarrood coraa dty noidyn:
ta'n daanys vooaralagh ocsyn ta feoh oc ort, gaase dy kinjagh ny smoo as ny smoo.
DHYTS, O Yee, ta shin cur booise:
dy jarroo dhyts ta shin cur booise.
Ta dt'Ennym myrgeddin cha faggys:
as shen ta dt'obbraghyn yindyssagh dy hoilshaghey.
Tra hig chaglym cooidjagh y phobble reesht ayns m'enish:
neem briwnys cordail rish cairys.
Ta'n seihll annoon, as ooilley e cummaltee:
mish ta gymmyrkey seose ny pillaryn eck.
Dooyrt mee rish ny ommydanyn, Ny jean‐jee cha keoi:
as rish y vooinjer vee‐chrauee, Ny soie‐jee seose nyn eairk;
Ny soie‐jee seose nyn eairk dy ard:
as ny loayr‐jee lesh mwannal mooaralagh;
Son cha vel stayd ard cheet veih'n niar, ny veih'n neear:
ny foast veih'n jiass.
As cre'n‐oyr? she Jee yn Briw:
t'eh cur sheese fer, as soiaghey seose fer elley.
Son ayns laue yn Chiarn ta cappan, as ta'n feeyn jiarg:
te lane as seiyt, as t'eh deayrtey ass yn chooid cheddin.
Er son y drundin echey:
nee ooilley mee‐chrauee y theihll ad y iu, as y yiole ass.
Agh loayr‐yms jeh Jee Yacob:
as neem eh y voylley son dy bragh.
Ooilley eairkyn y vooinjer vee‐chrauee myrgeddin neem's y vrishey:
as bee niart y vooinjer chairagh er ny hoiaghey seose.
AYNS Judea ta enney er ny choyrt er Jee:
ta'n Ennym echey mooar ayns Israel.
Ec Salem ta e chabbane‐agglish:
as e chummal ayns Sion.
Ayns shen vrish eh sideyn y vhow:
yn shleiy, yn cliwe, as y ghreie‐chaggee.
T'ou jeh onnor as niart smoo:
na croink ny roosteyryn.
Ta'n vooinjer voyrnagh er nyn roostey, t'ad er ghoaill nyn gadley baaish:
as ooilley ny deiney va ny laueyn oc niartal, cha vel ad er gheddyn monney.
Ec yn oghsan ayds, O Yee Yacob:
ta chammah yn ainagh as y cabbyl er duittym.
T'ou uss, dy jarroo uss as aggle dy ve er ny ghoaill royd:
as quoi oddys shassoo ayns dty hilley tra t'ou corree?
Hug oo er dty vriwnys dy ve er ny chlashtyn veih niau:
va'n ooir er‐creau, as ve ny‐host,
Tra dirree Jee gys briwnys:
as dy chooney lesh ooilley yn vooinjer imlee er y thalloo.
Nee elgys dooinney chyndaa gys dty voylley:
as yn elgys ocsyn nee uss eh y smaghtaghey.
Jean‐jee gialdyn da'n Chiarn y Jee eu, as cooilleen‐jee eh, ooilley shiuish ta mygeayrt‐y‐mysh:
cur jee lhieu giootyn huggeysyn lhisagh aggle ve goit roish,
Nee eshyn ginjillaghey spyrryd princeyn:
as t'eh yindyssagh mastey reeaghyn y thallooin.
EAM‐YM gys Jee lesh my choraa:
dy jarroo gys Jee neem geamagh lesh my choraa, as nee eh m'y chlashtyn.
Ayns traa my heaghyn hirr mee yn Chiarn:
ren my hing roie, as cha ghow eh fea fud‐ny‐hoie:
ren m'annym gerjagh y obbal.
Tra ta mee ayns trimshey, smooinee‐ym er Jee:
tra ta my chree seaghnit, neem gaccan.
T'ou cummal my hooillyn dooisht:
ta mee cha annoon nagh voddym loayrt.
Ta mee er smooinaghtyn rhym pene er laghyn y chenn earish:
as er ny bleeantyn t'er n'gholl shaghey.
Ta mee tayrn gys cooinaghtyn m'arrane:
as ayns yn oie ta mee resooney rish my chree hene, as ronsaghey magh m'annym.
Jean y Chiarn eh hene y reayll voym son dy bragh:
as nagh bee eh foayroil arragh?
Vel e vyghin dy slane er n'immeeaght son dy bragh:
as vel e yialdyn er jeet dy bollagh gys jerrey brâ?
Vel Jee er yarrood dy ve graysoil:
as jean eh dooney e chenjallys‐ghraihagh ayns jymmoose?
As dooyrt mee, She m'annooinid hene eh:
agh cooinee‐yms er bleeantyn laue yesh yn Er smoo syrjey.
Neem cooinaghtyn er obbraghyn y Chiarn:
as tayrnym gys my smooinaghtyn ny yindyssyn ayds ayns y chenn earish.
Neem smooinaghtyn myrgeddin er ooilley dt'obbraghyn:
as bee my haggloo jeh dty yannoo.
Dty raad, O Yee, te casherick:
quoi ch ta Jee cha niartal as y Jee ain?
Uss y Jee ta jannoo yindyssyn:
as t'er hoilshaghey dty phooar mastey'n pobble.
T'ou dy niartal er livrey dty phobble:
dy jarroo mec Yacob as Yoseph.
Honnick ny ushtaghyn oo, O Yee, honnick ny ushtaghyn oo, as v'ad agglit:
ny diunidyn myrgeddin v'ad er nyn seiy.
Gheayrt ny bodjallyn magh ushtey, ren yn aer taarnaghey:
as hie dty hideyn magh dy lhean.
Va feiyr dty haarnagh er ny chlashtyn dy chooilley raad mygeayrt:
ren dty hendreil cur soilshey er y thalloo, va'n ooir er ny ghleashaght, as ooilley er-creau.
Ta dty raad ayns yn aarkey, as dty chassanyn ayns ny ushtaghyn mooarey:
as kesmadyn dty choshey, cha vel ad er nyn gronnaghey.
Ren oo dty phobble y leeideil myr kirree:
liorish laueyn Voses as Aaron.
CLASHT‐JEE rish my leigh's, O my phobble:
croym‐jee nyn gleayshyn gys goan my veeall's.
Neem my veeal y osley ayns coraa‐dorraghey:
verym y bun diu jeh raaghyn doillee yn chenndeeaght;
Ad ta shin er chlashtyn as er hoiggal:
as lheid as ta nyn ayraghyn er n'insh dooin;
Nagh jinnagh shin ad y cheiltyn veih cloan ny sheelogheyn ta ry heet:
agh dy hoilshaghey onnor y Chiarn, ny obbraghyn niartal as yindyssagh t'eh er n'yannoo.
Ren eh conaant rish Jacob, as hug eh leigh da Israel:
shen ren eh sarey nyn shenn‐ayraghyn dy ynsaghey da nyn gloan;
Dy voddagh y sluight oc toiggal 'ghoaill jeh:
as y chloan nagh row foast er nyn ruggey;
Dy voddagh adsyn tra veagh ad er n'aase seose:
yn chooid cheddin y hoilshaghey da nyn gloan;
Dy voddagh ad nyn dreishteil y choyrt ayns Jee:
as gyn obbraghyn Yee y yarrood, agh ny annaghyn echeysyn y reayll.
As gyn ve myr nyn shenn‐ayraghyn, sheeloghe vee‐chredjuagh as mee‐viallagh:
sheeloghe nagh ren nyn gree y hoiaghey dy cairagh, as y spyrryd oc cha ren lhiantyn dy shickyr gys Jee:
Goll rish cloan Ephraim:
lurg daue ve eillit son caggey, as cur lhieu bowaghyn, hyndaa ad nyn gooyl ayns laa yn chaggey.
Cha dreill ad conaant Yee:
as cha jinnagh ad gimmeeaght ayns e leigh;
Agh yarrood ad ny v'eh er n'yannoo:
as ny obbraghyn yindyssagh v'eh er hoilshaghey er nyn son oc.
Reddyn mirrillagh ren eshyn ayns shilley ny shenn‐ayraghyn ainyn, ayns thalloo Egypt:
dy jarroo ayns magher Zoan.
Ren eh yn aarkey y scarrey, as lhig eh daue goll ny‐hrooid:
hug eh er ny ushtaghyn dy hassoo er-mooin‐y‐cheilley [
Ayns y laa neesht ren eh ad y leeideil lesh bodjal:
as fud‐ny‐hoie lesh soilshey dy aile.
Ren eh ny creggyn creoi y scoltey 'syn aasagh:
as hug eh jough daue assdoo, myr dy beagh eh ass y diunid vooar.
Hug eh lesh ushtaghyn ass y chreg chloaie:
myr shen dy vrish ad magh goll‐rish ny awinyn.
Ny‐yeih son shoh as ooilley hie ad ny sodjey er nyn doshiaght ayns peccah n'oi:
as ren ad yn Fer smoo syrjey y vrasnaghey 'syn aasagh.
Ren ad Jee y hrial ayns nyn greeaghyn:
as hirr ad bee son y thaynt oc.
Loayr ad noi Jee myrgeddin, gra:
Jean Jee boayrd y chiarail nyn gour ayns yn aasagh?
Woaill eh yn chreg chloaie dy jarroo, dy ren yn ushtey brishey magh, as dy roie eh ooilley ny strooanyn:
agh vod eh arran y choyrt myrgeddin, ny feill y chiarail cour e phobble?
Tra cheayll y Chiarn shoh, v'eh jymmoosagh:
ag myr shen va'n aile er ny oaddey ayns Jacob, as haink jymmoose trome seose noi Israel;
Er‐y‐fa nagh ren ad credjal ayns Jee:
as nagh dug ad nyn dreishteil ayns e chooney.
Myr shen ren eh ny bodjalyn heose y harey:
as doshil eh dorryssyn yn aer.
Gheayrt eh neose orroo myrgeddin frassyn dy Vanna dy ee:
as hug eh beaghey daue veih niau.
Myr shen ren dooinney bee ainleyn y ee:
son hug eh daue beaghey dy liooar.
Hug eh er y gheay niar dy heidey fo'n aer:
as trooid e phooar hug eh lesh stiagh yn gheay‐neearass.
Gheayrt eh feill neose orroo cha chin as joan:
as eeanlee skianagh myr geinnagh ny marrey.
Lhig eh da tuittym mastey ny cabbaneyn oc:
dy jarroo eer mygeayrt nyn gummallyn.
Myr shen ren ad gee, as v'ad jeant magh, son hug eh daue nyn aigney hene:
cha row ad giarit jeh nyn yeearree.
Agh choud as va'n bee foast ayns nyn meeall, haink jymmoose trome Yee orroo, as varr eh yn vooinjer by verchee jeu:
dy jarroo, as woaill eh sheese ny reih deiney va ayns Israel.
Agh son shoh as ooilley, hie ad ny sodjey er nyn doshiaght ayns peccah:
as cha chred ad ny obbraghyn yindyssagh echey.
Shen‐y‐fa ny laghyn oc hug eh shaghey ayns fardalys:
as ny bleeantyn oc ayns seaghyn.
Tra stroie eh ad, ren ad eh y hirrey:
as hyndaa ad ad‐hene dy moghey, as ren ad briaght lurg Jee.
As chooinee ad dy nee Jee va'n niart oc:
as dy row yn Jee ard nyn Ver‐kionnee.
Ny‐yeih, cha ren ad agh brynneraght rish lesh nyn meeal:
as foalsaght y yannoo rish lesh nyn jengey.
Son cha row yn cree oc slane leshyn:
chamoo ren ad tannaghtyn shickyr ayns e chonaant.
Agh v'eh cha myghinagh shen dy leih eh daue nyn voiljyn:
as cha ren eh ad y stroie.
Dy jarroo, shimmey keayrt hyndaa eh e chorree ersooyl:
as cha lhiggah eh da'n slane jymmoose echey brishey magh.
Son chooinee eh nagh row ad agh feill:
as nagh row ad agh myr geay ta goll ersooyl as nagh vel cheet reesht.
Shimmey keayrt ren ad eh y vrasnaghey 'syn aasagh:
as eh y heaghney 'sy chaitnys ghennish.
Hyndaa ad back as ren ad Jee y vrasnaghey:
as ghreinnee ad yn Er Casherick ayns Israel.
Cha smooinee ad er y laue echey:
as er y laa tra ren eh ad y livrey veih laue yn noid.
Kys v'eh er n'obbraghey e virrillyn ayns Egypt:
as e yindyssyn ayns magher Zoan.
Hyndaa eh ny ushtaghyn gys fuill:
myr shen nagh dod ad giu jeh ny awinyn.
Hug eh meeyllyn ny mast' oc, dy chur mow ad:
as froggyn dy stroie ad.
Hug eh yn vess oc da'n phraddag [
as yn laboraght oc da'n locust.
Stroie eh ny biljyn‐feeyney oc lesh claghyn‐sniaghtee:
as ny biljyn‐mulberry oc lesh y rio.
Woaill eh yn ollagh oc myrgeddin lesh claghyn‐sniaghtee:
as ny shioltaneyn oc lesh claghyn‐taarnee.
Hilg eh eulys e chorree orroo, farg, jymmoose, as seaghyn:
as hug eh magh drogh ainleyn ny‐vud oc.
Hug eh raad da e elgys, as cha ren eh yn annym oc y haghney veih baase:
agh livrey eh seose yn vioys ac gys y chramp;
As woaill eh ooilley yn chied v'er nyn ruggey ayns Egypt:
yn vooinjer b'yrjey as by‐niartal ayns cummallyn Ham.
Agh er son e phobble hene, ren eh ad y leeideil magh myr kirree:
as hug eh lesh ad 'syn aasagh myr shioltane.
Hug eh lesh ad magh dy sauchey, nagh jinnagh ad aggle y ghoaill:
as vaih eh nyn noidyn lesh yn aarkey.
As hug eh lesh ad cheu‐sthie jeh cagliaghyn e ynnyd casherick:
dy jarroo gys y chronk t'eshyn er chosney lesh e laue yesh.
Hilg eh magh ny ashoonyn‐quaagh myrgeddin kiongoyrt roo:
hug eh er y cheer oc dy ve er ny rheynn ny mast' oc son eiraght, as hug eh er sheelogheyn Israel dy chummal ayns ny cabbaneyn oc.
Myr shen vrasnee ad as hug ad jymmoose er y Jee smoo ard:
as cha dreill ad ny recortyssyn echey;
Agh hyndaa ad nyn gooyll, as huitt ad ersooyl goll rish ny shenn‐ayraghyn oc:
lheim ry‐lhiattee myr bow brisht.
Son ren ad eh y heaghney lesh nyn altaryn ayns ynnydyn ard:
as vrasnee ad eh gys jymmoose lesh ny jallooyn oc.
Tra cheayll Jee shoh, v'eh corree:
as ghow eh jymmoose trome noi Israel;
Myr shen dy hreig eh yn cabbane‐agglish ayns Silo:
dy jarroo yn cabbane v'eh er hoiaghey seose mastey deiney.
Livrey eh yn phooar oc harrish gys cappeeys:
as yn aalid oc gys laue yn noid.
Livrey eh yn pobble echey myrgeddin harrish gys y chliwe:
as v'eh jymmoosagh rish e eiraght.
Ren yn aile ny deiney aegey oc y stroie:
as cha row ny moidynyn oc er nyn goyrt ayns poosey.
Va ny saggyrtyn oc er nyn stroie lesh y chliwe:
as cha row mraane treoghe erbee dy yannoo dobberan.
Myr shen ghooisht yn Chiarn myr fer ass cadley:
as myr fowyr er ny niartaghey lesh feeyn;
Woaill eh ny noidyn echey ayns ny ayrnyn cheu‐chooylloo:
as hug eh ad gys nearey kinjagh.
Dob eh cabbane‐agglish Yoseph:
as cha ren eh reih sheeloghe Ephraim.
Agh reih eh sheeloghe Yudah:
dy jarroo cronk Sion bynney lesh.
As ayns shen hrog eh e hiamble dy ard:
as hoie eh yn undin echey, myr y thalloo t'eh er n'yannoo son eashyn.
Reih eh myrgeddin David e harvaant:
as ghow eh ersooyl eh veih ny bwoailchyn‐keyrragh;
Myr v'eh geiyrt er ny kirree trome lesh eayin, ghow eshyn eh:
dy voddagh eh bochillaght Jacob e phobble, as Israel e eiraght.
Myr shen yeeagh eh daue lesh cree ynrick as firrinagh:
as reill eh ad dy tushtagh lesh ooilley e phooar.
O YEE, ta ny ashoonyn‐quaagh er jeet stiagh ayns dty eiraght:
dty hiamble casherick t'ad er yannoo neu‐ghlen, as er yannoo Jerusalem carnane dy chlaghyn.
Kirp marroo dty harvaantyn t'ad er choyrt dy ve beaghey da eeanlee'n aer:
as feill dty nooghyn da beiyn y thallooin.
Yn uill oc t'ad er gheayrtey myr ushtey er dy chooilley heu dy Yerusalem:
as cha row dooinney erbee dy oanluckey ad.
Ta shin er jeet dy ve nearey foshlit da nyn noidyn:
eer craid as faghid dauesyn ta mygeayrt‐y‐mooin.
Hiarn, caid vees oo corree; jean dty eadolys lostey myr aile son dy bragh?
Deayrt magh dt'eulys er ny ashoonyn nagh vel er choyrt enney ort's:
as er ny reeriaghtyn nagh vel er n'eamagh er dty Ennym;
Son t'ad er choyrt mow Jacob:
as er choyrt naardey e ynnyd‐vaghee.
O ny cooinee er ny shenn pheccaghyn ain, agh jean myghin orrin, as shen dy leah:
son ta shin er jeet gys treihys vooar.
Cooin lhien, O Yee jeh nyn saualtys, son gloyr dty Ennym:
O livrey shin, as bee myghinagh da nyn beccaghyn son graih dty Ennym.
Cre'n‐fa ta ny ashoonyn‐quaagh gra:
cre vel nish yn Jee oc?
O lhig da kerraghey fuill dty harvaantyn t'er ny gheayrtey:
ve dy foshlit er ny hoilshaghey er ny ashoonyn‐quaagh 'sy chilley ain.
O lhig da osnaghyn trimshagh ny pryssoonee cheet kiongoyrt rhyt:
cordail rish mooads dty phooar, jean uss adsyn y choadey t'er nyn oardaghey gys baase;
As son ny goan-mollaghtagh lhieu ta nyn naboonyn er dty oltooaney:
jean uss ad y chooilleeney, O Hiarn, shiaght filley ayns yn oghrish oc.
Myr shen ver shinyn ta dty phobble, as kirree dty phastyr, booise dhyts son dy bragh:
as bee mayd dy kinjagh soilshaghey magh dty voylley veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
CLASHT, O uss vochilley Israel, uss ta leeideil Joseph myr keyrrey:
soilshee oo hene myrgeddin, uss ta ny hoie er ny cherubimyn.
Kiongoyrt rish Ephraim, Benjamin, as Manasses:
gleashee seose dty niart, as tar as cooin lhien.
Chyndaa shinyn reesht, O Yee:
jeeagh soilshey dty eddin, as bee mayd slane.
O Hiarn Yee dy heshaght‐chaggee flaunys:
caid vees oo corree rish dty phobble ta goaill padjer?
T'ou beaghey ad lesh yn arran dy yheir:
as coyrt daue palchey dy yheir dy iu.
T'ou uss er n'yannoo shin eer streeu da nyn naboonyn:
as ta nyn noidyn garraghtee orrin gys craid.
Chyndaa shinyn reesht, uss Yee dy heshaght‐chaggee flaunys:
jeeagh soilshey dty eddin, as bee mayd slane.
T'ou er choyrt lhiat billey‐feeyney magh ass Egypt:
t'ou er n'eiyrt magh ny ashoonyn‐quaagh, as er hoiaghey eh.
Ren oo ynnyd da:
as tra ve er ghoaill fraue, lhieen eh yn cheer.
Va ny croink er nyn goodaghey lesh y scaa echey:
as va ny banganyn echey myr ny biljyn‐cedar aalin.
Heeyn ee magh ny banglaneyn eck gys yn aarkey:
as ny banganyn eck gys yn awin.
Cre'n‐fa eisht t'ou uss er lhieggal sheese yn cleiy eck:
dy vel adsyn ooilley ta goll shaghey raipey j'ee e mess?
Ta muc feie ass y cheyll reurey seose ny fraueyn eck:
as ta maase feie yn vagher dy chur mow ee.
Chyndaa uss reesht, uss Yee yn cheshaght‐chaggee flaunyssagh, jeeagh neose veih niau:
cur‐my‐ner, as jeeagh er y villey‐feeyney shoh;
As er ynnyd y gharey‐feeyney ta dty laue yesh er hoiaghey:
as er y vanglane ren oo cha lajer er dty hon hene.
Te er ny lostey lesh aile, as giarit sheese:
as nee ad cherraghtyn ec oghsan dty eddin.
Lhig dty laue ve er dooinney dty laue yesh:
as er mac dooinney, ren oo y yannoo cha lajer er dty hon hene;
As myr shen cha jed mayd back void's:
O lhig dooin 've bio, as nee mayd geamagh er dty Ennym.
Chyndaa shin reesht, O Hiarn Yee jeh'n cheshaght‐chaggee flaunyssagh:
jeeagh soilshey dty eddin, as bee mayd er nyn sauail.
LHIG dooin arrane gennal y ghoaill gys Jee nyn niart:
jean‐jee kiaull gherjoil y yannoo gys Jee Yacob.
Gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee, lhieu‐jee ayns shoh yn tabret:
yn chlaasagh villish, as y lute.
Sheid‐jee yn cayrn dy ard ec yn eayst noa:
dy jarroo ec y traa ta pointit, as er y laa feailley casherick ain.
Son va shoh er ny yannoo ny lattys son Israel; as ny leigh liorish Jee Yacob.
Shoh doardee eh ayns Joseph son recortys:
tra haink eh magh ass cheer Egypt, as er chlashtyn glare yoarree.
Hug mee aash da ny geayltyn echey veih'n errey; as va ny laueyn echey er nyn livrey veih jannoo ny pooiyt.
Deie oo orrym ayns seaghyn, as livrey mee oo; as hug mee clashtyn dhyt tra shen huit y sterrym ort.
Phrow mee oo myrgeddin:
ec ushtaghyn y streeu.
Clasht‐jee, O my phobble, as neem's soilshaghey dhyt, O Israel:
my nee oo geaishtagh rhym's.
Cha bee Jee erbee joarree aynyds:
chamoo ver oo ooashley da Jee erbee elley.
Mish y Chiarn dty Yee, hug lhiam uss magh ass thalloo Egypt:
foshil dty veeal dy lhean, as lhieen‐ym eh.
Agh cha baillish my phobble geaishtagh rish my choraa:
as cha baillish Israel biallys y choyrt dou.
Myr shen livrey mee ad seose gys sayntyn nyn greeaghyn hene:
as lhig mee daue geiyrt er ny smooinaghtyn fardalagh oc hene.
O dy beagh my phobble er n'eaishtagh rhym's:
son dy beagh Israel er n'immeeaght ayns my raaidyn.
Veign dy leah er choyrt sheese ny noidyn oc:
as er hyndaa my laue noi ny tranlaasee oc.
Veagh adsyn va dwoaie oc er y Chiarn er ny gheddyn nyn mreageryn:
agh veagh y traa ocsyn er varraghtyn son dy bragh.
Veagh eh er veaghey ad myrgeddin lesh y flooyr curnaght s'glenney:
as lesh mill ass y chreg chloaie veign er dty yannoo magh.
TA Jee shassoo ayns chaglym‐cooidjagh ny princeyn:
t'eshyn briw mastey Jeeghyn (
Caid ver shiu briwnys aggairagh:
as soiaghey jeh persoonyn ny mee‐chrauee?
Jean‐jee ny boghtyn as y chloan gyn ayr y endeil:
jeeagh‐jee dy vow adsyn cairys ta ayns feme as ymmyrch.
Livrey‐jee yn vooinjer ta treigit as ny boghtyn:
saue‐jee ad veih laue ny mee‐chrauee.
Cha nailliu 've ynsit, chamoo nee ad toiggal y ghoaill, agh goll er nyn doshiaght kinjagh ayns dorraghys:
ta ooilley undinyn y thallooin ass nyn goorse.
Dooyrt mee, She Jeeghyn shiu:
as ta shiu ooilley nyn gloan jeh'n Er smoo syrjey;
Agh yiow shiu baase goll‐rish deiney:
as tuittee shiu myr fer jeh ny princeyn.
Trog ort, O Yee, as jean uss y seihll y vriwnys:
son nee uss ooilley ny ashoonyn‐quaagh y ghoaill son dty eiraght.
NY jean dty hengey y chummal, O Yee, ny bee kinjagh dty host:
ny freill dty chooney voin, O Yee.
Son cur‐my‐ner, ta dty noidyn baggyrt dy ard:
as t'adsyn ta feoh oc orts er droggal seose nyn ghing.
T'ad er ghoaill smooinaghtyn croutagh noi dty phobble:
as er chur nyn goyrle dy cheilley noi dty chloan chasherick.
T'ad er ghra, Tar‐jee, as lhig dooin ad y astyrt ass ny fraueyn, nagh bee ad arragh nyn bobble:
as nagh bee ennym Israel ny sodjey ayns cooinaghtyn.
Son t'ad er chur nyn ghing cooidjagh lesh un aigney:
as er n'yannoo conaant cooidjagh dt'oi's.
Cabbaneyn ny Edomiteyn, as ny Ishmaeliteyn:
ny Moabiteyn, as ny Hagareneyn;
Gebal, as Ammon, as Amalek:
ny Philistinee, marish cummaltee Tyre.
Ta Assur neesht er hassoo lhieu:
as er chooney lesh cloan Lot.
Agh jean uss roosyn myr rish ny Madianiteyn:
rish Sisera, as rish Jabin ec awin Kison:
Va er nyn stroie ec Endor:
as haink dy ve myr eoylley er y thalloo.
Jean uss adsyn as ny princeyn oc goll‐rish Oreb as Zeb:
dy jarroo, jean ooilley ny princeyn oc myr Zeba as Salmana;
Ta gra, Lhig dooin goaill dooin hene:
thieyn Yee son spooilley.
O my Yee, cur orroo dy ve myr queeyll:
as myr coau roish y gheay.
'Naght myr ta'n aile lostey seose yn cheyll:
as myr ta'n lossey lommey ny sleityn.
Eiyr ad er yn aght cheddin lesh dty ghoirrin:
as jean ad agglagh lesh dty sterrym.
Jean yn eddin oc y choodaghey lesh nearey, O Hiarn:
dy vod ad shirrey dty Ennym.
Lhig daue ve er nyn goyrt naardey as seaghnit dy bragh ny smoo as ny smoo:
lhig daue ve er nyn goyrt gys nearey, as cherraghtyn.
As bee fys oc, dy nee uss ta'n Ennym ayd Jehovah:
yn ynrycan Er smoo syrjey harrish ooilley yn seihll.
OCRE cha eunyssagh ta dty chummallyn:
uss Hiarn dy heshaght flaunys!
Ta m'annym geearree as goaill foddeeaght dy gholl stiagh ayns cooyrtyn y Chiarn:
ta my chree as m'eill goaill boggey ayns y Jee bio.
Ta'n sparroo hene er gheddyn ynnyd, as yn gollan geayee edd raad oddys ee e hein y hroggal:
dy jarroo ny altaryn ayds, O Hiarn jeh'n cheshaght flaunyssagh, my Ree as my Yee.
Bannit t'adsyn ta baghey ayns dty hie:
bee ad dy kinjagh cur moylley dhyt.
Bannit da'n dooinney ta'n niart echey ayn-yd's:
ayns e chree ta ny raaidyn ayds.
Quoi ga dy vel eh goll trooid coan dy hreihys, t'eh jeeaghyn er myr farrane:
as myr puill er nyn lhieeney lesh ushtey.
Hed ad veih niart gys niart:
as ta dagh unnane oc chebbal eh hene fenish yn Jee dy Yeeghyn ayns Sion.
O Hiarn Yee dy heshaght flaunys, clasht rish my phadjer:
eaisht, O Yee Yacob.
Cur‐my‐ner, O Yee nyn vendeilagh:
as jeeagh er eddin dt'er‐ooilit.
Son ta un laa ayns dty chooyrtyn:
ny share na thousane.
Baare lhiam currym y dorrys y ve orrym ayns thie my Yee:
na dy vaghey ayns cabbaneyn ny mee‐chrauee.
Son ta'n Chiarn Jee ny hoilshey as fendeilagh:
ver y Chiarn grayse as gloyr: as cha bee nhee mie erbee er ny chummal vouesyn ta leeideil bea chrauee.
O Hiarn Yee dy heshaght flaunys;
bannit ta'n dooinney ta cur e hreishteil ayn-yds.
HIARN, t'ou er jeet dy ve graysoil da dty heer:
t'ou er hyndaa ersooyl cappeeys Yacob.
T'ou er leih mee‐chraueeaght dty phobble:
as er goodaghey ooilley nyn beccaghyn.
T'ou er choyrt void ooilley dty yymmoose:
as er hyndaa oo hene veih chiass dty chorree.
Chyndaa shin reesht, O Yee nyn Saualtagh:
as lhig da dty chorree scuirr voin.
Bee oo jymmoosagh rooin son dy bragh:
as jean oo dty chorree y heeyney magh veih un heeloghe gys sheeloghe elley?
Nagh jean oo chyndaa reesht, as shinyn y vioghey:
dy vod dty phobble boggey y ghoaill ayn-yd?
Soilshee dooin dty vyghin, O Hiarn:
as giall dooin dty haualtys.
Eaisht‐ym cre jir y Chiarn my mychione's:
son nee eh shee y loayrt rish e phobble, as rish e nooghyn, nagh jyndaa ad reesht gys ommijys.
Son ta e haualtys er‐gerrey dauesyn ta goaill aggle roish:
dy vod gloyr tannaghtyn ayns y cheer ain.
Ta myghin as firrinys er choyrt qualtys d'y cheilley:
ta cairys as shee er phaagey yn derrey yeh yn jeh elley.
Nee firrinys blaaghey ass y thalloo:
as ta cairys er yeeaghyn neose veih niau.
Dy jarroo, nee yn Chiarn kenjallys‐ghraihagh y hoilshaghey:
as ver y cheer ain magh e mess.
Nee cairys goll roishyn:
as e immeeaght y leeideil er y raad.
CROYM dty chleaysh, O Hiarn, as clasht rhym:
son ta mee boght, as ayns treihys.
Freill uss my annym, son ta mee ynrick:
my Yee, saue dty harvaant ta coyrt e hreishteil aynyds.
Bee trocoil dooys, O Hiarn:
son neem geamagh orts gagh‐laa.
Gerjee annym dty harvaant:
son hood's, O Hiarn, ta mee troggal seose my annym.
Son t'ou uss, Hiarn, mie as graysoil:
as jeh myghin vooar dauesyn ooilley ta geamagh ort.
Cur clashtyn, Hiarn, da my phadjer:
as smooinee er coraa my aghin's imlee.
Ayns earish my heaghyn neem geamagh ort:
son t'ou dy my chlashtyn.
Mastey ny Jeeghyn cha vel unnane erbee casley rhyts, O Hiarn:
cha vel unnane oddys jannoo myr t'ou uss dy yannoo.
Hig ooilley ny ashoonyn t'ou er yannoo, as ver ad ooashley dhyts, O Hiarn:
as nee ad dty Ennym y ghloyraghey.
Son t'ou uss ard, as jannoo reddyn yindyssagh:
uss yn ynrycan Jee.
Ynsee dooys dty raad, O Hiarn, as neem gimmeeaght ayns dty irriney:
O jean my chree y sniemmey hood, dy voddym aggle y ghoaill roish dty Ennym.
Ver‐ym booise dhyts, O Hiarn my Yee, lesh ooilley my chree:
as neem dty Ennym y voylley son dy bragh.
Son s'mooar ta dty vyghin hym's:
as t'ou er livrey my annym veih diunid ny hoaie.
O Yee, ta ny mooaralee er n'irree magh m'oi:
as ta sheshaght dy ghrogh 'leih er hirrey lurg m'annym, as cha vel ad er hoiaghey uss kiongoyrt rish ny sooillyn oc.
Agh t'ou uss, O Hiarn Yee, lane dy hymmey as dy vyghin:
surranse‐foddey, feoilt ayns mieys as firrinys.
O chyndaa uss eisht hym's, as jean myghin orrym:
cur dty niart da dty harvaant, as cooin lesh mac dty inneyveyl.
Soilshee orrym cowrey ennagh jeh dty oayr, dy vod adsyn ta feoh oc orrym shen y akin, as goaill nearey:
er‐y‐fa dy vel uss, Hiarn, er chooney lhiam, as er my gherjaghey.
TA ny undinyn eck er ny croink chasherick:
shynney lesh y Chiarn giattyn Sion ny share na ooilley cummallyn Yacob.
Ta reddyn feer ooasle er nyn loayrt jeed's:
uss ard‐valley dy Yee.
Smooinee‐ym er Rahab as Babylon:
mâroosyn ta enney oc orrym.
Cur jee my‐ner ny Philistinee neesht:
as adsyn jeh Tyre, marish ny Morianee; jeeagh, ayns shen v'eh er ny ruggey.
As mychione Sion bee eh er ny ghra, dy row eh er ny ruggey ayn‐jee:
as nee yn Er smoo syrjey ee y niartaghey.
Nee yn Chiarn shoh y imraa tra t'eh scrieu coontey yn phobble:
dy row eh ruggit ayns shen.
Adsyn neesht ta goaill arraneyn‐moyllee as jannoo bingys ver eh 'sy choontey:
bee ooilley my ushtaghyn geill oor aynyds.
OHIARN Yee dy my haualtys, 'ta mee er n'eamagh laa as oie kiongoyrt rhyts:
O lhig da my phadjer cheet stiagh ayns yn enish ayds, croym dty chleaysh gys my eam;
Son ta m'annym lane dy heaghyn:
as ta my vioys tayrn er‐gerrey gys yn oaie.
Ta mee coontit myr fer jeusyn ta goll sheese 'syn ooig:
as ta mee er ve dy jarroo myr dooinney nagh vel veg y vree ayn.
Er my scarrey mastey ny merriu, goll roosyn ta gooint dy baase, as ta nyn lhie 'syn oaie:
ta ass cooinaghtyn, as ta giarit ersooyl veih dty laue.
T'ou er my choyrt 'sy lagg s'inshilley:
ayns boayl dy ghorraghys, as ayns y diunid.
Ta dty yymmoose lhie dy trome orrym:
as t'ou er my heaghney lesh ooilley dty sterymyn.
T'ou er choyrt m'ainjys foddey voym:
as er chur orrym dy ve feohdoil daue.
Ta mee cha shickyr ayns pryssoon:
nagh voddym geddyn ass.
Ta my hoilshey gaase moal lesh eer seaghyn:
Hiarn, ta mee er eamagh orts gagh‐laa, ta mee er heeyney magh my laueyn hoods.
Vel uss soilshaghey yindyssyn mastey ny merrin:
ny jean ny merriu girree seose reesht, as uss y voylley?
Bee dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh er ny hoilshaghey 'syn oaie:
ny dty irrinys ayns toyrtmow?
Bee dt'obbraghyn yindyssagh er nyn gronnaghey 'sy dorraghys:
as dty chairys 'sy cheer raad ta dy chooilley nhee er ny yarrood?
Hoods ta mee er n'eamagh, O Hiarn:
as dy moghey hig my phadjer kiongoyrt rhyt.
Hiarn, cre'n‐fa t'ou treigeil m'annym:
as follaghey dt'eddin voym?
Ta mee ayns treihys, as goll rishyn ta raad y vaaish:
dy jarroo veih m'aegid derrey nish dt'atchimyn ta mee er hurranse lesh aigney seaghnit.
Ta dty yymmoose lhie dy trome orrym:
as ta'n aggle t'orrym royds er my chraghey.
Haink ad cruinn mygeayrt y moo'm gagh‐laa myr thooilley:
as ren ad m'y hionney cooidjagh er dy chooilley heu.
My chaarjyn graihagh as my gheiney mooinjerey t'ou er choyrt ersooyl voym:
as er vollaghey m'ainjys ass my hilley.
BEE m'arrane kinjagh jeh kenjallys‐ghraihagh y Chiarn:
lesh my veeal beem's dy bragh soilshaghey dt'irriney veih un sheeloghe gys sheeloghe elley.
Son ta mee er ghra, Bee myghin er ny hoiaghey seose son dy bragh:
dt'irriney nee oo y hickyraghey ayns ny niaughyn.
Ta mee er yannoo conaant rish my er‐reiht:
ta mee er vreearrey da David my harvaant;
Dty 'luight's neem's y hickyraghey son dy bragh:
as dty stoyl‐reeoil y hoiaghey seose veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
O Hiarn, nee ny niaughyn hene dt'obbraghyn yindyssagh y voylley:
as dt'irriney ayns sheshaght ny nooghyn.
Son quoi eh erskyn ny bodjallyn:
vees er ny hoyllaghey rish y Chiarn?
As quoi eshyn mastey ny Jeeghyn:
vees casley rish y Chiarn?
Ta aggle feer vooar dy v'er ny ghoaill roish Jee ayns chaglym‐cooidjagh ny nooghyn:
as ta arrym dy ve er ny choyrt da lioroosyn ooilley ta mygeayrt‐y‐mysh.
O Hiarn Yee jeh sheshaght flaunys, quoi ta goll rhyts:
ta dt'irriney, Hiarn smoo niartal, er dy chooilley heu.
T'ou reill dewilys ny marrey:
t'ou kuinaghey ny tonnyn eck tra t'ad troggal.
T'ou er choyrt Egypt fo‐chosh, as er stroie eh:
t'ou er skeayley dty noidyn dy lhean lesh dty roih niartal.
Ta ny niaughyn lhiats, lhiats myrgeddin yn thalloo:
t'ou er hoiaghey undin y seihll rhunt, as ooilley ny t'ayn.
T'ou er yannoo yn twoaie as y jiass:
nee Tabor as Hermon boggey y ghoaill ayns dt'Ennym.
Ta roih niartal ayd:
s'lajer ta dty laue's, as ard ta dty laue yesh.
Cairys as cormid ta stoyl‐reeoil dty ynnyd‐vaghee; hed myghin as firrinys roish dt'eddin.
Bannit ta'n pobble, O Hiarn, oddys boggey y ghoaill aynyd:
nee ad gimmeeaght ayns soilshey dt'eddin.
Bee yn taitnys oc gagh‐laa ayns dt'Ennym's:
as ayns dty chairys nee ad boggyssagh;
Son uss gloyr y niart oc:
as ayns dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh nee oo nyn ghing y hroggal seose.
Son ta'n Chiarn nyn vendeilagh:
ta'n Er Casherick dy Israel nyn Ree.
Loayr oo keayrt dy row ayns ashlishyn rish dty nooghyn, as dooyrt oo:
Ta mee er choyrt cooney er fer ta niartal; Ta mee er hoiaghey seose fer reiht ass y pobble.
Ta mee er gheddyn David my harvaant:
lesh my ooil chasherick ta mee er n'ooillaghey eh.
Cummee my laue eshyn dy shickyr:
as nee my roih eh y niartaghey.
Cha bee yn noid abyl tranlaase y yannoo er:
cha jean mac yn olkys aggair y yannoo da.
Bwoaill‐ym sheese e noidyn kiongoyrt rish yn eddin echey:
as neem adsyn y stroie ta feoh oc ersyn.
Bee m'irriney neesht as my vyghin mârish:
as ayns m'Ennym's bee'n niart echey er ny hoiaghey seose.
Soie‐ym seose yn reill echey neesht er yn aarkey:
as e laue yesh ayns ny thooillaghyn.
Nee eh geamagh hym, She uss my Ayr:
my Yee, as my haualtys lajer.
As neem's eh y yannoo my vac shinney:
ny syrjey na reeaghyn y thallooin.
Freill‐ym my vyghin er e hon son dy bragh:
as shassee my chonaant shickyr mârishyn.
Ver‐ym er y sluight echey myrgeddin dy arraghtyn son dy bragh:
as y stoyl‐reeoil echey myr laghyn niau.
Agh my hreigys yn chloan echey my leigh:
as nagh nimmee ad ayns my vriwnyssyn;
My vrishys ad my 'lattyssyn, as nagh vreill ad my annaghyn:
neem's ny foiljyn oc y cherraghey lesh y clatt, as nyn beccah lesh buillaghyn.
Ny‐yeih, my chenjallys‐ghraihagh cha goym dy bollagh voish:
chamoo lhig-ym da my irriney dy ailleil.
My chonaant cha jeanym y vrishey, ny yn red y chaghlaa t'er n'gholl magh ass my veillyn:
ta mee er n'yannoo breearrey un cheayrt liorish my chasherickys, nagh vail‐ym David.
Nee yn sluight echey tannaghtyn son dy bragh:
as ta'n stoyl echey goll‐rish y ghrian kiongoyrt rhym.
Nee eh shassoo shickyr son dy bragh myr yn eayst:
as myr yn feanish firrinagh ayns niau.
Agh t'ou er chur cooyl rish as er hreigeil dty Er‐ooillit:
as t'ou jymmoosagh rish.
T'ou er vrishey conaant dty harvaant:
as er hilgey yn attey echey gys y thalloo.
T'ou er lhieggal ooilley e voallaghyn:
as er vrishey sheese ny tooryn lajer echey.
T'adsyn ooilley ta goll shaghey dy spooilley eh:
as t'eh er jeet dy ve ny oltooan da e naboonyn.
T'ou er hoiaghey seose laue yesh e noidyn:
as er chur orroosyn ooilley va n'oi dy ghoaill boggey.
T'ou er ghoaill ersooyl foyr e chliwe:
as cha vel oo cur da barriaght ayns y chaggey.
T'ou er choyrt ass e ghloyr:
as er hilgey e stoyl‐reeoil sheese gys y thalloo.
Laghyn e aegid t'ou er yannoo giare:
as er choodaghey eh lesh mee‐ooashley.
Hiarn, caid nee uss oo hene y ollaghey, nee son dy bragh:
as jean dty chorree lostey goll‐rish aile?
O cooinee cre cha giare as ta my hraa:
cre'n‐fa t'ou uss er n'yannoo dy chooilley-ghooinney dy ve fardalagh?
Quoi'n dooinney ta bio, nagh vaik y baase:
as jean eh yn annym echey y livrey veih laue yn oaie?
Hiarn, cre vel dty henn chenjallys-ghraihagh:
ghiall oo lesh breearey da David ayns dty irriney.
Cooinee, Hiarn, er yn oltooan t'ec dty harvaantyn:
as kys ta mee gymmyrkey ayns my oghrish scammyltyn ymmodee sleih;
Lhieu ta dty noidyn er dty oltooaney; as er hilgey scammylt er kesmadyn dty Er‐ooilit:
dy row yn Chiarn er ny voylley son dy bragh. Amen, as Amen.
HIARN, t'ou uss er ve nyn gemmyrk:
veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
Roish my daink ny sleityn rish, ny rieau yn thalloo as y seihll er nyn groo:
she uss Jee er dy rieau, as seihll gyn jerrey.
T'ou chyndaa dooinney gys toyrt‐mow:
reesht t'ou gra, Tar‐jee reesht, shiuish chloan gheiney.
Son cha vel thousane blein ayns dty hilley's agh myr y laa jea:
fakin dy vel shen er n'gholl shaghey myr arrey 'syn oie.
Cha leah as t'ou dyn skeayley ad, t'ad dy jarroo myr cadley:
as fioghey ersooyl chelleeragh myr y faiyr.
Ayns y voghrey te glass, as gaase seose:
agh ayns yn astyr te giarit sheese, te creen as fiojit.
Son ta shin lheie ersooyl ayns dty yymmoose:
as ta aggle orrin roish dty chorree hrome.
T'ou er hoiaghey nyn ghrogh‐yannoo kiongoyrt rhyt:
as nyn beccaghyn follit ayns soilshey dty eddin.
Son tra t'ou uss corree, ta ooilley nyn laghyn er n'immeeaght:
ta ny bleeantyn ain ec kione myr skeeal t'er ny insh.
Ta laghyn yn eash ain three‐feed blein as jeih; as ga dy vod deiney 've cha lajer as dy roshtyn kiare‐feed blein:
ny yeih cha vel y troshid oc eisht agh deinys as trimshey; cha leah shen te er n'gholl shaghey, as ta shin goit jeh.
Agh quoi ta toiggal pooar dty yymmoose:
son dy jarroo myr ta dooinney goaill aggle, shen myr ta dty chorree.
Ynsee dooin myr shen dy earroo nyn laghyn:
dy vod ny creeaghyn ainyn ve soit er creenaght.
Chyndaa uss reesht, O Hiarn, ec y jerrey:
as bee graysoil da dty harvaantyn.
O jean shin lesh dty vyghin, as shen dy leah:
myr shen nee mayd boggey 'ghoaill, as bee mayd gennal ooilley laghyn nyn mea.
Gerjee shin reesht, nish lurg y traa t'ou er cherraghey shin:
as son ny bleeantyn ayndoo ta shin er hurranse seaghyn.
Soilshee dt'obbyr da dty harvaantyn:
as da nyn gloan dty ghloyr.
As dy row Ard‐ooashley gloyroil y Chiarn yn Jee ain orrin:
bishee uss obbyr nyn laueyn orrin, O bishee uss ny ta shin dy ghoaill ayns laue.
QUOI‐ERBEE ta cummal fo coadey yn Fer smoo ard:
nee eh tannaghtyn fo scaa yn Ooilley‐niartal.
Jir‐ym rish y Chiarn, Uss my hreishteil, as my hoor lajer:
my Yee, ersyn ver‐ym my varrant;
Son nee eh dty livrey veih ribbey yn shelgeyr:
as veih'n chramp baasoil.
Nee eh uss y choadey fo e skianyn, as bee oo sauchey fo ny fedjagyn echey:
e irrinys as e ynrickys vees dty eilley as dty endeil.
Cha bee aggle ort roish atchim erbee 'syn oie:
ny roish y tide ta lhiggit 'sy laa:
Roish y chramp ta shooyl 'sy dorraghys:
ny roish y chingys ta stroie ec y vunlaa.
Nee thousane tuittym rish dty lhiattee, as jeih thousaneyn ec dty laue yesh:
agh cha jig eh dty aare.
Dy jarroo, lesh dty hooillyn ver oo my ner:
as hee oo leagh ny mee‐chrauee.
Son t'ou uss, Hiarn, my yerkal:
t'ou er hoiaghey yn thie ayd dy chemmyrk feer ard.
Cha jean olk erbee taghyrt dhyt:
chamoo nee chingys trome erbee cheet faare dty chummal;
Son ver eh currym da e ainleyn harryd:
dy dty reayll ayns ooilley dty raaidyn.
Nee ad oo y ymmyrkey ayns nyn laueyn:
nagh gortee oo dty chass noi clagh.
Nee oo shooyl er y lion as yn adder:
stampee oo yn lion aeg as y dragon fo dty chassyn.
Er‐yn‐oyr dy vel eh er hoiaghey e ghraih orrym, shen‐y‐fa livrey‐ym eh:
neem's eh y hoiaghey seose, er‐y‐fa dy vel enney echey er my Ennym.
Nee eh geamagh orrym, as verym clashtyn da:
dy jarroo, ta mee mârish ayns seaghyn:
livrey‐ym eh, as verym lhiam eh gys onnor.
Lesh bea liauyr neem's eh y yannoo booiagh:
as soilshee‐ym da my haualtys.
TE red gerjoilagh dy chur booise da'n Chiarn:
as dy ghoaill arraneyn‐moyllee gys dty Ennym's, O Uss smoo syrjey;
Dy insh jeh dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh dy moghey 'sy voghrey:
as jeh dty ynrickys ayns traa ny hoie.
Er greie‐chiaull dy yeih strengyn, as er y lute:
er greie ard, as er y chlaasagh.
Son t'ou uss, Hiarn, er my yannoo gennal trooid dty obbraghyn:
as goym boggey ayns coyrt moylley son obbraghyn dty laueyn.
O Hiarn, cre cha gloyroil as ta dty obbraghyn:
ta dty smooinaghtyn feer dowin?
Cha vel dooinney neuchreeney cur tastey mie da shoh:
as cha vel ommydan dy hoiggal eh.
Tra ta'n vee‐chrauee glass myr y faiyr, as tra ta adsyn ooilley ta gobbraghey olkys bishaghey:
eisht bee ad er nyn stroie son dy bragh; agh uss, Hiarn, yn Fer smoo syrjey son dy bragh.
Son cur‐my‐ner, nee dty noidyn, O Hiarn, cur‐my‐ner, nee dty noidyn cherraghtyn:
as bee adsyn ooilley ta gobbraghey mee‐chraueeaght er nyn stroie:
Agh bee my chione's er ny hroggal seose myr eairk unicorn;
son ta mee er my ooillaghey lesh ooil noa.
Hee my hooill neesht e aigney er my noidyn:
as nee my chleaysh clashtyn e yeearree er ny mee‐chrauee ta girree magh m'oi.
Nee yn dooinney cairagh blaaghey myr y billey palm:
as skeayley dy lhean myr y billey‐cedar ayns Libanus.
Nee nyn lheid as t'er nyn soiaghey ayns thie yn Chiarn:
bishaghey ayns cooyrtyn thie yn Jee ain.
Ver ad magh neesht ny smoo dy vess ayns nyn shenn eash:
as bee ad roauyr as jeeaghyn dy mie.
Dy vod ad soilshaghey cre cha firrinagh as ta'n Chiarn my niart:
as nagh vel veg y neu‐ynrickys aynsyn.
TA'N Chiarn ny Ree, as er choyrt mysh coamrey gloyroil:
ta'n Chiarn er choyrt er e gharmad, as er choamrey eh hene lesh niart.
T'eh er n'yannoo yn seihll rhunt cha shickyr:
nagh vod eh v'er ny scughey.
Rieau er dy hoshiaght y theihll ta dty stoyl er ny hoiaghey seose:
t'ou uss veih dy bragh.
Ta ny thooillaghyn er hroggal, O Hiarn, ta ny thooillaghyn er hroggal seose nyn goraa:
ta ny thooillaghyn er hroggal seose ny tonnyn oc.
Ta tonnyn ny marrey niartal, as jannoo feiyr atchimagh:
agh ny yeih ta'n Chiarn, ta cummal er yn yrjid, ny s'niartal.
Ta ny recortyssyn ayds, O Hiarn, feer shickyr:
ta casherickys cooie da dty hie son dy bragh.
O HIARN Yee, dhyts ta bentyn dy ghoaill kerraghey:
uss Yee, dhyts ta kerraghey bentyn, jean oo hene y hoilshaghey.
Trog ort, uss Vriw y theihll:
