as jean ny mooaralee y chooilleeney lurg nyn doilchin.
Hiarn, caid nee ny mee‐chrauee:
caid nee yn vooinjer vee‐chrauee boggyssagh?
Caid nee ooilley ny drogh‐yantee loayrt cha mooaralagh:
as goaill orroo lheid y voggyssagh voyrnagh?
T'ad bwoalley sheese dty phobble, O Hiarn:
as jannoo tranlaase er dty eiraght.
T'ad dunverys y ven‐treoghe, as y joarree:
as cur y lhiannoo gyn ayr dy baase.
As foast t'ad gra, Cha n'aggle dooin, cha jean y Chiarn fakin:
chamoo ver Jee Yacob geill da.
Gow‐jee tastey, shiuish vee‐hushtee mastey'n pobble:
O shiuish ommydanyn, cuin nee shiu toiggal?
Eshyn ren y chleaysh y hoiaghey, nagh jean eh clashtyn:
ny eshyn ren y thooill, nagh jean eh fakin?
Ny eshyn ta cummal seose ny ashoonyn:
she eshyn ta gynsaghey da dooinney tushtey, nagh jean eshyn kerraghey?
Ta fys ec y Chiarn er smooinaghtyn dooinney:
nagh vel ad agh fardail.
Bannit yn dooinney t'ou dy smaghtaghey, O Hiarn:
as dy ynsaghey ayns dty leigh;
Dy vod oo surranse y choyrt da ayns earish seaghyn:
derrey vees yn ooig er ny chleiy son ny mee‐chrauee.
Son cha jean y Chiarn failleil e phobble:
chamoo nee eh treigeil e eiraght;
Derrey hyndaa‐ys cairys reesht gys briwnys:
nee adsyn ooilley ta firrinagh ayns cree geiyrt er.
Quoi nee girree seose mârym noi ny mee‐chrauee:
ny quoi hassys er my heu noi ny drogh yantee?
Mannagh beagh y Chiarn er chooney lhiam:
cha row saase my chour nagh beagh my annym er ny choyrt ny host.
Agh tra dooyrt mee, Ta my chass er skyrraghtyn:
ren dty vyghin's, O Hiarn, mish y chummal seose.
Ays ymmodee ny smooinaghtyn trimshagh v'aym ayns my chree; ta dty gherjagh er ooraghey my annym.
Bee veg ayds dy yannoo rish y stoyl‐briwnys dy vee‐chairys:
ta cummey yn aggair myr y leigh?
T'ad chaglym cooidjagh noi annym y dooinney cairagh:
as deyrey gy-baase yn uill neuchyndagh.
Agh yn Chiarn my chemmyrk:
as my Yee niart my hreishteil.
Cooilleenee eh orroosyn nyn olkys, as stroie‐ee eh ad ayns y ghoanlys oc hene:
dy jarroo, nee'n Chiarn yn Jee ain ad y stroie.
O TAR‐JEE, lhig dooin arrane y ghoaill gys y Chiarn:
lhig dooin dy creeoil boggey 'ghoaill ayns niart nyn saualtys.
Lhig dooin cheet kiongoyrt rish yn enish echey lesh toyrt‐booise:
as soilshaghey shin hene gennal aynsyn lesh arraneyn‐moyllee.
Son ta'n Chiarn ny Yee mooar:
as ny Ree mooar erskyn dy chooilley Yee.
Ayns y laue echeysyn ta ooilley corneilyn y thallooin:
as niart ny croink she leshyn eh myrgeddin.
Yn faarkey she leshyn eh, as eh ren eh:
as ny laueyn echeysyn ren aarloo yn thalloo chirrym.
O tar‐jee, lhig dooin ooashley y choyrt, as tuittym sheese:
as gliooney kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn y Fer ren shin.
Son eshyn y Chiarn y Jee ain:
as shinyn pobble e phastyr, as kirree e laue.
Jiu my nee shiu clashtyn e choraa, ny creoi‐jee nyn greeaghyn:
myr ayns y vrasnagh, as ayns laa yn violagh ayns yn aasagh;
Tra ren ny ayraghyn eu mish y vrasnaghey:
phrow ad mee, as honnick ad my obbraghyn.
Da‐eed blein liauyr va mee corree rish y cheeloghe shoh, as dooyrt mee:
She pobble ad ta goll er‐shaghryn ayns nyn greeaghyn, son cha vel enney er ve oc er my raaidyn.
Dauesyn loo mee ayns my chorree:
nagh ragh ad stiagh ayns m'ea.
O GOW‐JEE arrane noa da'n Chiarn:
gow jee arrane da'n Chiarn, ooilley yn slane seihll.
Gow‐jee arrane da'n Chiarn, as moylley‐jee yn Ennym echey:
insh‐jee magh e haualtys veih laa dy laa.
Jean‐jee e ooashley y hoilshaghey da ny ashoonyn‐quaagh:
as e yindyssyn da dy chooilley phobble.
Son ta'n Chiarn mooar, as cha vod eh dy feeu 've er ny voylley:
ta ny smoo dy aggle dy ve goit roishyn na dy chooilley Yee.
Son cha vel ooilley Jeeghyn ny ashoonyn agh jallooyn:
agh she yn Chiarn chroo ny niaughyn.
Ta gloyr as ooashley ayns e enish:
ta pooar as onnor ayns ynnyd e chasherickys.
Cur‐jee da'n Chiarn, O shiuish chynneeyn y phobble:
cheb‐jee da'n Chiarn ooashley as pooar.
Cur‐jee da'n Chiarn yn onnor cair da'n Ennym echey:
cheb‐jee ourallyn, as tar‐jee stiagh ayns e chooyrtyn.
O cur‐jee ooashley da'n Chiarn ayns yn ynnyd aalin dy chasherickys:
lhig da'n slane seihll y ve arrymagh ayns e enish.
Insh jee mastey ny ashoonyn, dy nee yn Chiarn y Ree:
as dy nee eshyn eh t'er n'yannoo yn seihll rhunt cha shickyr nagh vod eh ve er ny scughey, as kys dy jean eh yn pobble y vriwnys dy cairagh.
Lhig da ny niaughyn goaill boggey, as lhig da'n thalloo 've gennal; lhig da'n faarkey feiyral, as ooilley ny t'ayn.
Lhig da'n magher 've lane dy voggey, as ooilley ny t'ayn:
eisht nee ooilley biljyn y cheyll boggey ghoaill kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn.
Son t'eh cheet, t'eh cheet dy vriwnys y thalloo:
as lesh cairys dy vriwnys y seihll, as y pobble lesh e ynrickys.
TA'N Chiarn yn Ree, foddee yn seihll goaill boggey jeh:
dy jarroo, foddee ny ymmodee ellanyn boggey y ghoaill jeh.
Ta bodjallyn as dorraghys mygeayrt‐y-mysh:
ta cairys as briwnys coamrey e stoyl‐reeoil.
Hed aile magh roish:
as loshtee eh seose e noidyn er dy chooilley heu.
Ren ny tendreilyn echey soilshey y choyrt da'n seihll:
honnick y thalloo shen, as ve agglit.
Ren ny croink lheie goll‐rish kere ec fenish y Chiarn:
ec fenish Chiarn y slane seihll.
Ta ny niaughyn er hoilshaghey e chairys:
as ta ooilley yn pobble er akin e ghloyr.
Bee adsyn ooilley er nyn goyrt gys nearey ta cur ooashley da jallooyn granit, as ta goaill taitnys ayns Jeeghyn fardalagh:
cur‐jee ooashley dasyn, ooilley shiuish Yeeghyn.
Cheayll Sion jeh shoh, as ghow ee boggey; as va inneenyn Yudah gennal, er graih dty vriwnyssyn, O Hiarn.
Son t'ou uss, Hiarn, ny syrjey na adsyn ooilley t'er y thalloo:
t'ou er dty hoiaghey seose foddey erskyn dy chooilley Yee.
O shiuish ta graihagh er y Chiarn, jeeagh‐jee dy der shiu dwoaie da'n olk:
ta'n Chiarn coadey anmeenyn e nooghyn; nee eh ad y livrey veih laue ny mee‐chrauee.
Ta soilshey er n'irree son y vooinjer chairagh:
as gennallys gherjoilagh dauesyn ta dy chree firrinagh.
Gow‐jee boggey ayns y Chiarn, shiuish sleih ynrick:
as cur‐jee booise ayns cooinaghtyn jeh e chasherickys.
O GOW‐JEE arrane noa gys y Chiarn:
son t'eh er n'yannoo reddyn yindyssagh.
Lesh e laue yesh hene, as lesh e roih chasherick:
t'eh er gheddyn da hene yn varriaght.
Ta'n Chiarn er hoilshaghey e haualtys:
e chairys t'eh er hoiaghey magh dy foshlit ayns shilley ny ashoonyn.
T'eh er chooinaghtyn er e vyghin as e ynrickys gys thie Israel:
as ta ny ardjyn sodjey mooie jeh'n theihll er vakin saualtys y Jee ain.
Jeeagh‐jee shiu hene gennal gys y Chiarn, ooilley shiuish cheeraghyn:
gow‐jee arrane, gow‐jee boggey, as cur‐jee booise.
Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn er y chlaasagh:
gow‐jee arrane er y chlaasagh lesh psalm dy hoyrt‐booise.
Lesh cayrnyn myrgeddin as shawmyn:
O jeeagh‐jee shiu hene gennal kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn y Ree.
Lhig da'n faarkey feiyr y yannoo, as ooilley ny ta ayn:
yn seihll cruinn, as adsyn ta baghey ayn.
Lhig da ny thooillaghyn nyn massyn y woalley, as lhig da ny croink ve gennal cooidjagh kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn:
son t'eh cheet dy vriwnys y thalloo.
Lesh ynrickys nee eh yn seihll y vriwnys:
as y pobble lesh cairys.
SHE yn Chiarn y Ree, lhig da'n pobble girree magh myr sailliu:
t'eh ny hoie eddyr ny cherubimyn ga dy vel y seihll cha anveagh.
S'mooar ta'n Chiarn ayns Sion:
as ard erskyn dy chooilley phobble.
Ver ad booise da dty Ennym's:
ta mooar, yindyssagh, as casherick.
Ta pooar y ree graihagh er briwnys; t'ou er hoiaghey seose cairys:
t'ou er chooilleeney briwnys as ynrickys ayns Jacob.
O cur‐jee ard‐voylley da'n Chiarn y Jee ain:
as tuitt‐jee sheese er nyn ghlioonyn kiongoyrt rish stoyl e choshey, son t'eshyn casherick.
Moses as Aaron mastey e haggyrtyn, as Samuel mâroosyn ta geamagh er e Ennym:
deie ad shoh er y Chiarn, as cheayll eh ad.
Loayr eh roo ass y phillar vodjallagh:
son dreill ad e recortyssyn, as y leigh v'eh er choyrt daue.
Cheayll oo ad, O Hiarn nyn Yee:
leih oo daue, O Yee, as ren oo kerraghey ny obbraghyn fardalagh oc.
O cur‐jee ard voylley da'n Chiarn yn Jee ain, as jean‐jee eshyn y ooashlaghey er e chronk casherick:
son ta'n Chiarn yn Jee ain casherick.
O BEE‐JEE gerjoil ayns y Chiarn, ooilley shiuish cheeraghyn:
shirveish‐jee yn Chiarn lesh gennallys, as tar‐jee roish e enish lesh arrane.
Bee‐jee shickyr dy nee'n Chiarn ta Jee:
eshyn t'er n'yannoo shin, as cha nee shin hene, shinyn e phobble, as kirree e phastyr.
O gow‐jee stiagh ayns e ghiattyn lesh toyrt‐booise, as ayns e chooyrtyn lesh moylley:
bee‐jee booisal dasyn, as loayrjee mie jeh'n Ennym echey.
Son ta'n Chiarn graysoil, ta e vyghin son dy bragh:
as ta'n firrinys echey farraghtyn veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
BEE m'arrane jeh myghin as briwnys:
hoods, O Hiarn, goym arrane.
O lhig da tushtey y ve aym:
ayns y raad dy chraueeaght.
Tra nee oo my niartaghey:
neem gimmeeaght ayns my hie lesh cree ynrick.
Cha goym drogh chooish erbee ayns laue:
ta dwoaie aym er ny peccaghyn dy neu‐firrinys:
cha jean veg nyn lheid lhiantyn hym.
Bee cree camlaagagh er n'eiyrt ass m'enish:
cha bee ainjys aym rish drogh phersoon.
Quoi‐erbee ta cooyl chassid e naboo:
eshyn neem y stroie.
Quoi‐erbee myrgeddin t'echey shilley mooaralagh as cree ard:
cha surr‐ym eh.
Ta my hooillyn jeeaghyn orroosyn ta ynrick 'sy cheer:
dy vod ad cummal mârym.
Quoi‐erbee ta leeideil bea chrauee:
eshyn vees my harvaant.
Cha jean persoon erbee molteyragh cummal ayns my hie:
cha surr‐ym breagerey dy ve ayns my hilley.
Stroie‐ym dy leah ooilley'n vee‐chrauee ta 'sy cheer:
dy voddym ooilley ny drogh‐yantee y astyrt ass ard‐valley'n Chiarn.
CLASHT rish my phadjer, O Hiarn:
as lhig da my eam roshtyn hood.
Ny follee dt'eddin voym ayns earish my heaghyn:
croym dty chleayshyn hym tra ta mee geamagh; O eaisht rhym, as shen dy feer leah.
Son ta my laghyn er lheie ersooyl myr jaagh:
as ta my chraueyn chyrmit seose myr smarage aile.
Ta my chree er vailleil as fiogit goll‐rish faiyr:
myr shen dy vel mee jarrood dy ee my arran.
Kyndagh rish coraa my accan:
scoan nee my chraueyn lhiantyn gys m'eill.
Ta mee goll‐rish y pelican 'syn aasagh:
as myr yn hullad ta goaill ayns yn eaynagh.
Ta my chadley er gholl voym, as ta mee eer myr sparroo:
ta soie ny‐lomarcan er mullagh thie.
Ta my noidyn dy m'oltooaney fey‐ny‐laa:
as adsyn ta eulyssagh m'oi, t'ad er vreearrey cooidjagh dy my stroie.
Son ta mee er n'ee leoie myr arran:
as er heiy my yough lesh jeir;
As shen er coontey dty yymmoose as dty chorree:
son t'ou er my hilgey sheese.
Ta my laghyn er n'gholl shaghey myr scaa:
as ta mee fiogit myr faiyr.
Agh nee uss, O Hiarn, farraghtyn son dy bragh:
as yn chooinaghtyn jeed trooid dy chooilley heeloghe.
Nee oo girree as bee chymmey ayd er Sion:
son te traa dy beagh myghin ayd urree, dy jarroo, ta'n traa er jeet.
As cre'n‐oyr? ta dty harvaantyn smooinaghtyn er ny voallaghyn eck:
as s'treih lhieu dy akin ee 'sy joan.
Nee ny ashoonyn aggle y ghoaill roish dt'Ennym, O Hiarn:
as ooilley reeaghyn y theihll roish dt'Ard‐ooashley;
Tra nee yn Chiarn Sion y hroggal seose:
as tra vees y ghloyr echey er ny hoilshaghey;
Tra t'eh dy hyndaa eh hene gys padjer ny boghtyn treigit:
as nagh vel eh soiaghey beg jeh nyn aghin.
Bee shoh er ny scrieu son cooinaghtyn da sheelogheyn ry‐heet:
as nee pobble nagh vel foast er ny ruggey yn Chiarn y voylley;
Son t'eh er yeeaghyn neose veih ynnyd e chasherickys:
magh ass niau hug y Chiarn yn seihll my‐ner;
Dy voddagh eh dobberan nyn lheid as ta ayns cappeeys y chlashtyn:
as y chloan y livrey t'er nyn gheyrey gys baase;
Dy voddagh ad Ennym y Chiarn y hoilshaghey ayns Sion:
as e ooashley ec Jerusalem;
Tra ta'n pobble er nyn jaglym cooidjagh:
as ny reeriaghtyn myrgeddin dy hirveish y Chiarn.
Ghow eh ersooyl my niart er my yurnah:
as ren eh my laghyn giare.
Agh dooyrt mee, O my Yee, ny gow mee ersooyl ayns mean m'eash:
er son dty vleeantyn's t'ad farraghtyn trooid dy chooilley heeloghe.
T'ou uss, Hiarn, ayns y toshiaght er hoiaghey undin y thallooin:
as ta ny niaughyn obbyr dty laueyn;
Hed adsyn naardey, agh bee uss er mayrn:
aasee ad ooilley shenn myr garmad;
As myr coamrey nee oo ad y chaghlaa, as bee ad er nyn gaghlaa:
agh uss yn Jee cheddin, as cha jean dty vleeantyn's failleil.
Nee cloan dty harvaantyn tannaghtyn:
as shassee yn sluight oc shickyr ayns dty hilley.
BANNEE yn Chiarn, O m'annym:
as ooilley ny ta cheu‐sthie jee'm bannee e Ennym casherick.
Bannee yn Chiarn, O m'annym:
as ny jarrood ooilley e hoyrtyssyn.
Ta leih ooilley dty pheccah:
as slaanaghey ooilley dty ghoghanyn;
Ta sauail dty vioys veih toyrt‐mow:
as dy dty choamrey lesh myghin as kenjallys‐ghraihagh;
Ta jannoo magh dty veeal lesh nheeghyn mie:
jannoo oo aeg as lajer myr urley.
Ta'n Chiarn cooilleeney cairys as briwnys:
er nyn son ocsyn ooilley ta tranlaasit lesh aggair.
Hoilshee eh e raaidyn da Moses; e obbraghyn da cloan Israel.
Ta'n Chiarn lane dy hymmey as dy vyghin:
surranse‐foddey, as jeh mieys vooar.
Cha bee eh kinjagh corree:
chamoo t'eh freayll e yymmoose son dy bragh.
Cha vel eh er ghellal rooin lurg nyn beccaghyn:
ny er chooilleeney shin cordail rish nyn mee‐chraueeaght;
Son jeeagh cre cha ard as ta niau ayns co‐soyllaghey jeh'n thalloo:
wheesh cheddin ta e vyghin dauesyn ta goaill aggle roish.
Jeeagh cre cha lhean as ta'n shiar veih'n sheear:
choud cheddin t'eh er hoiaghey nyn beccaghyn voin.
Dy jarroo, myr ta chymmey ec ayr er e chloan hene:
myr shen ta'n Chiarn myghinagh dauesyn ta goaill aggle roish.
Son shione da cre jeh ta shin jeant:
t'eh cooinaghtyn nagh vel shin agh joan.
Cha vel laghyn dooinney agh myr faiyr:
son t'eh gaase myr blaa yn vagher.
Son cha leah as ta'n gheay goll harrish, te ersooyl:
as cha der yn ynnyd ve ayn enney er ny sodjey.
Agh ta mieys myghinagh y Chiarn farraghtyn son dy bragh as dy bragh orroosyn ta goaill aggle roish:
as e chairys er cloan chlienney;
Orroosyn dy jarroo ta freayll e chonaant:
as ta smooinaghtyn er e annaghyn dy yannoo ad.
Ta'n Chiarn er hoiaghey seose e stoyl reeoil ayns niau:
as ta e reeriaght reill harrish ooilley.
O bannee‐jee yn Chiarn, shiuish e ainleyn, shiuish ta pooaral ayns niart:
shiuish ta cooilleeney e harey, as ta geaishtagh rish coraa e ghoan.
O bannee‐jee yn Chiarn, ooilley shiuish e heshaght flaunys:
shiuish e harvaantyn ta cooilleeney e aigney.
O loayr‐jee dy mie jeh'n Chiarn, ooilley shiuish e obbraghyn, ayns dy chooilley ynnyd jeh e reilltys; bannee yn Chiarn, O m'annym.
BANNEE yn Chiarn, O m'annym:
O Hiarn my Yee, t'ou erskyn towse gloyroil, t'ou er ny choamrey lesh Ard‐ooashley as onnor.
T'ou dy choamrey oo hene lesh soilshey myr lesh garmad:
as skeayley magh ny niaughyn myr curtan;
Ta soiaghey beamyn e hiamyryn ayns ny hushtaghyn; as jannoo ny bodjallyn e ainagh, as goll er skianyn ny geayee.
T'eh jannoo e ainleyn spyrrydyn (
as e hirveishee lossey dy aile.
T'eh er hoiaghey undinyn y thallooin:
nagh bee eh ec traa erbee er ny scughey.
Choodee oo eh lesh y diunid myr lesh garmad:
ta ny hushtaghyn lhie ayns ny croink.
Ec yn oghsan ayds t'ad chea ersooyl:
ec coraa dty haarnagh ta aggle orroo.
T'ad goll seose cha ard as ny croink, as sheese gys ny coanyn:
eer gys yn ynnyd t'ou er phointeil daue.
T'ou er hoiaghey ny cagliaghyn oc nagh jed ad harrish:
ny chyndaa reesht dy choodaghey yn thalloo.
T'eh cur ny geillyn gys ny awinyn:
ta roie mastey ny croink.
Ta ooilley beiyn y vagher giu jeu:
as ta ny assyllyn feie cuir nyn baa.
Lioroo vees nyn gummal ec eeanlee'n aer:
as nee ad bingys mastey ny banglaneyn.
T'eh gushtaghey ny croink veih'n yrjid:
ta'n seihll er ny lhieeney lesh mess dty obbraghyn.
T'eh cur magh faiyr son y maase:
as messyn y vagheragh son ymmyd dooinney;
Dy vod eh beaghey y chur lesh magh ass y thalloo, as feeyn ta gerjaghey cree dooinney:
as ooil dy chur da eddin gennal, as arran dy niartaghey cree dooinney.
Ta biljyn y Chiarn myrgeddin lane dy hoo:
dy-jarroo cedaryn Libanus t'eshyn er hoiaghey;
Ayndoo ta ny eeanlee jannoo nyn idd:
as ta ny biljyn juys ynnyd‐cummal son y stork.
Ta ny croink ard oayll son ny goair feie:
as myr shen ta ny creggyn son ny conninyn.
Ren eh yn eayst y phointeil son imbaghyn shickyr:
as shione da'n ghrian yn traa dy lhie.
T'ou jannoo dorraghys dy chur stiagh yn oie:
ayn ta ooilley beiyn y cheyll rouail mygeayrt.
Ta ny lionyn garveagagh son nyn spooilley:
shirrey nyn meaghey veih Jee.
Ta'n ghrian girree, as t'ad cosney rhymboo cooidjagh:
as lhie sheese ayns nyn ooigyn.
Ta dooinney goll magh gys e obbyr, as gys e laboraght:
derrey'n astyr.
O Hiarn, cre cha ymmodee ta dt'obbraghyn:
ayns creenaght t'ou er n'yannoo ad ooilley, ta'n seihll lane jeh dty verchys.
Myr shen ta'n faarkey mooar as feayn myrgeddin:
ayn ta cretooryn snaauee gyn earroo, beishtyn chammah beg as mooar.
Shen y raad ta ny lhongyn shiaulley, as ayns shen ta'n Leviathan:
t'ou uss er n'yannoo dy ghoaill yn reamys echey ayn.
T'ad shoh ooilley farkiaght ort:
dy vod oo beaghey y chur daue ayns imbagh cooie.
Tra t'ou dy chur daue eh, t'ad dy hagglym eh:
as tra t'ou fosley dty laue, t'ad jeant magh lesh mie.
Tra t'ou follaghey dt'eddin, t'ad seaghnit:
tra t'ou goaill ersooyl yn ennal oc, t'ad geddyn baase, as t'ad chyndait reesht gys nyn ooir;
Tra t'ou lhiggey magh dt'ennal, bec ad er nyn groo:
as t'ou cur eddin noa da eaghtyr y thallooin.
Nee Ard‐ooashley gloyroil y Chiarn farraghtyn son dy bragh:
nee yn Chiarn boggey 'ghoaill ayns e obbraghyn.
Bee yn thalloo er‐creau ec e hilley:
my nee eh agh bentyn rish ny sleityn, bee ad ayns jaagh.
Goym arrane da'n Chiarn choud as s'bio mee:
neem my Yee y voylley choud as veem er-mayrn.
As shen myr nee my ghoan eshyn y wooiys:
bee my voggey ayns y Chiarn.
Er son peccee, bee adsyn er nyn goyrt mow veih'n thalloo, as hig jerrey er ny mee‐chrauee:
cur uss moylley da'n Chiarn, O m'annym, cur moylley da'n Chiarn.
O CUR‐JEE booise da'n Chiarn, as eie‐jee er yn Ennym echey:
insh‐jee da'n pobble cre ny reddyn t'eh er n'yannoo.
O lhig da ny arraneyn eu 've jehsyn, as moylley‐jee eh:
as lhig da'n taggloo eu y ve mychione ooilley e obbraghyn yindyssagh.
Gow‐jee boggey ayns yn Ennym casherick echey:
lhig da'n cree ocsyn 've gennal ta shirrey lurg y Chiarn.
Shir‐jee yn Chiarn as e niart:
shir‐jee e eddin er son dy bragh.
Cooinee‐jee er ny obbraghyn yindyssagh t'eh er n'yannoo:
e virrillyn, as briwnyssyn e veeal;
O shiuish sluight Abraham e harvaant:
shiuish chloan Yacob t'eh er reih.
Eshyn y Chiarn y Jee ain:
ta e vriwnyssyn ayns ooilley'n seihll.
T'eh er ny ve kinjagh cooinaghtagh jeh e chonaant as e ghialdynyn:
ren eh da thousane dy heelogheyn;
Yn eer conaant ren eh rish Abraham:
as y breearrey loo eh da Isaac;
As shen doardee eh da Jacob son leigh:
as da Israel son conaant dy bragh farraghtyn;
Gra, Dhyts ver‐ym thalloo Chanaan:
cronney nyn eiraght.
Tra nagh row ad foast agh beggan jeu:
as adsyn nyn yoarreeyn ayns y cheer:
Tra v'ad scughey veih ashoon gys ashoon:
veih un reeriaght gys pobble elley:
Cha lhig eh da dooinney erbee aggair 'yannoo daue:
agh hug eh oghsan da eer reeaghyn er y ghraih oc.
Ny benn‐jee rish my Er‐ooillit:
as ny jean‐jee veg y skielley da my adeyryn.
Marish shen, doardee eh genney er y cheer:
as stroie eh yn slane beaghey dy arran.
Agh hug eshyn dooinney rhymboo:
dy jarroo Joseph, va er ny chreck son sharvaant ayns bondiaght;
E chassyn ren ad y lhottey lesh geulaghyn:
hie guin y yiarn stiagh gys e chree;
Derrey haink y traa dy row e chooish er ny hoilshaghey:
ren goo yn Chiarn eshyn y phrowal.
Hug y ree chaghter dy eaysley eh:
hug prince y phobble e reamys da.
Ren eh eh ny hiarn myrgeddin harrish e hie:
as kiannoort harrish ooilley e rheam;
Dy oardail e phrinceyn lurg e aigney:
as creenaght y ynsaghey da e ir‐choyrlee.
Haink Israel myrgeddin gys Egypt:
as va Jacob ny yoarree ayns cheer Ham.
As vishee eh yn pobble echey dy yindyssagh:
as ren eh ad ny s'troshey na nyn noidyn;
Ny creeaghyn ocsyn va myr shen er ny hyndaa, dy row dwoaie oc er e phobble:
as hug ad drogh ghellal da e harvaantyn.
Eisht hug eshyn Moses e harvaant:
as Aaron, v'eh er ny reih;
As hoilshee ad shoh e chowraghyn ny mast' oc:
as yindyssyn ayns cheer Ham.
Doardee eh dorraghys, as ve dorraghey:
agh cha row ad arrymagh da e ghoo.
Hyndaa eh ny ushtaghyn oc gys fuill:
as stroie eh yn eeast oc.
Ren y cheer oc gymmyrkey magh froggyn:
ayns eer shiamyryn nyn reeaghyn.
Loayr eh yn fockle, as haink dy chooilley cheint dy veishteigyn:
as meeylyn ayns ooilley ny ardjyn oc.
Hug eh daue claghyn‐sniaghtee ayns ynnyd fliaghey:
as lossaghyn aile ayns y cheer oc.
Woaill eh neesht ny biljyn‐feeyney as ny biljyn‐figgagh oc:
as hug eh naardey ny biljyn v'ayns ny ardjyn oc.
Loayr eh yn fockle, as haink ny locustyn, as braddagyn erskyn‐earroo:
as d'ee ad seose ooilley yn faiyr v'ayns y cheer oc, as stroie ad messyn y thallooin.
Varr eh ooilley yn chied er ny ruggey ayns nyn jeer:
dy jarroo toshiaght ooilley nyn niart.
Hug eh lesh ad magh myrgeddin lesh argid as airh:
cha row un phersoon annoon mastey ny kynneeyn oc.
Va Egypt lane dy voggey tra jimmee ad rhymboo:
son v'ad ayns aggle roue.
Skeayll eh magh bodjal dy choodaghey ad:
as aile dy chur soilshey daue 'syn oie.
Ec nyn yeearree hug eh lesh quaylyn:
as lhieen eh ad lesh arran veih niau.
Doshil eh yn chreg chloaie, as haink yn ushtey magh myr thooilley:
myr shen dy roie awinyn ayns ynnydyn chyrmey.
Son cre'n‐oyr? chooinee eh er e ghialdyn casherick:
as er Abraham e harvaant.
As hug eh lesh magh e phobble lesh boggey:
as e chloan reiht lesh gennallys;
As hug eh daue thalloo ny ashoonyn:
as ghow ad laboraght y phobble son eiraght:
Dy voddagh ad freayll e 'lattyssyn:
as geill y choyrt da e leighyn.
O CUR‐JEE booise da'n Chiarn, son t'eh graysoil:
as ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Quoi oddys obbraghyn ooasle y Chiarn y ockley magh:
ny ooilley e voylley y hoilshaghey?
Bannit t'adsyn ta kinjagh freayll briwnys:
as jannoo cairys.
Cooinee orrym, O Hiarn, cordail rish y foayr shen t'ou d'ymmyrkey gys dty phobble:
O jeeagh orryms lesh dty haualtys.
Dy voddym fakin maynrys dty chloan reiht:
as boggey 'ghoaill ayns gennallys dty phobble, as booise y choyrt marish dty eiraght.
Ta shin er n'yannoo peccah marish nyn ayraghyn:
ta shin er chur rish aggair, as er ghellal dy olk.
Cha dug nyn ayraghyn tastey da dty yindyssyn ayns Egypt, chamoo dreill ad dty vieys vooar ayns cooinaghtyn:
agh v'ad meeviallagh ec yn aarkey, dy jarroo ec y faarkey Jiarg.
Ny‐yeih chooin eh lhieu er graih e Ennym:
dy voddagh eh yn phooar echey y hoilshaghey.
Hug eh sarey da'n aarkey Jiarg myrgeddin, as ve chyrmit seose:
myr shen ren eh adsyn y leeideil trooid y diunid, myr trooid yn aasagh.
As haue eh ad veih laue ny tranlaasee:
as livrey eh ad veih pooar y noid.
As er son adsyn va chionney orroo, choodee ny ushtaghyn ad:
cha row unnane oc faagit er‐mayrn.
Eisht chred adsyn e ghoan:
as ghow ad arraneyn‐moyllee huggeysyn.
Agh ayns gerrit dy hraa yarrood ad ny obbraghyn echey as cha jinnagh ad ad hene y injillaghey gys e choyrle.
Agh hug ad raad da yeearreeyn mee-reilltagh ayns yn aasagh:
as ayns cheer gyn ushtey ren ad Jee y vrasnaghey.
As hug eh daue nyn yeearree:
as lesh shoh shangid ayns nyn anmeenyn.
Hug ad corree er Moses neesht ayns ny cabbaneyn:
as er Aaron noo yn Chiarn.
Myr shen doshil y thalloo, as slug eh seose Dathan:
as choodee eh sheshaght Abiram.
As ren aile brishey magh mastey'n cheshaght oc:
as ren y lossey stroie ny mee‐chrauee.
Ren ad cummey dow ayns Horeb:
as hug ad ooashley da'n jalloo lheit.
Myr shoh chaghlaa ad nyn ghloyr:
gys co‐chaslys baagh ta gee faiyr;
As yarrood ad Jee yn Saualtagh oc:
v'er n'yannoo lheid ny reddyn mooarey ayns Egypt;
Obbraghyn yindyssagh ayns cheer Ham:
as reddyn atchimagh ec y faarkey Jiarg.
Er shoh dooyrt eh, dy jinnagh eh ad y stroie, er‐be dy hass Moses e harvaant reiht kiongoyrt rish ayns y vrisheymagh:
dy hyndaa ersooyl e yymmoose hrome, nagh jinnagh eh ad y stroie.
Dy jarroo cha ren ad scansh jeh'n cheer eunyssagh shen:
chamoo ren ad credjal e ghoan:
Agh dirree ad magh ayns ny cabbaneyn oc:
as cha ren ad geaishtagh rish coraa'n Chiarn.
Eisht hrog eh seose e laue nyn 'oi:
dy chur ad naardey ayns yn aasagh;
Dy hilgey magh yn sluight oc mastey ny ashoonyn:
as dy skeayley ad trooid ny cheeraghyn.
Ren ad lhiantyn gys Baal‐peor:
as d'ee ad ourallyn ny merriu.
Myr shoh ghreinnee ad eh gys corree lesh nyn ghrogh obbraghyn:
as va'n chramp dewil nyn mast' oc.
Eisht hass Phinehas seose as ghow eh padjer:
as myr shen scuirr y chramp.
As va shen coontit dasyn son cairys:
mastey dy chooilley heeloghe er son dy bragh.
Hug ad corree er myrgeddin ec ushtaghyn y streeu:
myr shen dy ren eh Moses y cherraghey kyndagh roosyn.
Er‐yn‐oyr dy ren ad yn spyrryd echey y vrasnaghey:
ayns wheesh as dy loayr eh dy siyragh lesh e veillyn.
Chamoo stroie ad ny ashoonyn:
myr ren y Chiarn ad y harey.
Agh ren ad sheshaght rish ny ashoonyn:
as dynsee ad nyn gliaghtaghyn.
Ayns wheesh as dy dug ad ooashley da ny jallooyn oc, shoh ren chyndaa gys y toyrt‐mow oc hene:
dy jarroo heb ad ny mec as ny inneenyn oc gys jouyil;
As gheayrt ad yn uill gyn loght; dy jarroo fuill ny mec as ny inneenyn oc:
heb ad ayns ourallyn gys jallooyn Chanaan; as va'n cheer fo mollaght lesh fuill.
Myr shoh v'ad neu‐ghlen lesh ny obbraghyn oc hene:
as hie ad er maarderys lurg nyn yeearreeyn hene.
Shen-y-fa va jymmoose y Chiarn er ny vrasnaghey noi e phobble:
ayns wheesh as dy row dwoaie echey er e eiraght hene,
As livrey eh ad harrish gys laue ny ashoonyn:
as v'adsyn va dwoaie oc orroo ny hiarnyn harrystoo.
Ren nyn noidyn tranlaase orroo; as v'ad fo nyn booar.
Shimmey keayrt ren eh ad y livrey:
agh dirree ad magh n'oi lesh nyn goyrleyn hene, as v'ad er nyn injillaghey son nyn olkys.
Ny‐yeih tra honnick eh nyn seaghyn:
ren eh nyn accan y chlashtyn.
Chooinee eh er e chonaant, as va chymmey echey orroo, cordail rish earroo e vyghinyn:
hug eh dy jarroo orroosyn ooilley va leeideil ad ersooyl ayns cappeeys dy ve erreeishagh daue.
Livrey uss shinyn, O Hiarn nyn Yee, as chaggil shin veih mastey ny ashoonyn:
dy vod mayd booise y chur da dty Ennym casherick, as imraa gloyroil y yannoo jeh dty voylley.
Bannit dy row yn Chiarn Jee dy Israel veih dy bragh, as seihll gyn jerrey:
as lhig da ooilley'n pobble gra, Amen.
O CUR-JEE booise da'n Chiarn, son t'eh graysoil:
as ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Lhig dauesyn booise y choyrt ta'n Chiarn er veaysley:
as er livrey veih laue yn noid;
As er nyn jaglym ass ny cheeraghyn, veih'n niar, as veih'n neear:
veih'n twoaie, as veih'n jiass.
Hie ad er‐shaghryn ayns yn aasagh ass y raad:
as cha dooar ad ard‐valley erbee dy chummal ayn;
Accryssagh as paagh:
hug yn annym oc naardey ayndoo.
Eisht deie ad er y Chiarn ayns nyn seaghyn:
as livrey eh ad ass nyn jennid.
Leeid eh ad magh er y raad cair:
dy voddagh ad goll gys ard‐valley va kiarit daue.
O dy jinnagh deiney er‐y‐fa-shen yn Chiarn y voylley son e vieys:
as fockley magh ny yindyssyn t'eh dy yannoo son cloan gheiney!
Son t'eh jannoo magh yn annym follym:
as lhieeney yn annym accryssagh lesh mieys:
Lheid as ta ny hoie ayns dorraghys, as ayns scadoo yn vaaish:
kianlt ayns treihys ayns geulaghyn yiarn.
Er‐yn‐oyr dy row ad mee‐viallagh gys goan y Chiarn:
as ren ad beg y hoiaghey jeh coyrle yn Er-syrjey;
Ren eh neesht ny creeaghyn oc y injillaghey trooid seaghyn:
huitt ad sheese, as cha row unnane erbee dy chooney lhieu.
Myr shen tra deie ad gys y Chiarn ayns nyn seaghyn:
livrey eh ad ass nyn jennid.
Hug eh lesh ad magh ass dorraghys, as scadoo yn vaaish, as vrish eh ny kianglaghyn oc veih‐my‐cheilley.
O dy jinnagh deiney er‐y‐fa shen yn Chiarn y voylley son e vieys:
as fockley magh ny yindyssyn t'eh dy yannoo son cloan gheiney!
Son t'eh er vrishey ny giattyn prash:
as er giarey ny barryn yiarn veih‐my‐cheilley.
Ta deiney ommijagh er nyn gerraghey son nyn ghrogh‐yannoo:
as kyndagh rish nyn olkys.
Va dwoaie ec yn annym oc er dy chooilley cheint dy veaghey:
as v'ad dy jarroo faggys ec dorrys y vaaish.
Myr shen tra deie ad gys y Chiarn ayns nyn seaghyn:
livrey eh ad ass nyn jennid.
Chur eh magh e ockle, as ren eh ad y lheihys:
as v'ad er nyn sauail veih nyn doyrt‐mow.
O dy jinnagh deiney er‐y‐fa shen yn Chiarn y voylley son e vieys:
as fockley magh ny yindyssyn t'eh dy yannoo son cloan gheiney!
Dy jebbagh ad da oural dy hoyrt‐booise:
as ny obbraghyn echey y ockley magh lesh gennallys.
Adsyn ta goll er yn aarkey ayns lhongyn:
as ta dellal ayns ny ushtaghyn mooarey.
Ad shoh ta fakin obbraghyn y Chiarn:
as e yindyssyn ayns y diunid.
Son ec e ockle ta'n gheay stermagh girree:
ta troggal seose ny tonnyn echey.
T'ad er nyn ymmyrkey seose 'syn aer, as sheese reesht gys y diunid:
ta'n annym oc lheie ersooyl er coontey nyn seaghyn.
T'ad criht noon as noal, as leaystey myr dooinney meshtal:
as t'ad ec kione nyn geilley.
Myr shen tra t'ad geamagh gys y Chiarn ayns nyn seaghyn:
t'eh dy livrey ad ass nyn jennid.
T'eh cur er y sterrym dy ve kuine:
myr shen dy vel ny tonnyn goaill fea.
Eisht t'ad gennal, er‐yn‐oyr dy vel ad ec fea:
as myr shen t'eh dy chur lesh ad gys y phurt bailliu 've ayn.
O dy jinnagh deiney er‐y‐fa-shen yn Chiarn y voylley son e vieys:
as fockley magh ny yindyssyn t'eh dy yannoo son cloan gheiney!
Dy jinnagh ad eshyn neesht y ghloyraghey ayns sheshaght y phobble:
as eh y voylley ayns stoyl y chanstyr!
Ta chyndaa ny thooillaghyn gys faasagh:
as chyrmaghey seose ny farraneyn ushtey.
Cheer messoil t'eh dy yannoo faase:
er coontey yn drogh‐yannoo ocsyn ta baghey ayn.
Reesht t'eh jannoo yn aasagh ny loghan ushtey:
as geillyn jeh thalloo chirrym.
As ayns shen t'eh soiaghey ny accryssee:
dy vod ad ard‐valley y hroggal daue hene dy chummal ayn;
Dy vod ad nyn dhalloo y chuirr, as garaghyn‐feeyney y hoiaghey:
dy ymmyrkey magh daue ny messyn dy vishaghey.
T'eh dy nyn mannaghey ad, dy vel ad bishaghey erskyn towse:
as cha vel eh surranse da'n maase oc dy ve ny sloo ayns earroo.
Reesht, tra t'ad er nyn leodaghey as er nyn injillaghey:
liorish tranlaase, trooid arkys ny seaghyn erbee;
Ga dy vel eh surranse ad dy gheddyn drogh ghellal veih reiltee tranlaasagh, as lhiggey daue goll er‐shaghryn jeh'n raad ayns yn aasagh;
Ny yeih t'eh cooney lesh y voght ass e heaghyn:
as bishaghey yn lught‐thie echey myr shioltane keyrragh.
Smooinee yn vooinjer chairagh er shoh, as gow‐ee ad boggey:
as bee beeal dy chooilley olkys er ny yeigh.
Quoi‐erbee ta creeney nee ad goaill ny reddyn shoh gys nyn gree:
as toig-ee ad kenjallys‐ghraihagh y Chiarn.
O YEE ta my chree aggindagh, ta my chree aggindagh:
goym arrane, as verym moylley lesh rere my phooar.
Dooisht, uss lute as chlaasagh:
dooisht‐yms mee-hene feer voghey.
Verym booise dhyts, O Hiarn, mastey'n pobble:
goym arraneyn‐moyllee hoods mastey ny ashoonyn.
Son ta dty vyghin ny syrjey na ny niaughyn:
as ta dty ynrickys roshtyn gys ny bodjallyn.
Soie oo hene seose, O Yee, erskyn ny niaughyn:
as dty ghloyr erskyn ooilley yn seihll;
Dy vod dty chloan reiht v'er nyn livrey:
lhig da dty laue yesh ad y hauail, as clasht uss rhyms.
Ta Jee er loayrt ayns e chasherickys, Neem er‐y‐fa-shen boggey' ghoaill, as rheynym Sichem:
as towse‐ym magh coan Succoth.
Ta Gilead lhiam's, as lhiam's Manasses:
ta Ephraim myrgeddin troshid my ching:
Ta Judah my er‐reill 'sy leigh, Moab my haagh‐nieeaghyn:
shooill‐ym harrish Edom:
harrish Philistia yioym y varriaght.
Quoi nee my leeideill gys yn ard‐valley lajer:
quoi ver lesh mee stiagh gys Edom?
Nagh vel uss er hreigeil shin, O Yee:
as nagh jean uss, O Yee, goll magh marish ny sheshaghtyn‐caggee ain?
O cooin lhien noi yn noid:
son's fardalagh ta cooney dooinney,
Trooid Jee nee mayd obbraghyn mooarey:
as eshyn eh ver fo chosh nyn noidyn.
NY bee uss dty host, O Yee my voylley:
son ta beeal ny mee‐chrauee, dy jarroo, ta beeal yn vooinjer volteyragh er ny osley m'oi.
As t'ad er loayrt m'oi lesh chengaghyn foalsey:
t'ad er jeet mygeayrt‐y‐moo'm lesh focklyn dwoaiagh, as er chaggey m'oi gyn oyr.
Son y ghraih v'aym orroosyn, cur‐my‐ner, t'ad nish shassoo m'oi:
agh ta mish dy chur mee hene seose gys padjer.
Myr shoh t'ad er chooilleeney dou olk son mie:
as goanlys er son my aigney mie.
Nee dooinney mee‐chrauee reill y ymmyrkey harrish:
as shassee Noid‐ny‐hanmey ec e laue yesh.
Tra vees briwnys er ny choyrt er, bee eh er ny gheyrey:
as bee'n phadjer echey er ny hyndaa gys peccah.
Bee e laghyn giare:
as gow‐ee fer elley yn oik echey.
Bee'n chloan echey gyn ayr:
as y ven echey treoghe.
Bee'n chloan echey nyn gercheenyn, as shooyl ny dhieyn son jeirk:
shirree ad eh ayns buill fadane.
Nee'n dooinney tranlaasagh ooilley ny t'echey y chur mow:
as nee'n joarree e laboraght y spooilley.
Cha gow dooinney erbee chymmey jeh:
ny erreeish y hoilshaghey da e chloan gyn ayr.
Bee'n sluight echey er ny chur naardey:
as ayns yn nah heeloghe, bee'n ennym echey dy bollagh er ny yarrood.
Bee olkys ny ayraghyn echey er ny reayll ayns cooinaghtyn ayns shilley'n Chiarn:
as cha bee peccah e voir er ny chieltyn.
Bee ad dy kinjagh kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn:
dy vod eh yn imraa jeu y astyrt dy bollagh jeh'n ooir.
As shoh, son nagh row e aigney dy yannoo mie:
agh ren eh tranlaase er y voght gyn cooney, dy voddagh eh eshyn y stroie va seaghnit ayns cree.
Va e haitnys ayns gweeaghyn, as hig eh er:
cha bynney lesh bannaght, shen‐y‐fa bee eh foddey voish.
Choamree eh eh‐hene lesh gweeaghyn myr lesh garmad:
as hed eh stiagh ayns e vynnagh myr ushtey, as myr ooill ayns e chraueyn.
Bee eh da myr y cloagey t'eh dy cheau:
as myr y cryss ta dy kinjagh mysh.
Shoh myr nee eh taghyrt da my noidyn veih'n Chiarn:
as dauesyn myrgeddin ta loayrt dy olk noi m'annym.
Agh dell uss rhym's, O Hiarn my Yee, cordail rish dty Ennym:
son s'millish ta dty vyghin.
O livrey mee, son ta mee ymmyrchagh as gyn cooney:
as ta my chree gooint cheusthie jee'm.
Ta mee goll ass shoh myr y scadoo ta scughey ersooyl:
ta mee eiyrit noon as noal myr y locust.
Ta my ghlioonyn annoon lesh trostey:
ta my eill shymlit son laccal soo.
Haink mee myrgeddin dy ve oltooan daue:
adsyn va jeeaghyn orrym chrie ad nyn ghing.
Cooin lhiam, O Hiarn my Yee:
O jean uss mish y hauail cordail rish dty vyghin.
As bee fys oc dy nee shoh dty laue:
as dy nee uss, Hiarn, t'er n'yannoo eh.
Ga dy vel adsyn gweeaghyn, ny yeih jean uss bannaghey:
as lhig daue ve er nyn goyrt gys nearey ta girree seose m'oi:
agh lhig da dty harvaant boggey 'ghoaill.
Lhig da my noidyn ve er nyn goamrey lesh nearey:
as lhig daue ve coodit lesh nyn scammylt hene myr lesh cloagey.
Er my hon's, verym mooarane booise da'n Chiarn lesh my veeal:
as neem eshyn y voylley mastey earroo yn phobble.
Son shassee eh ec laue yesh y voght:
dy hauail e annym veih briwnyn neu‐chairagh.
DOOYRT y Chiarn rish my Hiarn's:
Soie uss er my laue yesh, derrey neem dty noidyn y yannoo stoyl dty choshey.
Nee'n Chiarn lorg dty phooar y chur veih Sion:
bee uss dty er‐reill, eer ayns mean dty noidyn.
Ayns laa dty phooar nee yn pobble ourallyn arryltagh y hebbal hoods lesh ooashley crauee:
ta druight yn cheet ayd er y theihll veih brein y voghrey.
Ta'n Chiarn er vreearrey, as cha gow eh arrys:
T'ou uss Ard‐saggyrt dy bragh myr va Melchisedech.
Nee'n Chiarn er dty laue yesh:
eer reeaghyn y chur mow ayns laa e yymmoose.
Ver eh briwnys mastey ny ashoonyn:
lhieenee eh ny ynnydyn lesh ny kirp marroo:
as ard reilltee ymmodee cheeraghyn y chur fo‐chosh.
Iu‐ee eh jeh'n strooan er y raad:
shen‐y‐fa troggee eh seose e chione.
VERYMS booise da'n Chiarn lesh ooilley my chree:
ayns sheshaght er‐lheh yn vooinjer chrauee, as ayns chaglym y phobble.
Ta obbraghyn y Chiarn mooar:
er nyn gheddyn magh lioroosyn ooilley ta goaill taitnys ayndoo.
Ta'n obbyr echey feeu moylley as ooashley:
as ta e chairys farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ta'n Chiarn myghinagh as graysoil myr shen er n'yannoo e obbraghyn yindyssagh:
dy lhisagh ad ve freillt ayns cooinaghtyn.
T'eh er chur beaghey dauesyn ta goaill aggle roish:
bee eh dy bragh cooinaghtyn er e chonaant.
T'eh er hoilshaghey da e phobble pooar e obbraghyn:
dy voddagh eh cur daue eiraght ny ashoonyn.
Ta obbraghyn e laueyn ynrickys as briwnys:
ta ooilley e annaghyn firrinagh.
T'ad shassoo shickyr son dy bragh as dy bragh:
as t'ad jeant ayns firrinys as corrymid.
T'eh er choyrt feaysley da e phobble:
t'eh er harey e chonaant son dy bragh; casherick as arrymagh ta'n Ennym echey.
Ta aggle y Chiarn toshiaght creenaght:
toiggal mie t'ocsyn ooilley ta dy ymmyrkey ad hene cordail rish:
ta'n moylley echey farraghtyn son dy bragh.
BANNIT ta'n dooinney ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn:
ta taitnys mooar echey ayns e annaghyn.
Bee yn sluight echey niartal er y thalloo:
bee bannaght gour yn vooinjer ynrick.
Bee berchys as palchey ayns e hie:
as nee e chairys farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Da'n dooinney crauee ta soilshey brishey magh ayns y dorraghys:
t'eh myghinagh, graihagh, as cairagh.
Ta dooinney mie erreeishagh, as coyrt er eeasaght:
as nee eh e ghlare y reill lesh tushtey.
Son cha bee eh dy bragh er ny scughey:
as bee'n dooinney ynrick freilt ayns cooinaghtyn er son dy bragh.
Cha bee eh agglagh jeh drogh naight erbee:
son ta e chree shassoo shickyr, as credjal ayns y Chiarn.
Ta e chree er ny hickyraghey, as cha vaill eh:
derrey hee eh e aigney er e noidyn.
T'eh er skeayley dy lhean as er choyrt da ny boghtyn:
as ta e chairys farraghtyn son dy bragh:
bee'n ennym echey er ny hoiaghey seose lesh ooashley.
Hee yn mee‐chrauee eh, as bee eh trimshey da:
nee eh snaggeraght lesh e eeacklyn, as lheie ersooyl; nee yeearree yn vooinjer vee‐chrauee cherraghtyn.
MOYLLEY‐JEE yn Chiarn, shiuish e harvaantyn:
O moylley‐jee Ennym y Chiarn.
Bannit dy row Ennym y Chiarn:
veih'n traa shoh magh er son dy bragh.
Ta Ennym y Chiarn er ny voylley:
veih irree gys lhie ny greiney.
Ta'n Chiarn ard erskyn dy chooilley ashoon:
as ta e ghloyr erskyn ny niaughyn.
Quoi ta casley rish y Chiarn y Jee ain, ta e ynnyd‐vaghee cha ard:
as ny yeih t'eh ginjillaghey eh hene dy chur‐my‐ner ny reddyn t'ayns niau as er y thalloo?
T'eh goaill seose yn fer imlee ass y joan:
as troggal yn ymmyrchagh veih'n thorran;
Dy vod eh eshyn y hoiaghey seose mastey ny princeyn:
dy jarroo mastey princeyn e phobble.
T'eh cur er y ven ghennish dy reayll thie:
as dy ve ny moir ghennal dy chloan.
TRA haink Israel magh ass Egypt:
as thie Yacob veih mastey'n pobble joarree.
Va Judah e ynnyd casherick:
as Israel e reeriaght.
Honnick y faarkey shoh, as ren eh chea:
va Jordan er ny imman noi'n choorse.
Ren ny sleityn lheim myr reaghyn:
as ny croink veggey myr eayin.
Cre haink ort's, O aarkey, dy ren oo chea:
as ort's, Yordan, dy row er dty imman back?
Shiuish sleityn dy lheim shiu myr reaghyn:
as shiuish chroink veggey myr eayin?
Bee er‐creau, uss halloo, ec fenish y Chiarn:
ec fenish Jee Yacob;
Hyndaa yn chreg chreoi gys poyll ushtey:
as y chlagh flint gys chibbyr gheill.
CHA nee dooinyn, O Hiarn, cha nee dooinyn, agh da dty Ennym cur yn moylley:
son dty vyghin ghraihagh, as er coontey dty ynrickys.
Cre'n‐fa jir ny ashoonyn‐quaagh:
Cre'n raad ta nish yn Jee oc?
Er son y Jee ainyn, t'eh ayns niau:
t'eh er n'yannoo myr s'gooidsave lesh.
Ta ny jallooyn oc argid as airh:
eer obbyr laueyn deiney.
Ta beill oc as cha vel ad loayrt:
ta sooillyn oc as cha vel ad fakin.
Ta cleayshyn oc as cha vel ad chlashtyn:
ta stroanyn oc as cha vel ad soaral.
Ta laueyn oc as cha vel ad loaghtey, cassyn t'oc as cha vel ad shooyl:
chamoo t'ad loayrt trooid nyn scoarnagh.
T'adsyn ta jannoo ad casley roo:
as myr shen t'adsyn ooilley ta cur nyn dreishteil ayndoo.
Agh uss hie Israel, treisht uss ayns y Chiarn:
she eshyn nyn gemmyrk as nyn vendeil.
Shiuish hie Aaron, cur‐jee nyn dreishteil ayns y Chiarn:
eshyn y fer coonee as y fendeilagh oc.
Shiuish ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, cur‐jee nyn dreishteil ayns y Chiarn:
eshyn y fer‐coonee as y fendeilagh oc.
Ta'n Chiarn er chooinaghtyn orrin, as bannee eh shin:
dy jarroo nee eh thie Israel y vannaghey, nee eh bannaghey thie Aaron.
Nee eh adsyn y vannaghey ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn:
chammah beg as mooar.
Nee'n Chiarn shiuish y vishaghey ny smoo as ny smoo:
shiuish as nyn gloan.
Shiuish ta cloan bannit y Chiarn:
chroo niau as y thalloo.
Ta ny slane niaughyn lesh y Chiarn:
yn thalloo t'eh er choyrt da cloan gheiney.
Cha vel ny merriu coyrt moylley dhyts, O Hiarn:
ny adsyn ooilley ta goll sheese ayns yn oaie.
Agh nee shinyn y Chiarn y voylley:
veih'n traa shoh magh son dy bragh. Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn.
TA mee feer wooiagh:
dy vel y Chiarn er chlashtyn coraa my phadjer;
Dy vel eh er chroymmey e chleaysh hym:
shen‐y‐fa neem geamagh er choud as veem bio.
Haink ribbaghyn y vaaish mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
as ghow pianyn niurin greme orrym.
Hooar me seaghyn as trimshey, as ren mee geamagh er Ennym y Chiarn:
O Hiarn, ta me guee ort, livrey m'annym.
Ta'n Chiarn graysoil as cairal:
dy jarroo, ta'n Jee ainyn myghinagh.
Ta'n Chiarn coadey adsyn ta gyn loght:
va mish ayns seaghyn, as chooin eh lhiam.
Chyndaa reesht eisht gys dt'ea, O my annym:
son ta'n Chiarn er dty chooilleeney.
As cre'n fa? t'ou er livrey m'annym veih baase:
my hooillyn veih jeir, as my chassyn veih tuittym.
Neem's gimmeeaght kiongoyrt rish y Chiarn:
ayns cheer y slein bio.
Ren mee credjal, as shen‐y‐ta neem loayrt; agh va mee dy mooar seaghnit:
dooyrt mee ayns my hiyr, Ta dy chooilley ghooinney fardalys.
Cre'n cooilleeney verym da'n Chiarn:
son ooilley ny bannaghtyn t'eh er hoilshaghey dou?
Neem's goaill cappan y taualtys:
as neem geamagh er Ennym y Chiarn.
Neem my vreearaghyn y eeck nish kionfenish ooilley e phobble:
feer deyr ayns shilley'n Chiarn ta baase e nooghyn.
Cur‐my‐ner, O Hiarn, kys dy vel mish dty harvaant:
ta mish dty harvaant, as mac dt'inneyveyl; t'ou er vrishey my chianglaghyn veih‐my‐cheilley.
Cheb‐ym hoods yn oural dy hoyrt‐booise:
as neem geamagh er Ennym y Chiarn.
Eeck‐ym my vreearaghyn gys y Chiarn, ayns fenish ooilley e phobble:
ayns cooyrtyn thie yn Chiarn, dy jarroo, ayns y vean ayds, O Yerusalem. Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn.
O MOYLLEY-JEE yn Chiarn, ooilley shiuish ashoonyn:
moylley‐jee eh, ooilley shiuish e phobble.
Son ta e chenjallys vyghinagh dy kinjagh ny smoo as ny smoo er ny hoilshaghey orrin:
as ta firrinys y Chiarn farraghtyn son dy bragh. Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn.
O CUR‐JEE booise da'n Chiarn, son t'eh graysoil:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Lhig da Israel nish goaill-rish dy vel eh graysoil:
as dy vel e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Lhig da thie Aaron nish goaill‐rish:
dy vel e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Dy jarroo, lhig dauesyn ta nish aggle orroo roish y Chiarn, goaill‐rish:
dy vel e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Deie mee er y Chiarn ayns my heaghyn:
as hug y Chiarn slane clashtyn dou.
Ta'n Chiarn er my lheh's:
cha bee aggle orrym jeh ny oddys dooinney y yannoo rhym.
Ta'n Chiarn goaill my phaart maroosyn ta cooney lhiam:
shen‐y‐fa hee‐ym my yeearree er my noidyn.
Te ny share dy hreishteil ayns y Chiarn:
na dy chur barrant erbee gys dooinney.
Te ny share dy hreishteil ayns y Chiarn:
na dy chur treishteil erbee ayns princeyn.
Ren dy chooilley ashoon cheet mygeayrt‐y‐moom:
agh ayns Ennym y Chiarn neem ad y stroie.
Ren ad m'y hionney er dy chooilley heu, haink ad chionn orrym, ta mee gra, er dy chooilley heu:
agh ayns Ennym y Chiarn stroie‐ym ad.
Haink ad mygeayrt‐y‐moom myr shellanyn as t'ad er ny vooghey myr aile mastey drineyn:
son ayns Ennym y Chiarn neem ad y stroie.
T'ou er lhie dy trome orrym dy my lhieggal:
agh va'n Chiarn my chooney.
Ta'n Chiarn my niart as my arrane; as t'eh er jeet dy ve my haualtys.
Ta coraa boggey as slaynt ayns cummallyn y vooinjer chairagh:
ta laue yesh y Chiarn coyrt lesh reddyn yindyssagh gys kione.
Ta laue yesh y Chiarn erskyn ooilley:
ta laue yesh y Chiarn cur lesh reddyn yindyssagh mygeayrt.
Cha voym baase, agh beem er my reayll bio; dy hoilshaghey magh obbraghyn y Chiarn.
Ta'n Chiarn er my smaghtaghey as er my cherraghey:
agh cha vel eh er my livrey harrish gys baase.
Foshil‐jee dooys giattyn y chairys:
dy voddym goll stiagh orroo, as booise y choyrt da'n Chiarn.
Shoh giat y Chiarn:
hed y vooinjer chrauee stiagh ayn.
Ver‐yms booise dhyt, son t'ou er my chlashtyn:
as er jeet dy ve my haualtys.
Yn chlagh cheddin ren ny masoonee y vee‐lowal:
ta er jeet dy ve yn ard-chlagh chorneilagh.
Shoh jannoo yn Chiarn:
as te yindyssagh ayns ny sooillyn ain.
Shoh'n laa ta'n Chiarn er n'oardaghey:
gow‐ee mayd boggey as bee mayd gennal ayn.
Cooin lhiam nish, O Hiarn:
O Hiarn, cur dooin nish maynrys.
Bannit t'eshyn ta cheet ayns Ennym y Chiarn:
ta shin er vannaghey diuish ta jeh thie'n Chiarn.
Jee yn Chiarn t'er chur dooin soilshey:
kiangle‐jee yn oural lesh coyrdyn, gys eer eairkyn yn altar.
She uss my Yee, as verym booise dhyt:
uss my Yee, as ver‐ym moylley dhyt.
O cur‐jee booise da'n Chiarn, son t'eh graysoil:
as ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
BANNIT t'adsyn ta ynrick ayns y raad:
as ta gimmeeaght ayns leigh yn Chiarn.
Bannit t'adsyn ta freayll ny recortyssyn echey:
as shirrey er e hon lesh ooilley nyn gree.
Son t'adsyn nagh vel jannoo veg yn olk:
gimmeeaght ayns e raaidyn.
T'ou uss er harey shin:
dy imneagh dy reayll dt'annaghyn.
Oh, dy beagh my raaidyn cha jeeragh shen dy voddin dty 'lattyssyn y reayll!
Myr shen cha beem er my choyrt gys nearey:
choud's ta mee coyrt tastey da ooilley dty annaghyn.
Verym booise dhyt lesh cree firrinagh:
tra veem er n'ynsaghey briwnyssyn dty chairys.
Freill‐ym dty oardaghyn:
O ny treig mee dy bollagh.
CRE'N aght nee dooinney aeg e raaidyn y reayll glen:
dy jarroo liorish reill eh hene cordail rish dty ghoo?
Lesh ooilley my chree ta mee er hirrey er dty hon:
O ny lhig dou goll er‐shaghryn veih dty annaghyn.
Dty ghoan ta mee er ollaghey cheu‐sthie ayns my chree:
nagh jinnin peccah dt'oi.
Bannit t'ou uss, O Hiarn:
O ynsee dou dty 'lattyssyn.
Lesh my veillyn ta mee er ny ve ginsh:
jeh ooilley briwnyssyn dty veeall.
Ta taitnys wheesh er ve aym ayns raad dty leighyn:
as ayns dy chooilley vonney dy verchys.
Neem taggloo jeh dt'annaghyn:
as verym geill da dty raaidyn.
Bee my haitnys ayns dty 'lattyssyn:
as cha jarrood‐ym dty ghoo.
O JEAN mie da dty harvaant:
dy voddym 've bio as dty ghoo y reayll.
Foshil uss my hooillyn:
dy voddym fakin reddyn yindyssagh dty leigh.
Ta mee my yoarree er y thalloo:
O ny jean uss keiltyn voym dty annaghyn.
Ta m'annym brishey magh son y ghraih feer jeean t'eck dy kinjagh gys dt'oardaghyn.
T'ou er choyrt oghsan da ny mooaralee:
as cursit t'adsyn ooilley ta goll er‐shaghryn veih dty annaghyn.
O chyndaa voym's nearey as oghsan:
son ta mee er vreaylley dty recortyssyn.
Ren princeyn myrgeddin soie as loayrt m'oi:
agh ta dty harvaant thaghey eh hene ayns dty 'lattyssyn.
Son ta ny recortyssyn ayds my voggey:
as my ir‐choyrlee.
TA m'annym lhiantyn gys y joan:
O jean uss mish y vioghey cordail rish dty ghoo.
Ta mee er ghoaill‐rish my raaidyn, as t'ou uss er my chlashtyn:
O ynsee dou dty 'lattyssyn.
Cur orrym toiggal raad dt'annaghyn:
as myr shen neem taggloo jeh dt'obbraghyn yindyssagh.
Ta m'annym's lheie ersooyl son eer trimshey:
jean m'y gherjaghey cordail rish dty ghoo.
Scugh foddey voym yn raad dy vreagyn:
as cur orrym mooar y yannoo jeh dty leigh.
Ta mee er reih raad ny firrinys:
as dty vriwnyssyn ta mee er hoiaghey kiongoyrt rhym.
Ta mee er lhiantyn gys dty recortyssyn:
O Hiarn, ny jean mish y choyrt gys nearey.
Neem's roie ayns raad dty annaghyn:
tra t'ou uss er hoiaghey my chree ec reamys.
YNSEE dou, O Hiarn, raad dty 'lattyssyn:
as freill‐ym eh gys y jerrey.
Cur dou tushtey, as freill‐ym dty leigh:
freill‐ym eh dy jarroo lesh ooilley my chree.
Cur orrym dy immeeaght ayns cassan dt'annaghyn:
son shen y raad ta my yeearree.
Croym my chree gys dty recortyssyn:
as cha nee gys saynt.
O chyndaa ersooyl my hooillyn, nagh der ad geill da fardail:
as jean mish y vioghey ayns dty raad.
O niartee dty ghoo ayns dty harvaant:
dy voddyms aggle y ghoaill royd.
Gow ersooyl yn kerraghey ta mee goaill aggle roish:
son ta dty vriwnyssyn mie.
Cur‐my‐ner, ta my haitnys ayns dt'annaghyn:
O jean mish y vioghey ayns dty chairys.
LHIG da dty vyghin ghraihagh cheet myrgeddin hyms, O Hiarn:
dy jarroo dty haualtys, cordail rish dty ghoo.
Shen myr verym ansoor da my noidyn:
son ta my hreishteil ayns dty ghoo.
O ny gow yn goo dy ynrickys dy bollagh ass my veeal:
son ta my hreishteil ayns dty vriwnyssyn.
Myr shen freill‐ym dy kinjagh dty leigh:
dy feer, son dy bragh as dy bragh.
As neem gimmeeaght ec my reamys:
son ta mee shirrey dt'annaghyn.
Loayr‐yms jeh dty recortyssyn myrgeddin, dy jarroo fenish reeaghyn:
as cha jean‐ym nearey ghoaill.
As bee my haitnys ayns dt'annaghyn:
ta mee er ve graihagh orroo.
My laueyn neesht trog-ym seose gys dt'annaghyn, ta mee er ve graihagh orroo:
as bee my smooinaghtyn dowin er dty 'lattyssyn.
O SMOOINEE er dty harvaant cordail rish dty ghoo:
ayn t'ou er choyrt orrym dy chur my hreishteil.
Shoh ta dy my gherjaghey ayns my heaghyn:
son ta dty ghoo er my vioghey.
Ta mee ec ny mooaralee feer vooar ayns faghid:
ny‐yeih cha vel mee er skyrraghtyn veih dty leigh.
Son chooinee mee er dty vriwnyssyn er dyn chenn earish, O Hiarn:
as va mee er my gherjaghey.
Ta mee fo aggle atchimagh:
er coontey ny mee‐chrauee ta treigeil dty leigh.
Ta dty 'lattyssyn er ve my arraneyn:
ayns thie my yoarreeaght.
Ta mee er smooinaghtyn er dt'Ennyms, O Hiarn, ayns earish ny hoie:
as er vreayll dty leigh.
Shoh va my gherjaghey:
er‐y‐fa dy dreill mee dty annaghyn.
USS my eiraght, O Hiarn:
ta mee er gialdyn dy reayll dty leigh.
Ren mee my accan imlee ayns dt'enish lesh ooilley my chree; O bee myghinagh dou cordail rish dty ghoo.
Deie mee er my raaidyn hene gys cooinaghtyn:
as hyndaa mee my chassyn gys dty recortyssyn.
Ren mee siyr, as cha lhig mee shaghey yn traa:
dy reayll dty annaghyn.
Ta sheshaghtyn ny mee‐chrauee er my roostey:
agh cha vel mish er yarrood dty leigh.
Ec y vean oie neem girree dy chur booise dhyt:
er coontey dty vriwnyssyn cairagh.
Ta mee my heshey dauesyn ooilley ta goaill aggle royd:
as ta freayll dty annaghyn.
Ta'n seihll, O Hiarn, lane jeh dty vyghin:
O ynsee dou dty 'lattyssyn.
O HIARN, t'ou er ghellal dy graysoil rish dty harvaant:
cordail rish dty ghoo.
O ynsee dou toiggal as tushtey firrinagh:
son ta mee er chredjal dty annaghyn.
Roish my row mee seaghnit, hie mee er‐shaghryn:
agh nish ta mee er vreayll dty ghoo.
T'ou uss mie as graysoil:
O ynsee dou dty 'lattyssyn.
Ta ny mooaralee er droggal breg orrym:
agh freill‐yms dt'annaghyn lesh ooilley my chree.
Ta'n cree oc cha roauyr as saill:
agh ta my haitnys er ve ayns dty leigh.
S'mie te er my hon dy row mee ayns seaghyn:
dy voddym gynsaghey dty 'lattyssyn.
Ta leigh dty veeal ny smoo dy voggey dou:
na millaghyn dy airh as argid.
TA dty laueyn er my chroo as er my chummey:
O cur dou tushtey, dy voddym gynsaghey dty annaghyn.
Bee adsyn ta goaill aggle royd, gennal tra hee ad mee:
er‐yn‐oyr dy vel mee er choyrt my hreishteil ayns dty ghoo.
Ta fys aym, O Hiarn, dy vel dty vriwnyssyn cairagh:
as dy vel oo ayns eer ynrickys er choyrt seaghyn orrym.
O lhig da dty chenjallys vyghinagh ve my gherjagh:
cordail rish dty ghoo da dty harvaant.
O lhig da dty vyghinyn graihagh cheet hym's, dy voddym 've bio:
son ta my voggey ayns dty leigh.
Lhig da ny mooaralee ve coodit lesh nearey, son t'ad dy olkyssagh goll mygeayrt dy my stroie:
agh neem's smooinaghtyn dy dowin er dty annaghyn.
Lhig dauesyn ta goaill aggle royd, as t'er hoiggal dty recortyssyn:
v'er nyn jyndaa hyms.
O lhig da my chree v'er ny hickyraghey ayns dty 'lattyssyn:
nagh bee nearey orrym.
TA my annym er ghoaill foddeeaght son dty haualtys:
as ta my hreishteil mie er graih dty'ghoo.
Ta my hooillyn farkiaght dy jeean son dty ghoo:
gra, O cuinn nee oo mish y gherjaghey?
Son ta mee shymlit myr crackan ayns y jaagh:
ny‐yeih cha vel mee jarrood dty 'lattyssyn.
Cre whilleen ta laghyn dty harvaant:
cuinn nee oo cooilleen y ghoaill orroosyn ta jannoo tranlaase orrym?
Ta'n sleih moyrnagh er chleiy ooigyn er my hon:
nagh vel cordail rish dty leigh.
Ta ooilley dty annaghyn firrinagh:
t'ad jannoo tranlaase orrym dy aggairagh; O bee uss my niart.
V'ad faggys er n'yannoo kione orrym er y thalloo:
agh cha hreig mee dty annaghyn.
O jean mish y vioghey lurg dty chenjallys-ghraihagh:
as myr shen freill‐ym recortyssyn dty veeall.
O HIARN, ta dty ghoo farraghtyn son dy bragh ayns niau.
Ta dty irriney myrgeddin farraghtyn veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe:
t'ou er hoiaghey undin ny hooirey, as te er‐mayrn.
T'ad tannaghtyn gys y laa t'ayn jiu cordail rish dty oardagh:
son ta dy chooilley nhee dy dty hirveish.
Erbe dy row my voggey ayns dty leigh:
veign er herraghtyn ayns my heaghyn.
Cha jarrood‐ym dty annaghyn dy bragh:
son lioroosyn t'ou er my vioghey.
Ta mee lhiats; O saue mee:
son ta mee er hirrey lurg dty annaghyn.
Ren ny mee‐chrauee lhie ayns farkiaght er my hon dy my stroie:
agh smooinee‐yms er dty recortyssyn.
Ta mee fakin dy vel jerrey er dy chooilley nhee:
agh ta dty annaghyn erskyn towse lhean.
HIARN, cre'n ghraih t'ayms er dty leigh:
fey‐ny‐laa ta mee smooinaghtyn er dy dowin.
T'ou uss trooid dty annaghyn er my yannoo ny s'creeney na my noidyn:
son t'ad dy kinjagh mârym.
Ta ny smoo dy hushtey aym na t'ec my ir‐ynsee:
son ayns dty recortyssyn ta mee baarail my smooinaghtyn.
Ta mee ny s'creeney na'n chenndeeaght:
er‐yn‐oyr dy vel mee freayll dty annaghyn.
Ta mee er chummal my chassyn veih dy chooilley ghrogh raad:
dy voddin freayll dty ghoo.
Cha vel mee er skyrraghtyn veih dty vriwnyssyn:
son t'ou dy my ynsaghey.
O cre cha millish ta dty ghoan gys my vlass:
dy jarroo, ny s'miljey na mill da my veeal!
Trooid dty annaghyn ta mee geddyn tushtey:
shen‐y‐fa ta dwoaie aym er dy chooilley ghrogh raad.
TA dty ghoo londeyr da my chassyn:
as soilshey da my chesmadyn.
Ta mee er vreearrey, as ta mee dy shickyr kiarit:
dy reayll dty vriwnyssyn.
Ta mee seaghnit erskyn towse:
jean mish y vioghey, O Hiarn, cordail rish dty ghoo.
Lhig da ourallyn-arryltagh my veeal uss y wooiys, O Hiarn:
as ynsee dou dty vriwnyssyn.
Ta m'annym dy kinjagh ayns my laue:
ny‐yeih cha vel mee jarrood dty leigh.
Ta ny mee‐chrauee er hoiaghey ribbey er my hon:
agh ny‐yeih cha jagh mee er‐shaghryn veih dty annaghyn.
Dty recortyssyn ta mee er hirrey myr m'eiraght son dy bragh:
as cre'n‐fa? t'ad eer boggey my chree.
Ta mee er chroymmey my chree dy chooilleeney dty 'lattyssyn dy kinjagh:
dy jarroo gys y jerrey.
TA dwoaie aym orroosyn ta smooinaghtyn er yn olk:
agh shynney lhiam dty leigh.
T'ou uss my endeilagh as my choadey:
as ta my hreishteil ayns dty ghoo.
Ass my enish, shiuish ghrogh‐yantee:
freill‐yms annaghyn my Yee.
O niartee mee cordail rish dty ghoo, dy voddym 've beayn:
as ny lhig dou tuittym giare jeh my hreishteil.
Jean uss mish y chummal seose, as beem sauchey; bee my haitnys dy jarroo ayns dty 'lattyssyn.
T'ou uss er choyrt fo chosh adsyn ooilley ta cur cooyl rish dty 'lattyssyn:
son cha vel ad smooinaghtyn agh er molteyraght.
T'ou sheebey ersooyl ooilley mee‐chrauee yn thallooin myr kesh:
shen‐y‐fa shynney lhiam dty recortyssyn.
Ta my eill er‐creau son aggle jeeds:
as ta mee fo atchim dty vriwnyssyn.
TA mee dellal ayns y chooish ta lowal as jeeragh:
O ny faag mee fo pooar my hranlaasee.
Cur er dty harvaant dy ghoaill taitnys ayns shen ny ta mie:
nagh jean ny mooaralee veg yn aggair dou.
Ta my hoilshey er vailleil lesh jeeaghyn son dty lhaynt:
as son goo dty chairys.
O dell rish dty harvaant cordail rish dty vyghin ghraihagh:
as ynsee dou dty 'lattyssyn.
Ta mish dty harvaant; O cur dou tushtey:
dy voddym toiggal dty 'lattyssyn.
Te traa dhyt, Hiarn, dy hroggal dty laue:
son t'ad er choyrt naardey dty leigh.
Son shynney lhiam dty annaghyn:
erskyn airh as claghyn costal.
Shen‐y‐fa ta mee cummal jeeragh ayns ooilley dty annaghyn:
agh son raaidyn cammey ta slane dwoaie aym orroo ooilley.
TA dty recortyssyn yindyssagh:
shen‐y‐fa ta m'annym dy reayll ad.
Tra ta dty ghoo goll magh:
te coyrt soilshey as creenaght da'n vooinjer ôney.
Doshil mee my veeal, as ghow mee ennal:
son ta my haitnys ayns dty annaghyn.
O jeeagh orrym, as bee myghinagh dou:
myr boallagh oo jannoo roosyn ta graihagh er dty Ennym.
Jean my chesmadyn y leeideil ayns dty ghoo:
as myr shen cha vow mee‐chraueeaght erbee barriaght orrym.
O livrey mee veih tranlaase drogh gheiney:
as myr shen freill‐ym dty annaghyn.
Lhig da dt'eddin soilshean er dty harvaant:
as ynsee dou dty 'lattyssyn.
Ta my hooillyn shilley lesh jeir:
er‐yn‐oyr nagh vel deiney freayll dty leigh.
T'OU uss cairagh, O Hiarn:
as ynrick ta dty vriwnyssyn.
Ny recortyssyn t'ou uss er n'oardaghey:
t'ad erskyn towse cairagh as firrinagh.
Ta my ghraih jeean er my choyrt eer naardey:
son dy vel my noidyn er yarrood dty ghoan.
Ta dty ghoo's er ny phrowal gys y chooid sodjey:
as ta graih ec dty harvaant er.
Ta mee fardalagh, as beg er ny hoiaghey jeem:
ny‐yeih cha vel mee jarrood dty annaghyn.
Ta'n chairys ayds cairys dy bragh farraghtyn:
as dty leigh yn irriney.
Ta seaghyn as trimshey er ghoaill greme orrym:
ny‐yeih ta my haitnys ayns dty annaghyn.
Ta cairys dty recortyssyn dy bragh farraghtyn:
O giall dou tushtey, as beem bio.
TA mee geamagh lesh ooilley my chree:
eaisht rhym, O Hiarn, freill‐ym dty 'lattyssyn.
Hoods, dy feer, ta mee geamagh:
cooin lhiam, as freill‐ym dty recortyssyn.
Ec brishey'n laa ta mee geamagh hoods:
son ayns dty ghoo ta my hreishteil.
Ta my hooillyn dooisht roish arrey ny hoie:
dy voddym my hraa 'vaarail ayns dty ghoan.
Clasht rish my choraa, O Hiarn, cordail rish dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh:
cur bree aynym myr boallagh oo.
T'ad tayrn er‐gerrey ta dy goanlyssagh jannoo tranlaase orrym:
as t'ad foddey veih dty leigh.
Bee uss er‐gerrey ec laue, O Hiarn:
son ta ooilley dty annaghyn firrinagh.
Mychione dt'annaghyn, ta fys aym foddey er dy henney:
dy vel oo er hoiaghey ad er undin shickyr son dy bragh.
O SMOOINEE er my arkys, as livrey mee:
son cha vel mee jarrood dty leigh.
Gow my chooish ayns laue as livrey mee:
jean mee y vioghey cordail rish dty ghoo.
Ta slaynt foddey voish ny mee‐chrauee:
son cha vel ad cur geill da dty 'lattyssyn.
S'mooar ta dty vyghin, O Hiarn:
jeau mee y vioghey myr boallagh oo.
Shimmey adsyn ta dy my voirey as jannoo tranlaase orrym:
ny‐yeih cha vel mish goll dy lhiattee voish dty recortyssyn.
Te trimshey dou dy akin ny drogh‐yantee:
son nagh vel ad freayll dty leigh.
Smooinee, O Hiarn, kys shynney lhiam dt'annaghyn:
O jean mish y vioghey cordail rish dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh.
Ta dty ghoo's firrinagh er dy rieau:
ta ooilley briwnyssyn dty chairys farraghtyn son dy bragh.
TA princeyn er n'yannoo tranlaase orrym gyn oyr:
agh ta my chree shassoo ayns aggle jeh dty ghoo.
Ta wheesh dy voggey aym jeh dty ghoo:
as t'ec fer ta cosney mooarane spooilley.
Er son breagyn, ta feoh as dwoaie aym orroo:
agh shynney lhiam dty leigh.
Shiaght keayrtyn 'sy laa ta mee dy dty voylley:
er graih dty vriwnyssyn cairagh.
S'mooar ta'n shee t'ocsyn ta graihagh er dty leigh:
as cha der nhee erbee orroo eh y hreigeil.
Hiarn, ta mee er yeeaghyn son dty haualtys slayntoil:
as er n'yannoo lurg dty annaghyn.
Ta m'annym er vreayll dty recortyssyn:
as er choyrt graih erskyn-towse daue.
Ta mee er vreayll dt'annaghyn as dty recortyssyn:
son ta ooilley my raaidyn kiongoyrt rhyt.
LHIG da my accan cheet kiongoyrt rhyt, O Hiarn:
cur dou tushtey cordail rish dty ghoo.
Lhig da my aghin cheet gys dt'enish:
livrey mee cordail rish dty ghoo.
Nee my veillyn fockley magh dty voylley:
tra t'ou er m'ynsaghey ayns dty 'lattyssyn:
Dy jarroo nee my hengey's arrane y ghoaill jeh dty ghoo:
son ta ooilley dt'annaghyn cairagh.
Lhig da dty laue cooney lhiam:
son ta mee er ghoaill dty annaghyn myr reih.
Ghow mee foddeeaght son dty haualtys slayntoil, O Hiarn:
as ayns dty leigh ta my haitnys.
O lhig da m'annym 've bio, as nee eh uss y voylley:
as nee dty vriwnyssyn cooney lhiam.
Ta mee er n'gholl er‐shaghryn myr keyrrey chailjey.
O cur lhiat thie dty harvaant; son cha vel mee jarrood dty annaghyn.
TRA va mee ayns seaghyn deie mee gys y Chiarn:
as ren eh m'y chlashtyn.
Livrey m'annym's, O Hiarn, veih meillyn breagagh:
as veih chengey molteyragh.
Cre'n leagh vees er ny choyrt ny er ny yannoo dhyts, O hengey oalsey:
dy jarroo sideyn lajer as geyre lesh smarageyn jiarg loshtee.
Smerg dou dy vel mee eginit dy chummal marish Mesech:
as dy vel my ynnyd‐vaghee mastey cabbaneyn Kedar!
Ta m'annym's er chummal foddey ny‐vud ocsyn:
ta nyn noidyn da shee.
Ta mee streeu son shee, agh cha vel mee ny‐sleaie loayrt roosyn jeh shen:
nagh vel ad jannoo ad hene aarloo gys caggey.
TROGG‐YM seose my hooillyn gys ny croink:
vouesyn ta my chooney cheet.
Ta my chooney cheet dy feer veih'n Chiarn:
t'er chroo niau as thalloo.
Cha lhig eh da dty chass dy v'er ny scughey:
as cha jean eshyn cadley ta dt'endeil.
Cur‐my‐ner, cha jean eshyn ta freayll Israel:
saveenagh ny cadley.
Ta'n Chiarn hene dt'endeilagh:
ta'n Chiarn dty niart er dty laue yesh;
Myr shen nagh jean chiass ny greiney oo y lostey 'sy laa:
n'yn eayst 'syn oie.
Nee'n Chiarn uss y choadey veih dy chooilley olk:
dy jarroo eshyn eh nee dt'annym y reayll.
Freill‐ee yn Chiarn dty gholl magh as dty heet stiagh:
veih'n traa shoh magh er son dy bragh.
S'MOOAR va my voggey tra dooyrt ad rhym:
Nee mayd goll gys thie'n Chiarn.
Shassee ny cassyn ainyn ayns dty ghiattyn:
O Yerusalem.
Ta Jerusalem troggit myr ard‐valley ta ec unnaneys ayn hene.
Son gys shen ta ny kynneeyn goll seose, dy jarroo kynneeyn y Chiarn:
dy ymmyrkey feanish da Israel, dy choyrt booise da Ennym y Chiarn.
Son shen y raad ta stoyl y vriwnys:
dy jarroo stoyl‐reeoil lught‐thie Ghavid.
O guee‐jee son shee Yerusalem:
nee adsyn bishaghey ta graihagh ort.
Shee dy row cheu‐sthie jeh dty voallaghyn:
as sonnys cheu‐sthie jeh dty chooyrtyn.
Er graih my vraaraghyn as my heshaghyn dooie:
guee‐ym son dty vaynrys.
Dy jarroo, son graih chiamble y Chiarn nyn Yee:
shir‐ym dy choyrt dty vie er y hoshiaght.
HOODS ta mee troggal seose my hooillyn:
O uss ta cummal ayns ny niaughyn.
Cur‐my‐ner, myr ta sooillyn ny fir‐vooinjerey jeeaghyn gys laue nyn mainshtyr, as myr ta sooillyn yn inney‐veyl gys laue e ben'ainshtyr:
dy jarroo myr shen ta ny sooillyn ainyn farkiaght er y Chiarn nyn Yee, derrey nee eh myghin orrin.
Jean myghin orrin, O Hiarn, jean myghin orrin:
son cha vel veg eddyr dy hoiaghey j'in.
Ta nyn annym lhieent lesh oltooan craidoilagh ny berchee:
as lesh goanlys ny mooaralee.
ER‐be dy row yn Chiarn hene er nyn lieh, foddee Israel nish gra:
er‐be dy row yn Chiarn hene er nyn lieh, tra dirree sleih seose nyn oi;
Veagh ad er nyn sluggey sheese bio:
tra v'ad cha eulyssagh ayns corree rooin.
Veagh ny ushtaghyn, dy feer, er vaih shin:
as veagh y thooilley er n'gholl harrish nyn annym.
Veagh ushtaghyn dowin ny mooaralee:
er n'gholl eer harrish nyn anmeenyn.
Agh moylley dy row gys y Chiarn:
nagh vel er livrey shin seose son spooilley da ny feeacklyn oc.
Ta'n annym ain er scapail, dy jarroo myr ushag ass ribbey yn shelgeyr:
ta'n ribbey er ny vrishey, as ta shin er nyn livrey.
Ta'n cooney ainyn shassoo ayns Ennym y Chiarn:
ta er chroo niau as thalloo.
BEE adsyn ta coyrt nyn dreishteil ayns y Chiarn, dy jarroo myr cronk Sion:
nagh vod v'er ny scughey, agh ta shassoo shickyr er son dy bragh.
Myr ta ny croink soit dy cruinn mygeayrt Jerusalem:
dy jarroo myr shen ta'n Chiarn mygeayrt e phobble, veih'n traa shoh magh er son dy bragh.
Son cha jig lorg ny mee‐chrauee er cronney yn vooinjer chairal:
son nagh der y sleih cairal nyn laue gys olkys.
Jean mie, O Hiarn:
dauesyn ta mie as firrinagh ayns cree.
Er son nyn lheid as ta chyndaa reesht gys yn olkys oc hene:
leeid-ee yn Chiarn ad magh marish ny drogh‐yantee; agh bee shee er Israel.
TRA hug y Chiarn chyndaa da cappeeys Sion:
eisht va shin goll rish sleih va dreamal.
Eisht va nyn meeall lhieent lesh gennallys:
as y chengey ain lesh boggey.
Shen y traa dooyrt ad mastey ny ashoonee:
Ta'n Chiarn er n'yannoo reddyn mooarey er ny son oc.
Ta'n Chiarn, dy-feer, er n'yannoo hannah reddyn yindyssagh er nyn son:
jeu ta shin goaill boggey.
Cur chyndaa da'n chappeeys ain, O Hiarn:
myr da ny awinyn ayns y jiass.
Adsyn ta cuirr ayns jeir:
nee ad buinn ayns boggey.
Eshyn ta nish goll er e hoshiaght keayney, as ta cuirr rass mie:
hig eh reesht dyn dooyt lesh gennallys, as ver eh lesh e vunneeyn mârish.
MANNAGH vel y Chiarn troggal y thie ta'n obbyr oc ayns fardail ta dy hroggal eh.
Mannagh vel y Chiarn freayll yn ard‐valley:
ta'n arreyder dooisht ayns fardail.
Cha vel eh agh obbyr caillit dy vel shiu ayns siyr dy irree dy moghey, as cha anmagh goaill fea, as gee yn arran dy imnea:
son shen myr t'eh coyrt cadley dauesyn shinney lesh.
Cur‐jee my‐ner, cloan as mess y vrein:
t'ad eiraght as gioot ta cheet veih'n Chiarn.
Myr ta sideyn ayns laue yn dooinney lajer:
eer myr shen ta'n chloan aegey.
S'maynrey yn dooinney ta'n whiver echey lane jeu:
cha bee nearey orroo tra t'ad coyrt eddin da nyn noidyn ayns y ghiat.
BANNIT t'adsyn ooilley ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn:
as ta gimmeeaght ayns e raaidyn.
Son nee oo gee jeh laboraght dty laueyn:
O s'mie t'ou, as s'maynrey vees oo.
Bee dty ven myr y billey‐feeyney messoil, er voallaghyn dty hie;
Dty chloan goll‐rish ny banglaneyn‐olive:
mygeayrt‐y‐mish dty voayrd.
Cur‐my‐ner, myr shoh vees y dooinney bannit:
ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn.
Nee yn Chiarn magh ass Sion myr shen oo y vannaghey:
dy vaik oo Jerusalem ayns maynrys ooilley laghyn dty vea;
Dy jarroo, dy vaik oo cloan dty chlienney:
as shee er Israel.
SHIMMEY keayrt t'ad er chaggey m'oi veih m'aegid:
foddee Israel nish gra;
Dy jarroo, shimmey keayrt t'ad er n'yannoo tranlaase orrym veih m'aegid derrey nish:
agh cha vel ad er chosney orrym.
Ta ny errooyn er hraaue er my ghreeym:
as er n'yannoo creaghyn liauyrey.
Agh ta'n Chiarn cairagh:
er vrishey ribbaghyn ny mee‐chrauee dy peeshyn.
Lhig dauesyn v'er nyn goyrt gys nearey as er nyn gastey:
whilleen as ta ayns drogh aigney gys Sion.
Dy jarroo, lhig daue 've myr y faiyr gaase er mullagh y thie:
ta fioghey roish my te slane er n'aase;
Lesh cha vel y beaynnee lhieeney e laue:
ny eshyn ta kiangley ny bunneeyn e oghrish;
Myr shen nagh vel adsyn ta goll shaghey wheesh as gra, Dy vannee yn Chiarn diu:
aigh mie diu ayns Ennym y Chiarn.
VEIH'N diunid ta mee er n'eamagh hoods, O Hiarn:
Hiarn, clasht rish my choraa.
O lhig da dty chleayshyn geill y choyrt:
da coraa my accan.
My vees uss, Hiarn, geyre dy ghoaill tastey jeh nyn shaghrynys:
O Hiarn, quoi oddyss shassoo fo?
Agh mayrts ta myghin:
shen‐y‐fa bee aggle er ny ghoaill royd.
Ta mee jeeaghyn son y Chiarn, ta m'annym farkiaght er e hon:
ayns e ghoo ta my hreishteil.
Ta my chree chea gys y Chiarn:
roish arrey yn voghrey, ta mee gra, roish arrey yn voghrey.
O Israel, cur dty hreishteil ayns y Chiarn, son marish y Chiarn ta myghin:
as mârishyn ta livrey‐ys niartal.
As livrey‐ee eh Israel:
veih ooilley e pheccaghyn.
HIARN, cha vel mee ardaignagh:
cha vel aym shilley mooaralagh.
Cha vel mee goaill orrym dy loayrt jeh cooishyn mooarey:
ta erskyn roshtyn my hushtey.
Agh ta mee ginjillaghey m'annym, as freayll eh fo smaght, myr lhiannoo t'er ny harbaa veih e voir:
dy jarroo ta my annym myr lhiannoo charbaait.
O Israel, cur dty hreisht ayns y Chiarn:
veih'n traa shoh magh er son dy bragh.
HIARN, cooinee er David:
as ooilley e heaghyn.
Kys ren eh breearrey gys y Chiarn:
as gialdyn casherick y yannoo da Jee Ooilley‐niartal Yacob.
Cha jig‐yms fo clea my hie:
chamoo hem seose gys my lhiabbee;
Cha derym cadley da my hooillyn, ny saveenagh da ferrooghyn my hooill:
ny cuishlinyn my ching dy ghoaill veg y fea;
Derrey yioym magh boayl son chiamble y Chiarn:
ynnyd‐vaghee son Jee niartal Yacob.
Cur‐my‐ner, cheayll shin jeh ec Ephrata:
as hooar shin eh ayns y cheyll.
Hem mayd stiagh ayns y chabbane‐agglish echeysyn:
as tuittee mayd injil er nyn ghlioonyn kiongoyrt rish stoyl e choshey.
Trog ort, O Hiarn, gys ynnyd dt'ea:
uss, as arg dty niart.
Lhig da dty haggyrtyn 've coamrit lesh cairys:
as lhig da dty nooghyn kiaulleeaght 'yannoo lesh boggey.
Er graih dty harvaant Ghavid:
ny chyndaa ersooyl eddin dty Er ooillit.
Ta'n Chiarn er n'yannoo breearrey firrinagh da David:
as cha jed eh n'oi;
Jeh mess dty chorp:
neem's soiaghey er dty stoyl‐reeoil.
My nee dty chloan freayll my chonaant as my recortyssyn neem's gynsaghey daue:
nee'n chloan ocsyn myrgeddin soie er dty stoyl‐reeoil er son dy bragh.
Son ta'n Chiarn er ghoaill Sion myr reih dy ve ynnyd‐vaghee da hene:
t'eh er ghoaill taitnys aynjee.
Shoh'n raad veem ec fea son dy bragh:
ayns shoh neem cummal, son ta mee goaill boggey ayn.
Neem yn beaghey eck y vannaghey lesh bishagh:
as neem ny boghtyn eck y yannoo magh lesh arran.
Ny saggyrtyn eck neem y choamrey lesh slaynt:
as gowee ny nooghyn eck boggey lesh arraneyn‐moyllee.
Shen y raad verym er niart Ghavid dy vlaaghey:
ta mee er n'oardaghey londeyr son my Er‐ooillit.
Er son e noidyn, neem adsyn y choodaghey lesh nearey:
agh er hene nee'n attey echey cur magh blaa.
CUR‐JEE my‐ner, cre cha mie as eunyssagh te:
vraaraghyn, dy vaghey cooidjagh ayns unnaneys.
Te goll‐rish yn ooill millish er y chione, roie sheese er yn aasaag:
dy jarroo er faasaag Aaron, as ren shilley sheese gys rumbyllyn e choamrey.
Casley rish druight Hermon:
huitt sheese er cronk Sion.
Son ayns shen ghiall y Chiarn e vannaght:
as bea er son dy bragh.
CUR‐JEE my‐ner nish, moylley‐jee yn Chiarn:
ooilley shiuish sharvaantyn y Chiarn;
Shiuish ta 'syn oie shassoo (
dy jarroo ayns cooyrtyn thie yn Jee ain.
Trog‐jee seose nyn laueyn ayns yn ynnyd casherick:
as cur‐jee moylley da'n Chiarn.
Dy jean y Chiarn, chroo niau as thalloo:
bannaght y choyrt dhyts veih Sion.
O MOYLLEY‐JEE yn Chiarn, cur‐jee ard‐voylley da Ennym y Chiarn:
jean‐jee eh y voylley, O shiuish shirveishee yn Chiarn;
Shiuish ta shassoo ayns thie yn Chiarn:
ayns cooyrtyn thie yn Jee ain.
O moylley‐jee yn Chiarn, son ta'n Chiarn graysoil:
O trog‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee gys yn Ennym echey, son te eunyssagh.
As cre'n‐oyr? ta'n Chiarn er reih Jacob da hene:
as Israel son e eiraght hene.
Son ta fys aym dy vel y Chiarn mooar:
as dy vel y Chiarn ainyn erskyn dy chooilley Yee.
Cre erbee s'gooidsave lesh y Chiarn, shen ren eh ayns niau, as er y thalloo:
ayns yn aarkey, as ayns ooilley ny diunidyn mooarey.
T'eh cur magh ny bodjallyn veih ardjyn sodjey magh y theihll:
as cur magh ny tendreilyn taarnee lesh y fliaghey, tayrn ny geayghyn magh ass e hashtaghyn.
Woaill eh yn chied-er-ny-ruggey ayns cheer Egypt:
chammah dy gheiney as maase.
T'eh er hoilshaghey cowraghyn as yindyssyn ayns y vean ayds, O heer Egypt:
er Pharaoh as ooilley e vooinjer.
Woaillee eh ymmodee ashoonyn:
as stroie eh reeaghyn niartal.
Sehon ree ny Amoriteyn, as Og ree Vasan:
as ooilley reeriaghtyn Chanaan;
As hug eh yn cheer oc dy ve son eiraght:
dy jarroo son eiraght da Israel e phobble.
Ta dt'ennym, O Hiarn, farraghtyn son dy bragh:
as dty imraa myrgeddin, O Hiarn, veih sheeloghe gys sheeloghe.
Son gowee yn Chiarn cooilleeney son e phobble:
as bee eh graysoil da e harvaantyn.
Er son jallooyn ny ashoonyn, cha vel ad agh argid as airh:
obbyr laueyn deiney.
Ta beill oc, as cha vel ad loayrt:
ta sooillyn oc, agh cha vel ad fakin;
Ta cleayshyn oc, agh cha vel ad clashtyn:
chamoo ta veg yn ennal ayns nyn meeal.
T'adsyn ta jannoo ad casley roo:
as myr shen t'adsyn ooilley ta cur nyn dreishteil ayndoo.
Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn, shiuish hie Israel:
moylley‐jee yn Chiarn, shiuish hie Aaron.
Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn, shiuish hie Levi; shiuish ta goaill aggle roish y Chiarn, bannee‐jee yn Chiarn.
Bannit dy row yn Chiarn veih Sion:
ta cummal ec Jerusalem.
O CUR‐JEE booise da'n Chiarn, son t'eh graysoil:
as ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
O cur‐jee booise da Jee dy chooilley Yee:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
O cur‐jee booise da Chiarn dy chooilley hiarn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ta ny lomarcan jannoo yindyssyn mooarey:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ta liorish e chreenaght erskyn‐earroo er chroo ny niaughyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren sheeyney magh yn thalloo erskyn ny ushtaghyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren soilshaghyn mooarey y chroo:
son ta e vyghyn farraghtyn son dy bragh;
Yn ghrian dy reill y laa:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
Yn eayst as ny rollageyn dy reill yn oie:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren Egypt as yn chied er-ny-ruggey oc y woalley:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
As hug lesh Israel magh veih ny mast' oc:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
Lesh laue niartal as roih sheeynit magh:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren y faarkey Jiarg y rheynn ayns daa ayrn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
As ren Israel y leeideil trooid y vean echey:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Agh er son Pharaoh as e heshaght‐chaggee, ren eh adsyn y stroie ayns yn aarkey Jiarg:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren e phobble hene y leeideil trooid yn aasagh:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren reeaghyn pooral y woalley:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
As ren stroie reeaghyn niartal:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
Sehon ree ny Amoriteyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
As Og ree Vasan:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
As hug ersooyl yn cheer oc son eiraght:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh;
Dy jarroo son eiraght da Israel e harvaant:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ren cooinaghtyn orrin tra va shin ayns seaghyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
As ta er livrey shin veih nyn noidyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
Ta coyrt beaghey da dy chooilley eill:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
O cur‐jee booise da Jee ny niaughyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
O cur‐jee booise da'n Chiarn dy hiarnyn:
son ta e vyghin farraghtyn son dy bragh.
LIORISH awinyn Vabylon hoie shin sheese as cheayn shin:
tra ren shin smooinaghtyn orts, O Sion.
Er son ny claasaghyn ain, hrogh shin ad seose:
er ny biljyn ta ayns shen.
Son adsyn ren shin y leeideil ayns cappeeys, hir ad orrin arrane, as bingys ayns nyn drimshey:
Gow‐jee dooin unnane dy arraneyn Sion.
Kys oddys mayd arrane y Chiarn y ghoaill:
ayns cheer yoarree?
My yarrood‐yms uss O Yerusalem:
lhig my laue yesh jarrood e schlei.
Mannagh gooin‐yms orts, lhig da my hengey lhiantyn gys druntyn my veeal:
dy jarroo, mannagh vel mee soiaghey jeh Jerusalem erskyn dy chooilley voggey elley.
Cooinee er cloan Edom, O Hiarn, ayns laa Yerusalem:
kys dooyrt ad, Sheese lesh, sheese lesh, corrym rish y thalloo.
O inneen Vabylon, kiarit son toyrt‐mow:
s'maynrey vees y dooinney nee uss y chooilleeney myr t'ou er hirveish shinyn.
Bannit vees eshyn ghoys dty chloan:
as hilgys ad noi ny claghyn.
VERYM booise dhyt, O Hiarn, lesh ooilley my chree:
dy jarroo fenish ny ainleyn goym arraneyn‐moyllee hoods.
Neem ooashley 'choyrt kiongoyrt rish dty hiamble casherick, as dt'ennym y voylley, er coontey dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh as dt'ynrickys:
son t'ou er ghloyraghey dt'Ennym as dty Ghoo erskyn dy chooilley nhee.
Tra deie mee ort, ren oo m'y chlashtyn:
as m'annym y choamrey lesh mooarane niart.
Nee ooilley reeaghyn y thallooin uss y voylley, O Hiarn:
son t'ad er chlashtyn goan dty veeall;
Dy-jarroo, gow‐ee ad arraneyn ayns raaidyn y Chiarn:
Dy vel gloyr y Chiarn mooar.
Son ga dy vel y Chiarn ard, ny‐yeih t'eh coyrt tastey da'n sleih imlee:
agh er son ny mooaralee t'eh jeeaghyn orroo foddey veih.
Ga dy vel mee shooyll ayns mean seaghyn, ny‐yeih nee oo m'y ooraghey:
sheeyn‐ee oo magh dty laue er eulys my noidyn, as nee dty laue yesh mish y hauail.
Nee'n Chiarn e chenjallys‐ghraihagh y yannoo mie dooys:
ta dty vyghin, O Hiarn, farraghtyn son dy bragh:
ny jean beg y hoiaghey eisht jeh obbyr dty laueyn hene.
O HIARN, t'ou er my ronsaghey magh, as er my hoiggal:
shione dhyts my hoie‐sheese, as my irree‐seose; t'ou toiggal my smooinaghtyn foddey ro‐laue.
T'ou uss mygeayrt my chassan, as mygeayrt my lhiabbee:
as fakin ooilley my raaidyn.
Son cur‐my‐ner, cha vel fockle er my hengey:
nagh vel uss, O Hiarn, dy slane toiggal.
T'ou uss er my chummey cheu chooylloo, as cheu veealloo:
as er choyrt dty laue orrym.
Dy hoiggal shoh, te ro yindyssagh as ro-ard er-my-hon:
cha voddym roshtyn huggey.
C'raad eisht neem chea veih dty Spyrryd:
ny c'raad neem cosney veih dt'enish?
My hem seose gys niau, t'ou ayns shen:
my hem sheese gys niurin, t'ou ayns shen myrgeddin.
My ghoym skianyn y voghrey:
as tannaghtyn ayns ny ardjyn sodjey magh d'yn aarkey;
Dy jarroo ayns shen myrgeddin nee dty laue m'y leeideil:
as nee dty laue yesh m'y niartaghey.
My jirym, Foddee dy jean y dorraghys m'y choodaghey:
eisht bee m'oie er ny hyndaa gys soilshey yn laa.
Dy jarroo, cha vel y dorraghys dorraghey mayrts, agh ta'n oie cha sollys as y laa:
ta'n dorraghys as y soilshey dhyts co‐laik.
Son lhiats my challin:
t'ou er my choodaghey ayns brein my vayrey.
Verym booise dhyts, son ta mee dy atchimagh as dy yindyssagh er my chroo:
mirrillagh ta dty obbraghyn, as s'mie ta m'annym dy hoiggal shen.
Cha vel my chraueyn er ny cheiltyn void's:
ga dy row mee jeant dy follit, as er my chummey heese er y thalloo.
Honnick dty hooillyn yn stoo ayms, tra ve foast gyn cummey:
as ayns dty lioar va ooilley my oltyn scruit;
Va laa lurg laa er nyn gummey:
tra nagh row ad foast er jeet rish.
O cre cha deyr ta dty choyrleyn dooys, O Yee:
O cre wheesh ta'n symm oc?
My hem dy choontey ad, t'ad ny smoo ayns earroo n'yn gheinnagh:
tra ta mee doostey ass my chadley, ta mee ayns dt'enish.
Nagh jean oo stroie ny drogh‐yantee, O Yee:
immee‐jee ass m'enish, shiuish gheiney fuilltagh.
Son t'ad loayrt dy mee‐chairagh dt'oi:
as ta dty noidyn goaill dt'Ennym ayns fardail.
Nagh vel dwoaie aym orroosyn, O Hiarn, ta dwoaie oc orts:
as nagh vel mee corree roosyn ta girree magh dt'oi?
Dy jarroo ta slane dwoaie aym orroo:
myr dy beagh ad my eer noidyn.
Prow mee, O Yee, as ronsee grunt my chree:
jean m'y hirrey magh, as feysht my smooinaghtyn.
Jeeagh my ta mee ayns raad erbee dy olkys:
as leeid mee gys raad yn vea dy bragh farraghtyn.
LIVREY mee, O Hiarn, veih'n drogh ghooinney:
as freill mee veih'n dooinney dewil;
Ta smooinaghtyn er olk ayns nyn greeaghyn:
as dy kinjagh greesaghey seose anvea.
T'ad er slhieu nyn jengaghyn myr ard‐nieu:
ta pyshoon yn adder fo nyn meillyn.
Freill mee, O Hiarn, veih laueyn ny mee‐chrauee:
jean m'y choadey veih ny tranlaasee, ta kiarit dy my hilgey harrish ayns my raaidyn.
Ta ny mooaralee er hoiaghey ribbey er my hon, as er skeayley magh lieen dy lhean lesh coyrdyn:
dy jarroo t'ad er hoiaghey trappyn ayns my raad.
Dooyrt mee rish y Chiarn, She uss my Yee:
eaisht rish coraa my phadjeryn, O Hiarn.
O Hiarn Yee, uss niart my lhaynt:
t'ou er choodaghey my chione ayns laa yn chaggey.
Ny lhig da'n dooinney mee‐chrauee cooilleen‐aigney y gheddyn orrym, O Hiarn:
ny lhig da ny saaseyn aggairagh echey goaill toshiaght, nagh bee ad ro-voyrnagh.
Lhig da olkys nyn meillyn hene tuittym er y chione ocsyn:
ta dy my hionney stiagh er dy chooilley heu.
Lhig da smarageyn jiarg losht tuittym orroo:
lhig daue ve tilgit ayns yn aile, as ayns ny ooigyn dowiney, nagh n'irree ad reesht dy bragh.
Cha jig y feanish foalsey er y hoshiaght er y thalloo:
nee olk yn dooinney tranlaasagh y helg gys e hoyrt‐mow.
Shickyr ta mee dy jean y Chiarn cooilleeney y ghoaill ayns lieh'n voght:
as dy gum eh seose cooish yn ymmyrchagh.
Ver y dooinney ynrick myrgeddin booise da dty Ennym:
as nee'n er‐cairagh tannaghtyn ayns dty hilley.
HIARN, ta mee geamagh ort, jean siyr hym:
as cur geill da my choraa, tra ta mee jannoo m'accan hood.
Lhig da my phadjer v'er ny hebbal ayns dty enish myr yn incense:
as lhig da troggal seose my laueyn 've myr oural yn astyr.
Soie arrey, O Hiarn, roish my veeal:
as freill dorrys my veillyn.
O ny lhig da my chree ve er ny lhoobey gys drogh obbyr er‐bee:
ny lhig dou raad y chur dou hene ayns cliaghtaghyn mee‐chrauee, mâroosyn ta gobbraghey olk; er‐aggle dy goym commee jeh ny t'ad goaill taitnys ayn.
Ny s'leaie lhig da deiney mie m'y cherraghey ayns aigney‐mie:
as oghsan y choyrt dou.
As bee shoh myr ooill slayntoil, nagh brish my chione:
neem padjer foast y ghoaill noi'n olkys oc.
Lhig da ny briwnyn oc cherraghtyn ayns ynnydyn claghagh:
dy vod ad clashtyn my ghoan, son t'ad millish.
Ta ny craueyn ain ny lhie skeaylt er beeal yn oaie:
'naght myr ta fer brishey as scoltey fuygh er y thalloo.
Agh ta my hooillyn jeeaghyn hoods, O Hiarn Yee:
aynyds ta my hreishteil, O ny jean m'annym y hreigeil.
Freill mee veih'n ribbey t'ad er hoiaghey er-my-hon:
as voish geulaghyn ny drogh‐yantee.
Lhig da ny mee‐chrauee tuittym lesh‐y‐cheilley ayns ny ribbaghyn oc hene:
as lhig dooys dy bragh ad y haghney.
HROG mee seose my choraa gys y Chiarn:
dy jarroo, gys y Chiarn ren mee my aghin.
Gheayrt mee magh my accan kiongoyrt rish:
as hoilshee mee da my heaghyn.
Tra va my spyrryd ayns trimshey, va sooill ayd er my chassan:
ayns y raad va mee shooyl t'ad dy follit er hoiaghey ribbey er-my-hon.
Yeeagh mee myrgeddin er my laue yesh:
as honnick mee nagh row fer erbee yinnagh goaill rhym.
Cha row ynnyd erbee aym dy chea huggey son sauchys:
