as cha row dooinney erbee ren scansh jeh my vioys.
Deie mee hoods, O Hiarn, as dooyrt mee, Uss my hreishteil as my eiraght ayns cheer y sleih bio.
Cur geill da m'accan:
son dy injil ta mee er duittym.
O livrey mee veih my hranlaasee:
son t'ad ro-lajer er my hon.
Livrey m'annym ass pryssoon, dy voddym booise y choyrt da dty Ennym:
as shoh my ver oo dou, eisht nee deiney crauee taaghey my heshaght.
EAISHT rish my phadjer, O Hiarn, as cur geill da my yeearree:
cur clashtyn dou er graih dty ynrickys as dty chairys;
As ny gow er dty hoshiaght gys briwnys rish dty harvaant:
son ayns dty hilley's cha bee dooinney erbee bio er ny heyrey.
Son ta'n noid er n'yannoo tranlaase er m'annym:
t'eh er woalley sheese my vioys gys y thalloo:
t'eh er m'eiyrt gys y dorraghys, goll roosyn ta er ve foddey marroo.
Shen‐y‐fa ta my spyrryd seaghnit aynym:
as ta my chree brisht cheu‐sthie jeem.
Agh foast ta mee cooinaghtyn er y traa t'er n'gholl shaghey:
ta mee smooinaghtyn dy dowin er ooilley dty obbraghyn:
ta mee dy jarroo baarail mee hene ayns obbraghyn dty laueyn.
Ta mee sheeyney magh my laueyn hoods:
ta m'annym paagh er dty hon myr thalloo chirrym.
Eaisht rhym, O Hiarn, as shen dy leah, son ta my spyrryd gannooinaghey:
ny follee voym dty eddin, nagh beem casley roosyn ta goll sheese ayns yn oaie.
O lhig dou clashtyn dty chenjallys‐ghraihagh leah 'sy voghrey, son aynyds ta my hreishteil:
jeeagh dou yn raad ayn lhisin gimmeeaght, son hoods ta mee troggal seose my annym.
Livrey mee, O Hiarn, veih my noidyn:
son hoods ta mee chea dy my choadey.
Ynsee dou dy yannoo dty aigney, son she uss my Yee:
lhig da dty Spyrryd graihagh mish y leeideil gys y cheer dy chairys.
Niartee mee, O Hiarn, er graih dty Ennym:
as er graih dty ynrickys, jean m'annym y reaghey ass seaghyn.
As jeh dty vieys giare sheese my noidyn:
as stroie adsyn ooilley ta jannoo tranlaase er m'annym, son mish dty harvaant.
BANNIT dy row yn Chiarn my niart:
ta gynsaghey my laueyn dy chaggey, as my veir dy ghleck;
My varrant as my hoor lajer, my chashtal as my er-livreyee, my endeilagh ayn ta mee treishteil:
ta smaghtaghey yn pobble ta fo my reill.
Hiarn, cre ta dooinney, dy vel oo coyrt lheid y gheill da:
ny mac dooinney, dy vel oo jannoo wheesh jeh?
Cha vel dooinney agh myr red gyn veg:
ta e hraa goll shaghey myr y scadoo.
Croym dty niaughyn, O Hiarn, as tar neose:
benn rish ny sleityn, as bee ad ayns jaagh.
Tilg magh dty hendreilyn as skeayl ad:
lhig magh dty hideyn, as stroie ad.
Sheeyn magh dty laue veih'n yrjid:
livrey mee, as saue mee veih ny ushtaghyn mooarey, veih laue cloan yoarree;
Yn beeal oc ta loayrt dy foalsey:
as ta'n laue yesh oc laue yesh dy volteyrys.
Goyms arrane‐moyllee noa hoods, O Yee:
as hoods neem kiaulleeaght er lute dy yeih strengyn.
T'ou uss er choyrt barriaght da reeaghyn:
as er livrey David dty harvaant veih gaue yn chliwe.
Saue as livrey mee veih laue cloan yoarree:
yn beeal oc ta loayrt dy foalsey, as ta'n laue yesh oc laue yesh dy volteyrys.
Dy vod ny mec ainyn gaase seose myr ny biljyn aegey:
as dy vod ny inneenyn ain y ve myr corneilyn aalin y chiamble.
Dy vod ny thieyn‐tashtee ain ve lane, as jeant magh dy palchey lesh dy chooilley horch dy stoyr:
dy vod ny kirree ain bishaghey gys thousaneyn as jeih thousaneyn ayns nyn oayll;
Dy vod ny dew ain 've lajer son obbyr, nagh bee assee erbee:
ny veg y chappeeys, ny oyr gaccan ayns nyn straidyn.
S'mayrney yn pobble ta 'sy stayd shoh:
dy jarroo, bannit ta'n pobble ta'n Chiarn oc son nyn Yee.
VERYMS ard‐voylley dhyt, O Yee my Ree:
as neem's dty Ennym y vannaghey son dy bragh as dy bragh.
Dy chooilley laa verym booise dhyt:
as dty Ennym y ghloyraghey son dy bragh as dy bragh.
S'mooar ta'n Chiarn, as yindyssagh, feeu dy v'er ny voylley:
ta'n mooads echey erskyn roshtyn nyn dushtey.
Nee un sheeloghe dty obbraghyn y voylley gys sheeloghe elley:
as soilshee ad magh dty niart.
Er-my-hon's, loayrym jeh dty ooashley:
dty ghloyr, dty voylley, as dty obbraghyn yindyssagh;
Myr shen dy jean sleih loayrt jeh niart dty obbraghyn yindyssagh:
as neem's myrgeddin fockley magh dty phooar ooilley‐niartal.
Bee imraa er ny yannoo jeh ymmodee dty chenjallys:
as gow-ee sleih arraneyn jeh dty chairys.
Ta'n Chiarn graysoil as myghinagh:
jeh surranse‐foddey, as mieys vooar.
Ta'n Chiarn dooie da dy chooilley ghooinney:
as ta e vyghin harrish ooilley e obbraghyn.
Ta ooilley dt'obbraghyn dy dty voylley, O Hiarn:
as ta dty nooghyn cur booise dhyt.
T'ad soilshaghey gloyr dty reeriaght:
as loayrt jeh dty phooar;
Dy vod dty phooar, dty ghloyr, as niart dty reeriaght:
v'er ny hoilshaghey da deiney.
Ta'n reeriaght ayds reeriaght dy bragh farraghtyn:
as ta dty ard‐reill er‐mayrn trooid dy chooilley heeloghe.
Ta'n Chiarn niartaghey lhieusyn ooilley ta aarloo dy huittym:
as troggal seose adsyn ooilley ta ny lhie fo'n errey.
Ta sooillyn dy chooilley chretoor farkiaght orts, O Hiarn:
as t'ou coyrt daue nyn meaghey ayns imbagh cooie.
T'ou fosley dty laue:
as lhieeney dy chooilley nhee bio lesh palchey.
Ta'n Chiarn cairagh ayns ooilley e raaidyn:
as casherick ayns ooilley e obbraghyn.
Ta'n Chiarn er‐gerrey dauesyn ooilley ta geamagh er:
dy jarroo, dauesyn ooilley ta geamagh er ayns ynrickys.
Cooilleenee eshyn yn yeearree ocsyn ta goaill aggle roish:
clynnee eh myrgeddin yn eam oc, as cooinee eh lhieu.
Ta'n Chiarn coadey adsyn ooilley ta graihagh er:
agh skeayley dy lhean ooilley ny mee‐chrauee.
Loayr‐ee my veeall jeh moylley'n Chiarn:
as lhig da dy chooilley chretoor booise y choyrt da'n Ennym casherick echey son dy bragh as dy bragh.
JEAN y Chiarn y voylley, O m'annym; choud as s'bio mee verym moylley da'n Chiarn:
dy jarroo, choud as veem er‐mayrn, goym arraneyn‐moyllee gys my Yee.
O ny cur‐jee nyn marrant er princeyn, ny er veg jeh cloan gheiney:
son cha vel veg y chooney ayndoo.
Son tra ta ennal dooinney er n'gholl voish, nee eh chyndaa reesht gys e ooir:
as eisht ta ooilley e chiarail goll naardey.
Bannit t'eshyn ta Jee Yacob echey son e chooney:
as e hreishteil t'ayns y Chiarn e Yee;
Ta er chroo niau as thalloo, yn faarkey, as ooilley ny t'ayndoo:
ta freayll e yialdyn son dy bragh.
Ta jannoo cairys dauesyn ta surranse aggair:
ta beaghey ny accryssee.
Ta'n Chiarn coyrt feaysley da ny pryssoonee:
ta'n Chiarn coyrt soilshey da ny doail.
Ta'n Chiarn cooney lhieusyn t'er duittym:
ta'n Chiarn goaill kiarail jeh'n vooinjer chairagh.
Ta'n Chiarn coadey yn joarree, t'eh shassoo ayns lieh yn lhiannoo gyn ayr, as y ven‐treoghe:
agh son raad ny mee‐chrauee, t'eh dy hilgey eh bun‐ry‐skyn.
Bee yn Chiarn dty Yee, O Sion, ny Ree er son dy bragh:
as trooid magh dy chooilley heeloghe.
O MOYLLEY‐JEE yn Chiarn:
son s'mie te dy ghoaill arraneyn‐moyllee gys y Jee ain:
dy jarroo, s'eunyssagh as gerjoilagh te dy ve booisal.
Ta'n Chiarn troggal seose Jerusalem:
as chaglym cooidjagh kynneeyn skeaylt Israel.
T'eh dy lheihys adsyn ta brisht ayns cree:
as coyrt medshin dy laanaghey ny doghanyn oc.
T'eh coontey earroo ny rollageyn:
as ta ennym echey er dagh unnane oc.
S'mooar ta'n Chiarn ainyn, as s'mooar ta e phooar:
dy jarroo, ta e chreenaght erskyn earroo.
Ta'n Chiarn soiaghey seose yn vooinjer imlee:
as coyrt sheese ny mee‐chrauee kiart rish y thalloo.
O gow‐jee arraneyn moyllee gys y Chiarn lesh toyrt‐booise:
gow‐jee arraneyn‐moyllee er y chlaasagh gys y Jee ain.
Ta coodaghey yn aer lesh bodjallyn, as jannoo aarloo yn fliaghey son y thalloo:
ta coyrt er y faiyr dy aase er ny sleityn, as lossyreeyn son ymmyd deiney;
Ta coyrt foddyr da'n maase:
as beaghey ny fee aegey ta geamagh huggey.
Cha vel eshyn soiaghey jeh troshid cabbyl:
chamoo ta geill echey da cassyn y choshee bieau;
Agh ta taitnys ec y Chiarn ayndoosyn ta goaill aggle roish:
as ta coyrt nyn dreishteil ayns e vyghin.
Cur moylley da'n Chiarn, O Yerusalem:
cur moylley da dty Yee, O Sion:
Son t'eh er n'yannoo shickyr boltyn dty ghiattyn:
as er vannaghey dty chloan er cheu‐sthie jeed.
T'eh jannoo shee ayns dty ardjyn:
as dy dty yannoo magh lesh flooyr curnaght.
T'eh coyrt magh e harey er y thalloo:
as ta e ghoo roie feer leah.
T'eh tilgey sniaghtey myr ollan:
as skeayley yn lieh‐rio myr leoaie.
T'eh ceau magh e rio ayns peeshyn mynney:
quoi ta abyl dy hurranse y feayraght echey.
T'eh coyrt magh e ghoo, as dy hennue ad:
t'ed sheidey lesh e gheay, as ta ny ushtaghyn roie.
Hoilshee eh e ghoo da Jacob:
e 'lattyssyn as e oardaghyn da Israel.
Cha vel eh er ghellal myr shoh rish ashoon erbee elley:
chamoo t'ec ny ashoonee tushtey jeh e leighyn.
O MOYLLEY‐JEE Chiarn niau:
moylley‐jee eh ayns yn yrjid.
Moylley‐jee eh, ooilley shiuish e ainleyn:
moylley jee eh shiuish e heshaghtyn‐caggee.
Moylley‐jee eh, ghrian as eayst:
moylley‐jee eh, ooilley shiuish rollageyn as soilshey.
Moylley‐jee eh, ooilley shiuish niaughyn:
as shiuish ushtaghyn ta erskyn yn aer.
Lhig daue Ennym y Chiarn y voylley:
son loayr eh yn fockle, as v'ad jeant:
doardee eh, as v'ad er nyn groo.
T'eh er n'yannoo ad shickyr son dy bragh as dy bragh:
t'eh er choyrt daue leigh nagh bee er ny vrishey.
Moylley‐jee yn Chiarn er y thalloo:
shiuish whaleyn, as ooilley ny ynnydyn dowiney.
Aile as sniaghtey garroo, sniaghtey meen as keay:
geay as sterrym, cooilleeney e ghoo;
Sleityn as dy chooilley chronk:
biljyn messoil, as dy chooilley villey cedar;
Beiyn as maase jeh dy chooilley cheint:
cretooryn snauee as eeanlee skianagh;
Reeaghyn y thallooin, as dy chooilley phobble:
princeyn as ooilley briwnyn y theihll;
Deiney aegey as moidynyn, shenn gheiney as paitchyn, moylley‐jee Ennym y Chiarn:
son ta'n Ennym echeysyn ny‐lomarcan ooasle, as e ghloyr erskyn niau as thalloo.
Troggee eshyn seose dy ard niart e phobble:
nee ooilley e nooghyn eshyn y voylley:
dy feer cloan Israel, dy jarroo yn pobble ta dy hirveish eh.
O GOW‐JEE arrane noa gys y Chiarn:
lhig da agglish ny nooghyn eshyn y voylley.
Lhig da Israel boggey 'ghoaill aynsyn ren eh y chroo:
as lhig da cloan Sion 've gennal ayns nyn Ree.
Lhig daue moylley yn Ennym echey ayns y daunsin:
lhig daue arraneyn‐moyllee 'ghoaill huggey lesh tabret as y chlaasagh;
Son ta taitnys ec y Chiarn ayns e phobble:
as t'eh cooney lhieusyn ta jeh cree imlee.
Lhig da ny nooghyn 've gennal dy gloyroil:
lhig daue boggey 'ghoaill er nyn lhiabbaghyn.
Lhig da arraneyn‐moyllee Yee 've ayns nyn meeal:
as cliwe dy ghaa foyr ayns nyn laue;
Dy ghoaill cooilleeney er ny ashoonee:
as dy cherraghey yn pobble;
Dy chiangley ny reeaghyn oc ayns geulaghyn:
as ny deiney ooasle oc lesh draghtyn yiarn;
Dy ghoaill cooilleeney orroo, myr te scruit:
lheid yn ooashley t'ec ooilley e nooghyn.
O CUR‐JEE moylley da Jee ayns e chasherickys:
moylley‐jee eh ayns yrjid e phooar.
Cur‐jee moylley da ayns e obbraghyn ooasle:
moylley‐jee eh cordail rish e phooar erskyn earroo.
Cur‐jee moylley da lesh feiyr y chayrn:
moylley‐jee eh er y lute as y chlaasagh.
Moylley‐jee eh lesh ny cymballyn as daunsin:
cur‐jee moylley da er ny greinyn strengit as y feddan.
Cur‐jee moylley da er ny cymballyn shiaullit:
moylley‐jee eh er ny cymballyn bingey.
Lhig da dy chooilley nhee ta ennal ayn:
moylley 'choyrt da'n Chiarn.
